summary: DHA is a tactical fantasy gladiator game. Recruit a team, train, buy new weapons for heavy arena fights against other teams. Use all you can to win: gossip about opponents, get quests rewards, use powerful magic and pray not to die! The tournament rules are simple: it's harder and harder each time!

name: Disc Golf: Game On
summary: The fun of disc golf, coming to PC and console. Featuring six different throw types, ten unique courses and tons of new plastic!

name: Dickdown Duel
summary: Dickdown Duel is an erotic card game RPG about a card game that got lewd cards modded into it. Acquire new cards, build decks, challenge cute girls and dominate them in Lewd card based duels.

name: Dissonance
summary: Dissonance is a top-down 3rd person adventure game. Players will encounter supernatural anomalies and creatures. Find and use specialized gadgets to aid you in your journey. Explore the abandoned research facility and reveal the secret of the organization that sent you here.

name: DIY Tour: Indie Rock Simulator
summary: Make a band, tour Canada, get famous? A resource management music tycoon/simulation game. Manage your band, make choices in random events, play concerts, and build your reputation.

name: Die For Metal
summary: Die For Metal is a 2D Platformer where you play as a pagan metal-viking, battling though 3 worlds, with 45 levels, from ridiculously easy, to extremely hardcore.

name: DigRun
summary:
Match-4 Puzzle with new twists and cute characters, and angry, angry blocks!
A new match-4 puzzle game with unique gameplay and fun twists!
If it's colored, you can kill it. The same applies to these blocks too.
Stack them together and blow them in pieces, while charging up super powers and using items!

name: Dinkigolf
summary: Golfing on the fairway is one thing, but how about inside a volcano, up a mountain, or across city rooftops? In Dinkigolf, the objective of reaching the hole remains, but there may be plenty of varied hazards and obstacles in between!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley
summary: Explore a world filled with the magic of Disney as you discover rich stories and build the perfect neighbourhood alongside Disney and Pixar Heroes and Villains in this new life-sim adventure game. Welcome to Disney Dreamlight Valley.

name: Disney's 101 Dalmatians
summary: Handheld game based on the 101 Dalmatians movie.

name: Disney's Aladdin
summary: An LCD handheld game based on Disney's Aladdin movie. It was released in 1988.

name: Disney's Beauty and the Beast
summary: Handheld game based on the homonymous movie.

name: Disney's Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers
summary: A handheld game based on the Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers cartoon.

name: Dinosaurs
summary: Handheld game based on the Dinosaurs TV show.

name: Disney's The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Disney's The Lion King
summary: A standalone handheld device that only has a Lion King game.

name: Disney's The Little Mermaid
summary: A wristwatch Little Mermaid game.

name: Disney's Toy Story
summary: A standalone handheld gaming device that has only a Toy Story game.

name: Diptych: The Great War
summary: A visual novel about the Great War with anthropomorphic animals in the continuation of the story of the game Diptych.

name: Dino-D
summary: The game is well suited for children, it develops logical thinking and reaction, even playing solo, controlling 2 heroes at the same time develops the brain and forms new neural connections.

name: Disharmonia
summary: Disharmonia is a first person exploration game. Your decision will play a big role in the development of the whole game. You will play as Tony, you will explore and discover special places beyond your reality. You will try to find an end, but the game will never end.

name: Dirt Reborn
summary:
You are Dirt.
You have been falling for days.
Where are you?
In this classic game, you are Dirt, a skeleton cat, digging around in a mysterious underground world, collecting gems. It is a zen game with some mystery - why is Dirt digging anyways? How did he get there?

name: Disco Road
summary: Switch lanes to the beat in Disco Road. Also import your own music too. Run along through dancing worlds, pickup notes and power-up all to your favorite music.

name: Disney's Beauty and the Beast: LCD Wrist Game
summary: Wristwatch game based on the homonymous movie.

name: Digerati Presents: If You Don't Have Xbox Game Pass Bundle
summary: A trio of Game Pass approved titles, available in one convenient collection - no Xbox Game Pass required! This bundle contains Signs of the Sojourner, The Procession to Calvary, and Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition.

name: Dice Tribes: Ambitions
summary: A dice-based worker placement game. Manage the randomness and complete your ambition to win.

name: Disorient on The Murder Express
summary: Disorient On The Murder Express is a short, humorous and experimental murder mystery game in which you are tasked with deducing the details of a convoluted murder that took place on an isolated train, and making a show of presenting the evidence and accusing the culpable parties.

name: Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action
summary: Inspired by the "superhero movie within the movie" finale of Walt Disney Pictures' film "Chicken Little," Disney"s Chicken Little: Ace in Action features Ace, the superhero alter ego of Chicken Little, and the Hollywood versions of his misfit band of friends: Runt, Abby and Fish-Out-of-Water.

name: Disgaea 1 Complete: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Disgaea 1 Complete
- Original soundtrack selection
- Daily tear-off desktop calendar
- Special Box

name: Dismantled Director's Cut
summary: Experience the game in its best form with the Director's Cut Edition. New graphics, new enemies, more weapons, more blood...

name: Dio Simulator Remastered
summary: Play as the almighty DIO on your mission to end the Joestar bloodline by killing off Jotaro Kujo. Use iconic attacks like the Punch Barrage, the Road Roller, and the best one, Za Warudo! Have Fun!

name: Divine Combat
summary: Divine Combat is a turn-based strategy game wherein you lead a team to victory against another team. The fights are in top-down view on a grid, much like similar turn-based unit management games. There is no penalty for losing.

name: Digi-tiles
summary: Challenge your puzzle-solving skills in this math-based game by completing formulas to clear away tiles. Game modes include standard mode with 99 puzzles, and a non-stop survival mode.

name: Discovery Kids Snake Safari
summary: Travel the world hunting deadly snakes in this dangerous snake safari adventure!

name: Disney's Active Play: The Lion King II - Simba's Pride
summary: Lion King II: Simba's Pride Active Play invites children to play, sing, and dance along at home, in the car, or at the computer. Follow the story and the new lion cubs through the Pride Lands. Create coloring pages, board games, and costumes. Take Kiara, Kovu, Timon, and Pumbaa with you anywhere for sing-along fun.

name: Disney's Animated Storybook: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Distress
summary: Distress is a Yume Nikki fangame made for the 4th Dream Diary Jam. Help Saya find the effects, there are a total of 11. You can mix up all the effect together, making a total of 55 mixes.

name: Dickme Dicki
summary: Dickme Dicki is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a certain man, who has green hair and closed eyes. He appears to be a palette swap of Miserere's protagonist. The game was intended to be a joke, with some blatant criticisms of developers' shortcomings.

name: Dissension
summary: Embark on an undercover mission in a medieval kingdom hovering on the brink of a civil war. Become part of a vile conspiracy or choose to act against your orders. Stand by your unlikely allies or ruin them for personal gain. The fate of the divided realm rests in your hands.

name: Dissent
summary: Dissent is a visual novel with choice-based progression and has a strong narrative focus. We will draw you into the corporate office of Moniker Innovation, where you will uncover mysteries that haunt the halls within. Discover friends, enemies, and uncover the truth behind what Moniker does.

name: Ditch Whit #1: Shield Night
summary:
Welcome to this first installment of Ditch Whit, which is running Shield's executive office OS, hosted on a server in the Good Hope mansion.

A browser game containing additional lore and context for players who have completed NORCO.

name: Digimon Super Rumble
summary:
Digimon Super Rumble is a free-to-play, massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) that brings the world of the popular Digimon franchise to life. Developed by Move Games, this title immerses players in a vibrant, 3D world built with Unreal Engine 4.

In Digimon Super Rumble, players take on the role of a Tamer, embarking on an epic adventure to train, evolve, and battle with their Digimon companions. The game features a diverse collection of Digimon from the series, each with its own unique abilities and evolution lines.

The core gameplay centers around its turn-based combat system, where players strategically use their Digimon's skills to overcome challenges. The game combines elements of exploration and collection with a compelling storyline inspired by the Digimon Adventure anime, but with original characters and narratives exclusive to the game.

With regular updates and new content, Digimon Super Rumble offers a constantly evolving experience, providing a rich world for both new players and longtime fans to explore and enjoy.

name: Die, A.I
summary: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle space adventure. Survive the vengeful A.I system that has taken over the ship and killed everyone else onboard. Use your limited oxygen supply and cunning to overcome the failing systems and A.I created booby traps. Explore the ship...and don't die.

name: Di Gi Charat Fantasy Excellent
summary: Di Gi Charat Fantasy Excellent is a port of Di Gi Charat Fantasy for PlayStation 2.

name: Dis Pontibus 2
summary: A single-player game set in a archipelago full of puzzles.

name: Distraction Machine
summary: Welcome to Island City, an isolated metropolis filled with undead feeders and survivors battling over what few safe havens remain. You are The Distractor - a warrior bard wielding the power to soothe the living and control the undead. But will your music save your people or lead them to ruin?

name: Digerati Presents: Indie Darling Bundle Vol. 5
summary: A dynamic duo of acclaimed indies from Digerati! This bundle contains Unbound: Worlds Apart, and Apsulov: End of Gods.

name: Dino Tales
summary: The multi-award winning Dinosaur kids app, Dino Tales, is now on Nintendo Switch. Dino Tales takes you on a journey to a vivid, prehistoric world full of fun activities and places to explore.

name: Diggergun
summary:
Diggergun is an oppressive, 2D, platformer about workers, low wages and the environment.

Will you band together with others to push back against your corporate oppressors, side with your employer to get a leg up or just escape at the first opportunity possible?

name: Disney's Animated Storybook: 101 Dalmatians
summary: Relive the events of Disney's 101 Dalmatians in an educational animated picture book with minigames.

name: Disney's Aladdin
summary: The Game Boy Color port of Disney's Aladdin is based on the Sega Genesis version.

name: Disney's The Lion King
summary: The NES port of The Lion King.

name: Disney's The Lion King
summary: The Game Boy port of The Lion King.

name: Disney's The Jungle Book
summary: The NES port of Disney's The Jungle Book.

name: Disney's The Jungle Book
summary: The Game Boy port of Disney's The Jungle Book.

name: Disney's Aladdin
summary:
The game from Virgin based on the 1992 animated Disney film is a side-scrolling platformer.

The player controls Aladdin, who must make his way through several levels based on locations from the movie: from the streets and rooftops of Agrabah, the Cave of Wonders and the Sultan's dungeon to the final confrontation in Grand Vizier Jafar's palace.

name: Disney's The Jungle Book
summary: The SNES port of Disney's The Jungle Book differs from the Sega Genesis game in level layout and mechanics, although using similar aesthetics.

name: Disney's Aladdin: Final Cut
summary: An enhanced version of the Sega Genesis version of Disney's Aladdin, fixing bugs and adding features and level parts which couldn't make it in the original version. This version was released in the Disney Classic Games Collection compilation.

name: Disney Classic Games: Aladdin and The Lion King - The Jungle Book and More Aladdin Pack
summary: A DLC which upgrades the original game by adding the content added to the Disney Classic Games Collection compilation. It includes the SNES version of Aladdin as well as different iterations of Disney's The Jungles Book.

name: Dixotomia
summary: Dixotomia is a roleplaying VR shooter in a world of a science-fiction dystopia. Dive into the daily life of a SpecOps contractor, who is forced to fight vampires while also trying to stay sane without giving in to infection himself. Can he return back unchanged?

name: Dine Together
summary:
A Relax & Chill restaurant City P2E game. ~
The game is just a simple cook & serve gameplay.
You can also buy fram to gain the ingredients to cook the food too.

Now it incluede both Decroration & Cooking PVP ~

name: Disgaea 4 Complete+: A Promise of Sardines Edition
summary: When the Corrupternment threatens to disrupt the way of life in Hades, Valvatorez finds himself at the helm of a fiery revolution. The former tyrant will need to call upon new allies, recruit a formidable army, and learn a thing or two about political unrest if he hopes to take down the corrupt regime and bring salvation to all Prinny-kind!

name: Disney's Classic Games
summary: Disney Classic Games is another great way for kids to learn the alphabet and colours. Donald Duck and his friends have 3 different cool activities for kids. Make them feel that learning can also be fun.

name: Disastory
summary: An illustrated choice-driven roleplaying adventure where coffee machines find love and teenage girls steal eyeballs!? Explore a vibrant world with absurd stories and characters.

name: Disgaea 6 Complete: Digital Dood Edition
summary: Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the most recent installment of the Disgaea series! Disgaea 6 Complete includes all previously released DLC, plus the Digital Dood Edition comes with a bonus artbook!

name: Diffraction
summary:
Otome visual novel with a focus on connections and friendship.

A quiet coming-of-age story about how photography changed the lives of three people in a rainy small town and the paths in life they took with it.

name: Diode Arena
summary: Diode Arena is a free to play vehicle arena game where you can build your own custom vehicle and use it in online PvP matches.

name: Dick Ranger
summary: Experience an amazing adventure with Dick Ranger, who set off in search of his lost father William, a valued explorer and anthropologist. Travel with the hero through different lands and places.

name: Dino Safari: E-Pro
summary:
​On Jurassic Safari adventures like this you will discover wild and deadly dino carnivores:
TRex, Spinosaurus, Velociraptors, Stegosaurus, Raptors, Euoplocephalus Triceratops, Pterodactyl, Dilophosaurus, Parasaurolophus, Brontosaurus, Gigantic Worm, Plesiosaur, Compsognathus, Allosaurus, Dunkleosteus, Sarcosuchus, Achelousaurus, Deinonychus, Nodosaur, Medusaceratops, Giganotosaurus, Torosaurus, Edmontonia and Pentaceratops.
​

name: Dicey Dungeons Reunion
summary: This is a major new DLC for the game – six new episodes, one for each contestant. There’s new music, new art, new equipment, and of course new gameplay!

name: Dig Deep
summary: Grab a shovel and let's get digging! Join the adventure, hire miners and dig for a treasure.

name: Disney's Reading Quest with Aladdin
summary: Your child will be whisked away to learning adventures that build essential reading skills and challenge the imagination. Genie, Jasmine, Iago, and the gang are here to cheer kids on with encouragement and helpful hints. Watch them improve their skill levels as they journey to free Aladdin.

name: Disney's Winnie the Pooh & Tigger Too: Animated Storybook
summary: Animated StoryBook: Winnie the Pooh and Tigger Too is a PC video game released on April 30, 1999. This Disney's Winnie the Pooh adventure is presented in the form of a colourful storybook. Each page in the story is presented on screen with text and a full-colour interactive picture

name: Disney's You Can Fly! with Tinker Bell
summary: You Can Fly with Tinker Bell is a 2002 point-and-click computer game released by Disney Interactive.

name: Disney's Activity Center: Winnie the Pooh
summary:
Winnie the Pooh and the Blustery Day: Activity Center is a PC game from 2000.

Winnie the Pooh's Activity Center is a wonderful way to entertain your child on a rainy day; with six different activities at three different difficulty levels, kids of all ages can enjoy time spent inside. Also included is the animated storybook Animated StoryBook: Winnie the Pooh and Tigger Too, which offers more fun games and reading activities.

In the Winnie the Pooh's Activity Center, a friendly narrator greets you on "a blustery day." He presents activities such as Eeyore's house hunt--help Owl to find a new home; Heffalumps and Woozles--match the characters in Pooh's dreams; and Fly a Piglet--prevent Pooh and Piglet from running into trees and stumps. You may also choose to read the interactive book of Winnie the Pooh and the Blustery Day, which introduces different activities as you read the story along with the characters.

name: Diamond Skee-Ball
summary: Diamond Skee-Ball is a Twitch chat game for all streamer to play from the comfort of your home.

name: Dimensional Slaughter
summary: Dimensional Slaughter is a very bloody fast-paced movement shooter with Rogue-Like Mechanics and a Retro Style. Explore Strange Dimensions, Move to collect Ammo, and Kill to Heal.

name: Digimon Survive: Month 1 Edition
summary:
Digimon Survive presents a hybrid visual novel and tactical RPG set in a mysterious world filled with dangerous monsters and deadly battles that will test your ability to survive.

After getting lost on a school trip, Takuma Momozuka finds himself transported to a world inhabited by ferocious foes and new allies. Join Takuma and his friends as they fight their way back home. Craft your story in this thrilling visual novel with turn-based combat.

name: Die to Survive
summary: Gory rail shooter filled with action, explosions, boss battles, weapon upgrades, deamons and zombies ... lot´s of zombies.

name: Diamond Skeeball
summary: Diamond Skee-Ball is an arcade game and one of the first redemption games. It is played by rolling a ball up an inclined lane and over a "ball-hop" hump that jumps the ball into bullseye rings Skeeball is a fully twitch chat played game to play with your community.

name: Dice Gambit
summary: A turn based tactics game where you roll and allocate dice to control your characters in combat. Completely customize your characters build with a huge array of powers that allow for boundless combinations. All set in a Neo-renaissance metropolis, filled with aristocratic families vying for power.

name: Dictator: Glory Fatherland
summary: Assume the role of the ruler of the Republic of Beetrootopia, which is in a state of civil war between 9 cities that want to become the capital. You have to not only arm your army and seize the territories of the separatists, but also solve the problems of your citizens who come to bow to you.

name: Dimakerus
summary: Disguise as anyone. Mimic their ways. Ambush your friends. Discover cursed Roman relics in ever-chanading catacombs and wield their might to obliterate those who stand in your way.

name: Dimensional Drift
summary: Race through 4 unique dimensions in a ton of different cars with arcade-style driving. Unleash your inner racer as you explore these beautiful worlds. Upgrade your cars, paint them, make them monster trucks. Put on your seat belt, lets do this.

name: Dive Hard Dave
summary: Dive Hard Dave is an atmospheric action-adventure stealth game, set in a post-apocalyptic world shattered by massive tsunami and rise in sea levels. You play as Dave, a deep-sea diver who is forced into an unexpected adventure that will unravel mysteries of Earth's past. Made by a Solo Dev!

name: Disfigure
summary: Disfigure is a top-down shooter rogue-lite in which you fight countless grotesque creatures shrouded in darkness. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique builds each run and survive.

name: Disc Golf Online
summary: Play Disc Golf online with friends in a casual, but physically accurate Disc Golf simulation. Explore beautiful and diverse procedurally generated worlds. Play a new course every time, or replay your favourite course to master it.

name: Direct Contact
summary: Direct Contract is about Authentic Warfare, First-person Tactical realism experiences. Most weapons are in the same specs for each classification in today's world, making most modern combat asymmetrical.

name: Dictator's Creed
summary: This is a classic 2.5D action platforming game with an unusual setting of the Russian ghetto, inspired by the likes of Doom, Hotline Miami and Super Mario Bros. - Welcome to the Russian world!

name: DinoLife
summary:
DinoLife is a Dinosaur farming game with Life-Sim elements.

You are able to create, hatch and look after many Dinosaurs, while making money to expand, buy upgrades or gifts for the residents so you can become friends.

Or you may just want to save and keep personalising your room and house with items you collect while playing.

name: Disney's Treasure Planet: Treasure Racer
summary: Treasure Planet: Treasure Racer is one of the three games from the Treasure Planet: Training Academy collection that was distributed by McDonald's Mighty Kid's Meals, the other two being Treasure Planet: Broadside Blast and Treasure Planet: Etherium Rescue. Treasure Racer was published by Disney Interactive and released in 2002, along with all the other Treasure Planet related games.

name: Different Strokes
summary: A collaborative online painting game where players can create, edit, and rate each other's art!

name: Disney's Treasure Planet: Broadside Blast
summary: Treasure Planet: Broadside Blast is one of the three games from the Treasure Planet: Training Academy collection that was distributed by McDonald's Mighty Kid's Meals, the other two being Treasure Planet: Treasure Racer and Treasure Planet: Etherium Rescue. Broadside Blast was published by Disney Interactive and released in 2002, along with all the other Treasure Planet related games.

name: Disney's Treasure Planet: Etherium Rescue
summary: Treasure Planet: Etherium Rescue is one of the three games from the Treasure Planet: Training Academy collection that was distributed by McDonald's Mighty Kid's Meals, the other two being Treasure Planet: Treasure Racer and Treasure Planet: Broadside Blast. Etherium Rescue was published by Disney Interactive and released in 2002, along with all the other Treasure Planet related games.

name: Diamond no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Mirror World
summary: Alice is once again in Clover no Kuni and she goes through the looking glass to find herself once again in the Country of Diamonds, with no recollection of any of the events that happened in the previous Dia game.

name: Dimension M
summary: Survival maze game, survive inside the maze to collect coins, get boosts and frighten the goopies

name: Dimensional Gears
summary: Dimensional Gears is a 2.5D puzzle platformer that takes place in a dystopian steam-punk future where household appliances are the only sentient beings left. Shift dimensions in order explore a dangerous 2.5D environment, escape the factory, and save your friends!

name: Die O'Clock
summary: Die o' clock is a solo dark and disturbing escape game. The clock gives you a chance to start over. Find the twelve keys necessary to win its challenge.

name: Dimday Red
summary: An Interactive Fiction RPG where you play as Cillian, an assassin working for the Syndicates. Pick and combine Trait cards to shape your personality, choose how you live on the final days of Earth and roll the dice: if you’re lucky, you won’t burn before the world does.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Disney Dreamlight Valley: Deluxe Edition includes:

- Access to Disney Dreamlight Valley
- All the exclusive cosmetic items from the Standard Edition
- 14,500 Moonstones
- Exclusive Deluxe Celestial Sea Turtle animal companion
- Exclusive Deluxe Clothing Set (5 wearable items)
- Exclusive Deluxe Ears Headband & Jersey (2 wearable items)
- Exclusive Deluxe Furniture Set (8 decoration items)
- Exclusive Deluxe Wall & Floor Coverings (2 decoration items)
- Exclusive Deluxe Design Motifs (3 motifs to use in the Touch of Magic tool

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Disney Dreamlight Valley: Ultimate Edition includes:
- Access to Disney Dreamlight Valley
- All the exclusive cosmetic items from the Standard and Deluxe Edition
- 20,000 Moonstones
- Exclusive Ultimate Regal Fox animal companion
- Exclusive Ultimate Clothing Set (2 wearable items)
- Exclusive Ultimate Ears Headband and Jersey (2 wearable items)
- Exclusive Ultimate Furniture Set (13 decoration items)
- Exclusive Ultimate Wall & Floor Coverings (2 decoration items & 2 color variants)
- Exclusive Ultimate Design Motifs (3 motifs to use in the Touch of Magic tool

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless
summary: The next chapter in the Disgaea saga. In Disgaea 7, the story is set in a world called "Hinomoto Netherworld Cluster," which is inspired by Japanese culture.

name: Disney's Animated Storybook: The Lion King
summary: This game let's you revisit Disney's The Lion King in an interactive storybook format with a selection of scenes from the movie. Each scene has narrated text and the characters and landscapes can be interacted with to trigger short animations. It also features three minigames: Simba stalking Zazu, drawing picures in the stars, catching bugs for Timon.

name: Dilan
summary: Based on Indonesian novel of the same name by Pidi Baiq.

name: Divine Duel
summary: Divine Duel is a VR fighting game that mixes Sci-Fi and Fantasy themes with crazy weaponry. Step inside the arena and defeat your rivals using a combination of over 40 weapons, spells, and summons at your disposal.

name: Disdain
summary: DISDAIN is a fast-paced, visceral retro-styled first person shooter, inspired by the legendary FPS games of yesteryear.

name: Disney's A Bug's Life: Active Play
summary: Laugh and play as you buzz through the fun-filled world of bugs. You'll be bug-eyed with excitement at all you can do as you scurry through this world of tiny creatures. In addition to lots of playful activities--a board game, puppet show, and swarms of surprises--your friend Flik is counting on you to help him save the colony by finding items he needs to build a grasshopper-keeper-outer invention. So get ready for a really big adventure into the tiny world of bugs. Hop to it!

name: Distant Bloom
summary: From a world in ruins to a world in bloom. This serene management game lets you explore an alien planet where things have gone amiss. Harness the power of plants to restore the environment and build a flourishing community with your crewmates.

name: Dimwarper
summary: Dimwarper is an Icy Tower type of platformer, where You play as a mysterious character, who gained an ability to swap between two dimensions. Your task is to climb seven towers, controlled by seven wizards with different powers. This journey will require from You great focus and speed. Good luck!

name: Divinus Vanitas
summary: This multiplayer souls-inspired spell-casting game sees you collecting equipment and finding new spells to help on your journey of proving your worth to the gods, and redeeming yourself from the cardinal sin of mortality. Explore the floating island and unravel the secrets of the fragmented world.

name: Dirt Journey: Nitro
summary: Join this Dirt Journey thorough the dirst racing in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Disney Illusion Island
summary: Join Mickey & Friends on a quest to explore the mysterious island of Monoth and recover three mystical books to save the world from disaster! Choose your favorite character and unlock special abilities as you perform high-flying platforming feats, solve fun puzzles, and take on epic boss battles. Run, swim, swing, and jump your way through a beautiful yet mysterious island and discover rich biomes, intriguing characters, and hidden secrets!

name: Division of Labour
summary: Division of Labour is a dark comedy management sim. In it, you take the role of The Manager and run a factory in a developing nation. You must make a tidy profit while making moral decisions to balance the welfare of workers against the demands of Overseer Corp.

name: Discolored 2
summary: All the colors have gone missing from the world. While on a mission to bring them back you discover you are being hunted by those who would see the colors banished. Your only hope is a woman in red who may be holding the key to preventing the world from becoming discolored.

name: Dice Guy
summary: You are Dice Guy. Evil everyday objects have taken over the world. FARM plastic crops and AUTOMATE factories to refine the plastic into weapons and armor. After arming yourself you will be ready to face a world full of enemies, bosses and secrets...

name: Dim Tower
summary: Equipped with a "magic lamp", the "Prince" aims to reach the top of the ruined tower in order to find out where he came from with his own "Shadow". What is the reason for the destruction of the "Dim Tower", and what is the true identity of the "Prince"?

name: Dismal Reverie
summary: Dismal Reverie is a short FMV puzzle about a woman trying to escape from her reality. Or is it just a dream?

name: Division
summary: Division is a sci-fi adventure game. The whole world became strange, the place we live seem to be falling apart. A girl named YI will embark on an incredible journey.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel
summary: Dire Destiny: Time Travel is a deck building game set in a steampunk apocalypse.

name: Disco Tomb
summary: Disco Tomb is a sci-fi retro FPS / boomer shooter made just like the good ol' days! Use magic spells and guns to fight your way through huge waves of enemies in freaky dungeons or out in the open desert against the hordes of the invaders! Oblivion awaits!

name: Distorted Echos
summary: After crashing into an Alien planet called Yolk, You find yourself oblivious and left alone with your AI companion , Find your way through the unknown ,Discover the mysteries of Yolk and find out what happened to you and everyone else.

name: Dire Fog: Tactical Card Combat
summary: Dire Fog combines the best of PVP turn based tactical combat and PVP deck building games. Construct a deck and then play it out on a grid, moving cards into position to outwit your opponent. There are no shuffling or random effects in the game, victory is only possible if you outplay your enemy.

name: Distress
summary: Lieutenant Huchess came to, an hour or so ago. That was around the time Runoma, blazing orange-hot so near this, its second planet, fell below the distant, jagged crag line. Ensign Covegn died not long after -- Sandra Marie Covegn, both legs crushed under the weight of the pod's torn hatch. Night came quickly, bringing with it cool and howling winds that whistle through desert rocks and carry other, more dangerous sounds.

name: Disney's The Little Mermaid
summary: A second handheld Tiger Electronics game based on The Little Mermaid, released in 1993.

name: Dice Versa
summary:
Dice Versa is a logic game inspired by Uno, Dominoes and Tetris. It’s deceptively simple to play:

Drag dice onto the board.
Complete rows and columns to score points.
Adjacent dice must have the same color or value.

name: Dismantled 2
summary: Dismantled 2 is a survival horror game, and is the sequel to Dismantled. The game will see new characters involved in the story, 4 years after the events of the first game.

name: Dig Dug
summary: A handheld port of Dig Dug by Gakken.

name: Die Hard 2: Die Harder
summary: Die Hard 2: Die Harder is a cancelled Sega Master System game based on the movie of the same name. The game was developed by Tiertex and meant to be published by Grandslam in December 1991, however after not meeting the release cycle it was "indefinitely postponed" in mid-1992 because Sega had concerns with the quality of the game.

name: Dig Dug
summary: Dig Dug is a 1-2 player arcade game in which you have to use your shovel to dig your way through the earth. Stopping you from doing this are two monsters, called Pooka and Fygar, who will continually chase you around. The only weapon that you carry is an air pump, which you can use to inflate the monsters to the point where they explode. (if you start to inflate them but stop doing so, the monsters will get turned back to their normal selves). Furthermore, rocks are scattered throughout the earth, and you can use these rocks to squash them. If the monsters do not find you for several seconds, they will eventually get turned into ghosts, which can walk through the earth. They are invincible and cannot be killed. From time to time, vegetables will appear in the center, and you can get these for points.

name: Dig Dug
summary: Dig Dug is a 1-2 player arcade game in which you have to use your shovel to dig your way through the earth. Stopping you from doing this are two monsters, called Pooka and Fygar, who will continually chase you around. Stopping you from doing this are two monsters, called Pooka and Fygar, who will continually chase you around. The only weapon that you carry is an air pump, which you can use to inflate the monsters to the point where they explode. (if you start to inflate them but stop doing so, the monsters will get turned back to their normal selves). Furthermore, rocks are scattered throughout the earth, and you can use these rocks to squash them. If the monsters do not find you for several seconds, they will eventually get turned into ghosts, which can walk through the earth. They are invincible and cannot be killed. From time to time, vegetables will appear in the center, and you can get these for points.

name: Dig Dug
summary: Casio PV-1000 port of Dig Dug.

name: Dig Dug
summary: Sord M5 port of Dig Dug.

name: Discovery Tour Bundle by Assassin's Creed
summary: Immerse yourself in the Viking Age thanks to the Discovery Tour:

name: Diavolo no Daibouken
summary: Diavolo no Daibouken is a free Japanese fangame based off the manga JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. It is a simplistic graphical roguelike that stars Diavolo, the main villain of part 5 of the manga.

name: Dinoblits
summary: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Dirty Land
summary: A videogame about being a real estate salesman in the 80s

name: Disembowel
summary: Disembowel is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. You are a reporter who travels around the world documenting the darkest secrets and mysteries that inhabit the planet. Prepare your camera, gather a team and start suffering.

name: Dice Wars
summary: Dice Wars is a unique new turn-based strategy game from Powerise Interactive. Using nothing but dice and a randomly generated territory map made of hexagons, the game is similar in gameplay to that of the board game, Risk, though much simpler and quicker to play. The objective is to conquer all territories and eliminate all your opponents by attacking them with dice.

name: Disney
summary:
The Disney TV game is a Plug It In & Play TV Game developed by HotGen and published by Jakks Pacific in 2004.

A GameKey version was released a year later in 2005, in a Super GameKey Combo Pack with a GameKey. It was compatible with "DY" GameKeys.

name: Disney Friends
summary:
Disney Friends (also known as Disney II) was a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005. It is the sequel to the original Disney TV game from 2004.

The unit comes in the regular version, and the GameKey Ready version, in a Super Value GameKey Mega Pack.

name: Disney Princess
summary:
The Disney Princess plug-n-play TV joystick was a Jakks TV Game released in 2005 by Jakks Pacific.

The unit is also GameKey ready, compatible with the "DP" GameKey (only was was released).

name: Disk NG 1
summary: Includes King & Balloon, Tank Battalion, Warp & Warp, Galaga, Bosconian and XVM the last of which is exclusive to this compilation.

name: Disk NG 2
summary: Includes Galaxian, Pac-Man, Rally-X, Dig Dug, Mappy and SHM, the last of which is exclusive to this compilation

name: Die Daddy Die
summary: Die Daddy Die is a 3d adventure and platform game in which you control a slime thrown by a Cosmic God, capable of deforming his body at will, solving traps and situations that arise in order to continue advancing.

name: Disasters
summary: Disasters is a strategy simulation in which you have to avert an impending disaster. Collect research points and spend them on rules to avert disaster. It's up to you whether humanity and planet Earth will survive or whether everything will be destroyed.

name: Dialogue
summary: Dialogue is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named AI and it plays like a traditional fangame where the main goal is to collect effects (called "Props").

name: Diddy Kong Racing: GoldenEye
summary:
This is a 4 level track pack featuring GoldenEye textures, sounds, and assets. The levels included are:

Temple: Replaces Ancient Lake.

Basement Archives: Replaces Fossil Canyon.

Surface: Replaces Jungle Falls.

Runway: Replaces Hot Top Volcano.

name: Digit Factory
summary: 《Digit Factory》 is a game that allows you to give full play to your creativity and enjoy the fun of thinking. Design your own pipeline to perform calculations on various combinations of numbers. In the endless demand, find a design that responds to changes with the same. Come , challenge your mind!

name: Disney Princess: Magical Adventures
summary: Disney Princess: Magical Adventures is a plug-n-play TV game which is the sequel to the original Disney Princess TV game containing five games released by Jakks Pacific and developed by Handheld Games, LLC. in 2006.

name: Disney Princess: Cinderella - Once Upon a Midnight
summary: Disney Princess: Cinderella - Once Upon a Midnight is a Plug It In & Play TV Game based on the movie developed by Handheld Games LLC and published by Jakks Pacific in 2007.

name: Diabolik Lovers: Limited V Edition
summary: Port of Diabolik Lovers: Haunted Dark Bridal for Playstation Vita.

name: Diabolik Lovers More, Blood Limited V Edition
summary: A port for PS Vita.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Scar's Kingdom
summary: The first major content update for Disney Dreamlight Valley is here! Meet and team up with one of the Pride Land’s most well-known villains, Scar, to bring back the Sunlit Plateau to a green and vibrant state. Open the new Star Path and progress your way through to unlock tons of new cosmetics to help you express your villainous side.

name: Disparate Realities
summary: A set of 9 slaughtermaps designed to be played from pistol starts. 10th map is an end map with no gameplay (MAP08).

name: Dimensions
summary:
5 maps designed for PrBoom+ complevel 9. Play on HNTR or HMP. I spent the vast majority of time working on HNTR and HMP for maps 01-03. UV is an extra special difficulty that most likely only I will find fun.

Maps31 and 32: These two maps are special bonus maps. Only UV is implemented for Map31. Map32 has HNTR, HMP, and UV implemented but I recommend almost everyone play HNTR on Map32.

Difficulty descriptions: HNTR: I dont really play slaughter/I rarely play slaughter

HMP: I like slaughter maps but it definitely isnt my primary focus.

UV: I love going up against overwhelming odds, fighting tens (sometimes hundreds) of cybs/viles at a time, pain elemental swarms, Reality category of speedrunning.

Due to the nature of these maps I recommend playing with infinite height off in ZDoom based ports due to the flying monster behavior mixed with high ceilings. These maps were designed for PrBoom+ cl9 which has vanilla flying monster behavior.

Because of my mapping preferences play in software mode for best visual results!

name: Divine Dawn
summary: Divine Dawn is an adult role-playing game following an ambitious would-be hero, balancing story, sex, characters, and combat. Customize your character, romance humans and monster girls, and evade or embrace otherworldly powers.

name: Divinity
summary: A Mystery Puzzle game in First Person. You are a strange visitor in a family. Can you reveal their deepest desires and help them reach divinity?

name: Dire Vengeance: Deluxe
summary:
In Deluxe:
- The Cape of Harmonia for Pandora
- In-game Soundtrack

Depraved cultists have opened a portal to the Dark Realm and a demonic invasion has begun! Pandora ventures into the depths of Hell to slay the dark powers who threaten to conquer the World of Light. Collect Soul Orbs to upgrade your abilities and uncover arcane weaponry hidden perilously in the deepest dungeons. Run, jump and slash your way through frozen wastelands, lava filled chambers and living caverns made of putrefying flesh as you do battle with hordes of condemned monstrosities. Defeat the many merciless masters of each stage to reach the final showdown with the Devil Herself!

name: Dicey Birdball
summary: Dicey Birdball is a strategy sports game where you manage a team of birds playing football. Roll dice and assign them to your athletes to maneuver, score goals, and earn seeds to improve your team.

name: Didactic Jesus Game
summary: An ideal game to read the Gospel in an original and fun way. You will play the role of Jesus to save the world from evil, and you will learn how much he loves you. Are you ready to know his path full of Truth and Life?

name: Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: 3rd Appearance Special Set for Warrior of Light and Y'shtola
summary: 3rd Appearance Special Set for Warrior of Light and Y'shtola

name: Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Samurai App. Set & 5th Weapon for Bartz Klauser
summary: Samurai App. Set & 5th Weapon for Bartz Klauser

name: Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Songstress's Garb Appearance Set & 5th Weapon for Yuna
summary: Songstress's Garb Appearance Set & 5th Weapon for Yuna

name: Disciples II: Rise of the Elves Gold
summary: This version features all of the campaigns found in the original game and a brand-new mini campaign not found in any other editions of Disciples II, which consists of the 3 maps and continues the storyline of the Elven Race. It also includes 14 new skirmish maps to test and hone your skills.

name: Dizzy Rogues
summary: Dizzy Rogues is an auto-runner roguelike with "turn" based combat. Bounce your weapon off enemies and objects, rack up your combo, and purchase unique items.

name: Dig-Rock: Documentary of Youthful Sounds
summary: Dig-Rock: Documentary of Youthful Sounds is a visual novel developed by MintLip and published by Altergear.

name: Digimon World: Next Order
summary:
Digimon World: Next Order is a role-playing game set in an open world environment and played from a third-person perspective where players take control of a human character who is accompanied by two partner Digimon.

The player chooses from ten possible starting companions at the beginning of the game, who grow and evolve throughout the course of the story by taking part in battles and interacting with their owner. Players can increase the bond between their Digimon and themselves by praising, scolding, feeding, or offering items. Together, they travel through various environments completing objectives and advancing the story by interacting with non-player characters and battling enemy Digimon they encounter in the field. Battles themselves take place in real-time when an enemy creature is touched, which causes a circular-shaped battle area to appear which each partner is free to move within. The companion Digimon act automatically through an assigned AI strategy while the player can halt combat to issue commands or use restorative items. Players can switch between either partner in battle to issue specific commands or instigate a special evolution where both Digimon temporarily merge. After battle, their Digimon's stats are increased, making them stronger.

A total of 217 obtainable Digimon creatures are available in the Japanese version of the game. with a further 15 added to the western version of the game, taking the total to 232.

name: Dino Trauma
summary: Dino Tauma introduces you to a secret laboratory somewhere in eastern Europe where gore and dinosaurs isn't unusual thing. Retro FPS inspired by the '90s legends.

name: Dice Game
summary: Dice Game is a 2D game in which you have to fight in a deadly dice game.

name: Digital Frida
summary: Digital Frida is a roguelike arena game in stylized 2D graphics.Welcome to the online virtual reality server "Digital Frida", where you can become whoever you want, do whatever you want and be wherever you want!

name: Disquiet
summary: Disquiet is a multiplayer co-op game (up to 4 players) where you and your friends became ghost hunters.The main goal of each mission is to identify and potentially exterminate the ghost using hunting equipment that is upgradable with experience points.

name: Dice Quest
summary:
Throw your dice, build your kingdom and become a legendary warrior! In Dice Quest, you need to use both your dice, wits and luck to defeat the Dark Lord and his followers!
The local alchemist, Jasper the Wizard will grant you spells and arcane powers that will help you further along on your quest towards endless riches.
Through strategic and exciting turn-based battle, you'll need both skilful dice throws and magical powers to turn the tides of battle in your favour!

name: Dictator-chan island
summary: A military man who, drunk, signed up for an impossible task. So skillfully avoids dirty and hard work that he did not even learn how to shoot for all the time he served in the army. A lover of parties and girls seems to have gotten into trouble this time. But he's a good guy, help him get out.

name: Divinity Fatum
summary: The protagonist wakes up in a cold rainy city not remembering anything. The city seemingly goes on forever, and the protagonist takes up searching for other beings. In her quest to find another person, she comes along many clues concerning a mysterious girl named Sophia, who is apparently also trapped in the endless city, and her own identity.

name: Dino Force
summary: A horizontal shoot 'em up that was previously unreleased.

name: Diamonds on the forest
summary: A short platformer game with an increasing difficult and some cool graphics.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Missions in Uncharted Space
summary: Shrink down to toy-size and meet its iconic heroes, Buzz Lightyear and Woody. Help Woody learn the magic of childhood memories and assist Buzz as he enlists the support of Dreamlight Valley's residents to establish its first Star Command outpost. Embark on a secret Valley mission that just might see the Village gain a new resident that is truly out of this world. Get your Valley into the spirit of the season with new and exclusive items included in the Festive Star Path!

name: Disney DVD Game World: Disney Dogs Edition
summary: Disney Dogs is a DVD game starring Mickey Mouse, Pluto, and many more Disney characters.

name: Disney Classics: Master Mouse - Show Time Quiz
summary: Disney Trivia Challenge, Disney's Master Mouse: Show Time Quiz is a quiz game where all the questions are based on Disney films, characters, songs etc. This is a game for one to four players, there are no computer opponents here, with three levels of difficulty. Each player selects a character, there are just four to choose from, enters their name and then the game begins. It takes place on a screen that represents a film studio, players take turns to click on a spinner which tells them how many squares they can move. Apart from the first move the players can move in any direction and the game highlights all possible moves for them. Each space on the game board is a different colour corresponding to the question category, Animation, Film, Song, Personalities and Mousellaneous, and all questions are multiple choice. If a player gets the question right they spin again and attempt another, if they get it wrong the next player takes their turn and so on. If a player lands on a space that is already occupied then there is a challenge question, all players on that square can take part ans tokens can be both won and lost. There is also a trivia vault where the player(s) can gamble one of their tokens for the vault's entire contents. Each time the player answers a question correctly they are awarded a token in that category, or in some cases a wild card token, and when five tokens have been logged for a category the player wins a medallion in that category. The object of the game is to collect a medallion in every category and at which point they will be allowed to attempt the champion question to win the game.

name: DIG: Deep In Galaxies
summary: DIG is an Action Roguelike for going solo or joining forces with up to 4 players. Get overpowered and blast your way through ever-changing scenarios to defeat The Overlord and restore freedom. Give'em hell in this galactic revolution!

name: Dissolved: Chapter One
summary:
If there are feel-good games, well Dissolved is a feel-bad game. You play as a girl whose weird psychosis is to turn every ordeal in her life into a video game. It's a mix of completely new gameplays, fun and very challenging, parodying old arcade games.

Each control scheme is very simple, often one or two buttons, but unsettling at first. How to fight space gopniks shooting from the sky if you can't shoot back? Well, simply strike through their projectiles until your reach them. And if you find yourself unarmed against armies of cops, you can always use their own dead bodies as projectiles.

name: Disney's The Hunchback of Notre Dame: Topsy Turvy Games
Disney's Toy Story
summary: Game Boy port of Disney's Toy Story.

name: Disney Hotshots: Disney's 101 Dalmatians
summary: Disney Hotshots: Disney's 101 Dalmatians is a video game in the Disney Hotshots series.

name: Disney Princess: Sleeping Beauty - Tales of Enchantment
Dicewars DS
summary:
Dicewars DS is a multiplayer version of a strategy glash game Dicewars for the Nintendo DS handheld console.

It was submitted for the NEO Summer Coding Compo 2007.

Your task is to conquer the whole game field by rolling dice. Each turn you may attack any opponent's territory from one of your adjacent territories as long as your territory has more than one die on it. When attacking, If you roll more than the defender, you win. At the end of each turn, the greatest number of adjoining territories you have is calculated, and you are awarded a bonus of that number of dice, which are placed randomly on your territory.

In the network game mode, you will need at least 2 players to start a game. The player starting up the game will decide the minimum and maximum amount of players. If the players wish to start the game before waiting for maximum amount of players (up to 7 players at once), the rest of the slots will be filled with CPU players.

name: Disaster Band
summary:
Let's get the party started! Play solo or connect with your friends, pick a track, choose your instrument and start playing. The fun never stops: Import your own tracks and prove that you and your buddies are not going down in history as the ultimate Disaster Band.

With the creative freedom to play any note at any time, you can practice and improvise in absolutely every song while you explore the music. Don't forget: Practice makes Perfect. And of course, perfection leads to higher scores. But where is the fun in that? With Disaster Band's dynamic sound engine even playing the wrong notes leads to neverending fun and entertainment.

name: Discover the Ocean
summary:
The ocean: A world of mystery and secrets. But what lies beneath the surface?

Discover the Ocean - brought to you by the Ocean Exploration Program

name: Dismal Passages
summary:
In Dismal Passages you are cast in the role of a youth who lives in a land called 'Drelg Artavia', which is being harrowed by evil Wraiths from the NetherRealm.
In the grisly text introduction, your home is invaded during the night by three wraiths who attack and kill both your parents and your sister, but before they can kill you too, a grey wolf-like character interrupts the assailants and manages to drive them off, while itself is mortally wounded.
Using it's last breath, the wolf asks you to get revenge on the head wraith called 'Vaargerold' / 'Vaalgerald' for the death of himself and your family, and you set out next morning to achieve this.

name: Dig Dug Remix
summary: A bundle including Dig Dug Arrangement (2005) and the original Arcade game.

name: Die Känguru-Verschwörung
summary: Achtung, Achtung! This retro platforming movie tie-in for "Die Känguru-Verschwörung" is only playable in German! Zis is not a drill!

name: Divine
summary:
di^ine is a Yume Nikki fangame made in RPGMaker 2003 for the 2019 Dream Diary Jam.

Fall asleep to see through Astrum's eyes and wander through her vision.

name: Disorder
summary: Disorder is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Sophia, a girl who does not want to leave her room. Like most fangames, the goal is to collect all the effects in the dream world.

name: Digital Messiah
summary: A combination RPG and arcade game for the Mac.

name: Disorder
summary: A Doom II mod with 10 maps.

name: Dick Killer
summary: "Dick Killer" is a trash horror game! A mix of horror and comedy... style old horror movies like "Scary Movie", Totally over the top.

name: Dice: The Dice Game!
summary: An bootleg of Irem's unreleased game "Dice Dice Dice," in which you push and roll dice while contending with enemies.

name: Disney Princess: The Princess and the Frog
Disney Fairies: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure
Disney Fairies: Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue
summary: Tinkerbell was a little too curious about humans. She got too close and was captured by a little girl. Now her fairy friends fly to the mainland on their latest adventure the Great Fairy Rescue. Join Tink to learn lessons about friendship; and find out how their new human friends learn to stop doubting and just believe.

name: Disney Princess
summary: Cinderella needs to find a gift for her Prince and the Beast needs help with making sure that Belle has fresh flowers all year long in these magical stories. With each princess starring in her own story, children will have so many choices in how they build their pre-reading skills including reading comprehension, alphabetical order, capital and lowercase letters and so much more.

name: Dinky Rinky
summary: Dinky Rinky was an Adobe Shockwave game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Mario Party 2 on the Nintendo 64.

name: Diddy Kong Racing DS: Timber's Balloon Pop
summary:
Diddy Kong Racing DS: Timber's Balloon Pop was an online Flash-powered advergame released by Nintendo to promote Diddy Kong Racing DS. It was listed along with other Nintendo-related web advergames in the Nintendo Arcade section of Nintendo's official website.

The player takes control of Timber, with Diddy Kong himself only making a cameo in the introductory screen. A mugshot of Wizpig is used as the game's icon in the Nintendo Arcade, though he is not present in the game.

name: Disgusting Puzzle
summary: Disgusting Puzzle is a puzzle game designed for people over 18 years old. The game is very simple, you have to collect a picture, which consists of 20 elements. With successful assembly a button will appear with the transition to the next level.

name: Disney Hot Shots: Disney's Tarzan Jungle Tumble
summary: A rip-roaring romp through the jungle. Use speed, skill and strategy to help Tarzan navigate three devious obstacle courses while avoiding his enemies.

name: Digital Exorcist
summary:
While everyone is celebrating the coming of the new year 1999, retired Digital Exorcist Sawyer and his computerized partner Tomodachi run into a grisly scene that will make this jaded investigator remember all the old techniques he learned at the agency.

Travel into a world where cyberdemons live all around us in this Adventure Game/Visual Novel inspired by Snatcher and The Silver Case. Do you have what it takes to become a Digital Exorcist?

name: Disney Hot Shots: Disney's Terk & Tantor Power Lunch
summary: Feast on fun in this fast-paced feeding frenzy. Terk and Tantor are hungry and have invited all of their animal friends over for a jungle feast. Devour all the food before Kerchak and Sabor spoil the party.

name: Dig!t
summary: There are three simple rules + one secret rule. Tap on an empty field to fill it with a number. Each tap increases the existing number by 1. Adjacent boxes filled with a number increase each other.

name: Dirt Racing 2 Sprint Car Game
summary:
Experience the Speed, Drifting, and Fun of all-out arcade Sprint Car Racing 2!
This is not your usual old school top view racing game. Sprint Car Racing is fast paced, slide around corners just as they do in real life. Win sprint car coins to upgrade the Engine of your car, or even better purchase faster and better sprint cars. Sprint Car Racing fun to it's extreme!

name: Dice World: 6 Fun Games
summary:
6 great dice games in a friendly gaming community for everyone to enjoy!
As always it is completely accessible to the visually impaired, allowing EVERYONE to play on a level playing field!
The fun going viral around the globe! Join in and meet new people while playing new dice games!
Includes Farkle, Yatzy, Pig, Threes, Balut and 1-4-24! Easy tutorials for all games!
Play friends, play tournaments, play funny computer players, play online or offline, play however and whenever you want. On YOUR schedule!

name: Dice Fight
summary: 3D graphics, online multiplayer, intuitive controls, and spells and charms lead you on an exciting journey through the ancient orient! Get it now to enjoy the classic fun of throwing the dice with a hi-tech touch!

name: Dices Toss: The Falling Eight Count
summary:
Dices Toss will test your reflexes the hard way, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to keep tapping on falling dices to score more points.
Sounds simple? It's not!

name: DimensionalDoors
summary: DimensionalDoors is a mod about manipulating dimensions and exploration. You can use its doors to connect and travel between any two locations instantly, even across dimensions, or to create your own pocket dimensions, isolated from the rest of the world. There are also doorways to seemingly endless dungeons, waiting for anyone to happen upon them.

name: Diesel the Pug Warrior
summary: Help Diesel as he joins forces with his best friend Fred, as they try to save the Kingdom of Everlyn from the evil Luna and bring peace to the land once more in this adventure RPG!

name: Disgusting Puzzle 2
summary: Disgusting Puzzle 2 is a puzzle game designed for persons over 18 years old. The game is very simple, you have to collect a picture, which consists of 20 elements. With successful assembly a button will appear with the transition to the next level.

name: DizzyRoids
summary:
Are you up to the challenge? How long can you play before you are completely dizzy?
A totally new twist on a retro classic, DizzyRoids takes the old school fun of shooting asteroids and flips it on its head.

name: Dinogen Online
summary: Action-packed 2D multiplayer top-down shooter. Play as a human or dinosaur with hundreds of weapons, game modes, and maps!

name: Differences
summary: Find the differences between the two pictures! Explore beautiful locations, solve mini-games and puzzles. How many differences can you find? Take the challenge, begin your hunt and spot the differences!

name: Digimon: Digital Heroes
summary: A Digimon platformer fan-game. You can play as every (partner) digimon from the original Adventure & Adventure 02! Each character is able to perform a physical attack and a ranged skill. Most of them also have abilities like flight or swimming.

name: Digimon Chronicles: The Alpha Chosen
summary: An action-platformer fan game based on the Digimon anime series, created by SE77E in 2019. Only the first episode was released, before he jumped into another game called Digimon: Digital Heroes.

name: Dice Dreams
summary:
Welcome to Dice Dreams!
Roll the dice on Dice dreams, build your magical kingdom and become the Dice King!
Start your board game adventure and join your friends in this dice quest.
With every roll of the dice, you can earn free coins and expand your kingdom. Every dice roll starts a new dice adventure filled with fun and excitement!

name: DiggerSim
summary:
DiggerSim - Virtual reality Excavator & Heavy Equipment Simulator.

DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully manoeuvre your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

name: Digimon
summary: A Flash adventure game developed by Delaino Barris and formerly hosted on the Fox Kids site.

name: Dirt 3: Monte Carlo Track Pack
summary:
Monte Carlo Track Pack is a DLC for Dirt 3 featuring a new track with several routes located in the Alps.

This DLC was later included into Dirt 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Ken Block Special Pack
summary: Download the Ken Block Special Pack and receive a customized and upgraded Ford Escort Mk II, an Open Class Rally car sporting a killer Ken Block livery.

name: Dirt 3: Mud and Guts Car Pack
summary:
The Mud & Guts Car Pack is a downloadable content pack in Dirt 3. It can be purchased via the Xbox Live Marketplace for 480 MSP, or the PlayStation Store for $5.99. Each of the vehicles are also available separately.

Featured cars

Lancia Stratos
Peugeot 205 T16 Evo 2
Citroën C4 Rallycross
Ford Mustang GT
Saturn Sky

name: Dice Hero: The Unoriginal Story
summary: Roguelike game where you build up your character to defeat monsters. Use dice as energy to attack and collect items and blessings. Explore worlds and defeat bosses to unlock new progression. Choose your path and playstyle, you never know what's around the corner.

name: Dirt 3: X-Games Asia Track Pack
summary:
X Games Asia Track Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring two racing circuits located in Shibuya,Tokyo. These tracks were previously featured in DiRT 2.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Power and Glory Car Pack
summary:
Power and Glory Car Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring 5 new vehicles each with 5 liveries: BMW M3, Lancia Delta S4, Ford Focus ST, Scion tC, and Chevrolet Camaro SSX Concept.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Mini Gymkhana Special Pack
summary:
Mini Gymkhana Special Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring a Mini Cooper S customized exclusively for Gymkhana events.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Colin McRae Vision Charity Pack
summary:
McRae Vision Charity Pack is a DLC for DiRT 3 featuring a single car with a selection of 5 liveries: Ford Escort Mk2. The vehicle is designed for the 70s Rally Class.

This DLC was later included into DiRT 3: Complete Edition.

name: Dirt 3: Horn Pack
summary: Download 6 new Horns and let your rivals know you're coming for them!

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The next chapter in the Disgaea saga. In Disgaea 7, the story is set in a world called "Hinomoto Netherworld Cluster," which is inspired by Japanese culture.

The Deluxe Editions includes:
- The physical game
- Digital soundtrack
- Mini art book

name: Dive to the Abyssal Void
summary: Uncover the secrets of the mysterious and enigmatic hole that has appeared on the planet where the character we manage lives, our goal is to go deeper into the mysterious hole as an investigator and solve the mystery waiting to be uncovered by overcoming all kind of obstacles!

name: Dig Dig Boom
summary: Dig Dig Boom is a turn-based puzzle platformer with chess-like physics. Combine mining techniques to explore an underground world of riches. Every ore is a test of problem-solving and an opportunity to die to poorly placed dynamite. Blast through randomized caves, handcrafted caves or make your own!

name: Distant Sun
summary: A sci-fi game based on character dialogue and choices. Uncover the mysteries of Pioneer Station by attempting diplomacy and seeking peace or gunning through those that stand against you. The decisions you make will have an impact on the ending.

name: Divided Skies
summary: Divided Skies is a Third-Person Flight combat game where you play as an outlawed Cyborg who flies around on a Hover bike to complete several missions where you fight a private military force owned by the rich in this divided Eco futuristic Mumbai in the year 2100

name: Dice & Spells
summary: Dice & Spells is a 2D hand-drawn dark fantasy game based on combat mechanics using random incidents. Immerse yourself in turn-based gameplay and progress through the levels, upgrading heroes and dice. Face the undead mythical creatures, and don't die too fast. Are you willing to take risks?

name: Digital Virus
summary: Digital Virus is a side-scrolling 2D parkour platformer. You play as an antivirus that tries to keep your computer free of malware.

name: Disavowed
summary: Disavowed is a Metroidvania that allows the player to freeze time and set up pinpoint shots to stun enemies. It is set in a world of plush and cute creatures where the player has been cast out and needs to go on a journey to gather more strength and get back at his creator for tossing him out.

name: Dirty Horror
summary: In this game you and/or your team are investigators who investigate places full of paranormal activity and rid them of any malevolence. Collect clues about activities and carry out rituals to cleanse the area.

name: Disaster Area
summary: Disaster Area is a stylized game that includes online combat and campaign mode. In the campaign mode, players will be brought into an unknown disaster. You will fight with your teammates to break out of the encirclement of horrible unknow creatures and explore the source of the disaster.

name: Digital Pierrot Museum
summary: Digital Pierrot Museum is a free virtual museum presenting the experience of navigating through a museum of digital and multimedia art through VR and Windows platforms.

name: Diced Pilot
summary: Diced Pilot is a 2D action game containing old-school platform-based movement/jump timing challenges, physics-based surroundings, jetpacks, and weapons that can destroy everything in sight!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Pride of the Valley
summary: Take a step through the castle’s next doorway and get ready to take in the beauty of the Lion King realm! Not only will you get to immerse yourself in a brand new, mysterious storyline as you explore this realm, but it will also mark Simba and Nala’s introduction to Dreamlight Valley. And was that a new... recipe we spied? Only time will tell! With two more new faces to look forward to welcoming to your village, here's hoping Scar behaves himself...

name: Digs
summary: Defend your valuable chest in randomly generated maps with various towers, traps and obstacles to modify the path that the enemies must follow in "Digs", the ultimate rogue-like tower defense game. Experience unique mechanics, upgrade your defenses and face off against challenging enemies

name: Dirty Dirty Pirates
summary: Ahoy! Dirty Dirty Pirates is a chaotic, local multiplayer fighting game, set in a looped battleground of madness.

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Invasion of the Buffet Snatchers
summary: Rude aliens have arrived to sample Earth's legendary all-you-can-eat buffet, and they're sending a smorgasboarding party down to YOUR dining room. Can you assemble and deliver their plates of food before the aliens wreck the restaurant?

name: Ding Dong Delivery
summary: The paperboy is all grown up and has graduated to delivering hot slices of pizza around town. Take control of a huge variety of vehicles, from tanks to boats and all in between. Dodge traffic and deliver as much food as you possibly can!

name: Diceheart
summary: Diceheart is a roguelite dungeon-crawler with turn-based tactical dice battles. Delve deep into the Quantum Realm, gather powerful reality-bending items, upgrade your dice, and conquer luck itself!

name: Distributor Simulator
summary: Distributor simulator is open world, third person game. Here you have to buy goods al lowest possible price and sell and deliver it to shops for higher price. Price is changing so buy and sell carefully, otherwise you will bankrupt.

name: Directive 8020
summary: Earth is dying and humanity is running out of time. 12 light years from home, Tau Ceti f offers a small sliver of hope. When the colony ship Cassiopeia crash lands on the planet, its crew soon realize they are far from being alone. In space, death takes many forms.

name: Disc Saga: Dragon's Immorality
summary: First entry of the first Disc Saga series.

name: Disc Saga: The Treasure of the Sleeping Forest
summary: Second entry of the first Disc Saga series.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Festival of Friendship
summary: The Update 3 for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings Mirabel (from Encanto) and Olaf (from Frozen) to the Valley and unravels the mysteries from the Frosted Heights biome. Some quality-of-life improvements and a Star Path inspired by Disney's 100th anniversary is also part of the update.

name: Disc Saga: Burning Sword!
summary: Third entry of the first Disc Saga series.

name: Disc Saga Extra Edition: The Tower of Muda
Disc Saga: Iraisha wa Monster?
summary: First entry of the second Disc Saga series.

name: Disc Saga: Nagisa no Baka Taisho
Disc Saga: Yukemuri ni Kieta Bijotachi Yume no Naka e Rendezvous
Dino V. Xeno
summary: Dino V. Xeno is a casual, simple, yet deeply crafted tower defense game, in which you can enlist 10 upgradable dinosaurs, plus 14 additional special towers, to battle alien invader hordes. With randomized elements, 51 levels and 12-16 hours of gameplay, DVX is a tailor made for tower defense lovers.

name: Disaster Dash
summary:
In this runner, you must avoid disasters such as tornadoes, fires, lava, aliens, and zombies!
Jump to avoid harm and collect coins to unlock other disaster modes.

name: Dino Rush Race
summary: The sequel to 2010's Dino Rush, your goal in Dino Rush Race is to eat fruit to keep your energy high and go faster while dodging obstacles and flying predators. Use powerful boosters to get faster, defeat opponents from all over the word, and break new world records. Players can create levels, share them with others, and play these custom levels.

name: Dinodon
summary: A huge monster got into a residential city and destroys entire neighborhoods! All the military equipment of the city is put against him, but nothing can save them. from the fire of an angry monster.

name: Dice is the Way
summary: Dice is the Way is a deck builder roguelike card game with a twist: you can change ANY number on the screen when you using the Roll The Dice card. Roll the dice, this is the way.

name: Dirty Mind
summary: Mike is trapped in his own nightmare and needs to survive to wake up. just like in real life if Mike runs out of his medicine he will start to see strange things, so he must manage his resources well

name: Digital ez LG
summary:
A bundle of NES games released in some models of LG Electronics TV around 2008. Most games are actually bootleg versions of famous NES games, with lots of aesthetic changes (and some gameplay changes in some cases). There are two exclusive games: LG Chess and Quick Brain.

The games are:

- Soccer (Nintendo World Cup)
- Block!! Block!! (Arkanoid)
- Baseball (Baseball)
- Laser Man (Bomberman)
- Body Capsule (Dig Dug)
- Mobile Racing (Excitebike)
- Battle Star (Galaga)
- LG Chess
- Space Rocket (Star Force)
- Pocket Ball (Lunar Pool)
- Tennis (Tennis)
- Little Star (Antarctic Adventure)
- Perfect Puzzle (Magic Jewelry)
- Quick Brain
- Car Racing (Road Fighter)

name: Disney's Animated Storybook: Toy Story
summary: Part of Disney's Animated Storybook series, this game adapts the 1995 Pixar movie Toy Story into a point-and-click adventure format.

name: Divimera
summary: Divimera is an adult visual novel/dating sim game with point-and-click and sandbox gameplay. It is set in a Victorian fantasy world inspired by the work of H.P. Lovecraft and contains strong language, some elements of horror and a lot of pornographic images and animations.

name: Dinosaurs Dominion
summary: Explore and conquer in this single-player dinosaur adventure where you fight, evolve, and conquer territories to reclaim the wilds. Each conquest brings progress, but death sends you back to the start.

name: DiktaPunk: Fighting for Dominance
summary:
"DiktaPunk: Fighting for Dominance" A game where you can embody your favorite character or the worst to fight against your opponent, will you be more Joe Biden, Kim Jong-un or Vladimir Putin?

In Diktapunk, Fighting for Dominance, every character is unique and has its strengths and weaknesses.
Be ready to fight with the all-time most powerful (dangerous, craziest, creepiest, Bring-Your-Own-Adjective here...) people of this world. From Kim to Biden, passing by Zelensky or Putin, discover their style and secret techniques to win. Play the piano with your member, use an AK47, make a cringey speech, or dance Gangnam Style on a giant rocket: the choice is yours and there's a lots more to discover!

name: Disaster Detective Saiga: An Indescribable Mystery
summary: A tale of unnameable calamity by a fiercely unlucky detective! A comical occult horror adventure!

name: Dino Puzzler World
summary: Dino Puzzler World is an awesome, interesting and family friendly puzzle game for every Dino Maniac!

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Q.P.I.D.
summary: Rescue cats! Collect hearts! Defy the laws of physics! Q.P.I.D. is part platformer, part physics puzzler, part race against the clock. Did we mention the cats?

name: Discounty
summary: Manage your own discount supermarket! Get caught up in small-town drama, organize and plan your shop's layout, and strike lucrative trade deals as you expand your secretive aunt's business empire. Selling more frozen fries will surely heal this broken community...right?

name: Diary of a Step-Sister
summary: Diary of a Step-Sister is an otome game by Voltage.

name: Dino Surf
summary: Race to the finish with your favorite Webosaur in Dino Surf! Tilt your iPhone screen face up and down to maneuver through obstacles and jump over ramps. You can even run over arrows to get a speed boost, but don’t wipe out! If you make it to the finish line you can move on to the next level, and maybe even make the High Score board. Challenge your friends to play too and see who’s the best at Dino Surf.

name: Disco Zombie Fever
summary: Running, Racing and dancing on the dance floor just like dear old granny did. Avoid the smoking hot disco fans. Jump over the cool ( and zombie dead ) hand beat. Run past the graves of those dancing before you.

name: Divine Might
summary: Divine Might was a mythic fantasy side-scrolling dungeon-crawler game with state-of-the-art 3D graphics that rival those of PC and console games. The game was easy to play, featuring auto-battle and single-touch input.

name: Dice Survivor
summary: Unleash your inner hero as a dwarf wielding a massive dice adorned with runes and precious stones. Fight for survival in a perilous dungeon, forging walls of dice and imbuing them with magic. Discover the captivating story behind the creation of your powerful weapon. Can you emerge victorious?

name: Dinobot and Tiara Present: ApplePop
summary: Apple Pop is a super relaxing, super satisfying Puzzle Popper with powerups, beautiful scenery and major combo's for literally anyone to play to pass the time or to let off some stress.

name: Dinosaur Multiplayer
summary:
Use your special attack powers like energy ball, huge fire ball and ice attacks in arctic island and jungles with dinosaur fighting and hunting in battlegrounds. Amazing 3D jurassic environment with dinosaur online simulator game. and become the strongest of the t rex and survive in this simulator In dinosaur games 2018 huge collection of wild dinos like t-rex, tyrannosaur rex, stegosaurus, diplodocus, raptor, Spinosaurus and triceratops etc for ultimate fighting and rampage action.
This RPG sim game based on this summer’s epic action-adventure. Unlock to play some of the most frightful and brutal wild dinosaurs by completing levels and earning scores. These merciless and multiplayer t rex world vicious Jurassic creatures will give you a power in successfully completing more levels and having a thrilling experience. Play with friends in online fighting games and challenge real players to epic dino battles with dinosaur games simulator. Control your own customizable tyrannosaurus rex dinosaur and raptor. Collect all the magic & attack elements by gaining more health and craft your special abilities. Provided the game with high quality graphics and a 3D map to explore the Jurassic open world. Challenge other players in real time dinosaur fighting battle mode. Be the last dinosaur t rex or raptor to survive in the multiple locations. Let’s see how long you can survive and how strong can you be in best of dinosaur simulator games.

name: Disney Infinity 4.0
summary:
Disney Infinity 4.0 was to be an action-adventure sandbox game developed by Avalanche Software and published by Disney Interactive.

It was the planned sequel to Disney Infinity 3.0, and was initially slated for release in 2017, before it was announced in May 2016 that Disney was ending production of the Disney Infinity series, and the game was cancelled.

name: Disney Infinity: Toy Box
summary: The "Toy Box" mode from Disney Infinity 1.0 as a standalone game on Windows and iOS.

name: Dimensionless
summary: Dive into this platformer taking up the classics of the genre, bringing its unique touch where you will have to change color between black and white and vice versa to move forward!

name: Dirty Vampires: An RPG Tower Defence Adventure
summary: A Tower Defence RPG. Defend waves of enemies. Balance your strategy between economy and fighters. Earn gold in battle to upgrade your towers permanently. Earn XP to unlock hero perks. Shop in the town market to purchase powerful trinkets that change the way your fight.

name: DivineRPG
