summary: DivineRPG offers multiple Dimensions worth of content for you to explore. It also has many bosses for you to battle. Can you beat them all?

name: Dino Rocks
summary: Dino Rocks is a fun and challenging puzzle game where you guide a dinosaur through over 100 caves filled with crumbling blocks, moving platforms, colored keys, locks, and teleports. With simple cartoon graphics and clever mechanics, it’s perfect for players who enjoy smart, reflex-based puzzles.

name: Disney Classic Games: Aladdin, The Lion King and The Jungle Book
summary: Disney Classic Games Collection: Aladdin, The Lion King and The Jungle Book is a special collection for consoles and PC. Combining the retro action from fan-favorite 16-bit versions with new graphical enhancements, features and content, the Disney Classic Games Collection offers fans of old school gaming and classic Disney characters the best of both worlds.

name: Dirty Room
summary: First person shooter horror adventure game. As detective C, you arrived at an old friend's home and try to find out what's going on.

name: Diver Dash
summary:
Diver Dash is a fast-paced scrolling arcade game where you avoid sharks and mines on your endless descent to the ocean floor. Press the screen to stop the obstacles and dash through the gaps.
Compete with your Game Center friends and collect coins and clams to unlock all the wacky characters and themes. What are you waiting for? Dive in today!

name: Dino Fighters
summary: A fighting game featuring chibi dinosaurs, developed for Sega Genesis using Hamoopig & SGDK, by Juca Jacaré

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Ikkuro and Dhayut
summary: The Galaxy Expands! For the first time since the release of Distant Worlds 2, two new playable factions are joining the game – the peaceful Ikkuro and the devious Dhayut!

name: Dig Dug
summary: A cancelled ColecoVision port of Dig Dug.

name: Dinosaurily
summary: a queer dinosaur game about found family and affection !! with hugging and planting flowers and stickers

name: Din
summary: Din puts you in the shoes of Billy, a popular guy who everybody wants to talk to. Unfortunately, everyone wants to talk to him at the same time and will get upset if he doesn’t respond appropriately.

name: Dice Fantasy
summary: Dice Fantasy is a turn-based RPG grid fantasy action game from the Shock Price Advanced Series.

name: Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure
summary:
The portable version of the game Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure. The Game Boy Advance version moves to an isometric viewpoint, using the engine of the portable Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4.

Three worlds are included: Toy Story, Tarzan, and The Lion King, each with two levels and a boss fight. In the story mode, each level has 3 runs, each one unlocking more of the level. Characters are scattered around the level, and will give missions, for example making a difficult jump, or collecting items within a time limit. There are also time challenge (most points inside a time limit), trick challenge (match tricks), and turbo challenge (match kinds of tricks fast) modes for each level, along with a tutorial and versus mode. In versus mode, two players take turns (hot-seat) getting the best trick possible.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball V11
summary: Digital Diamond Baseball is a statistically accurate baseball simulator and tabletop board game companion.

name: Disney's Winnie the Pooh's Rumbly Tumbly Adventure
Disintegration
summary: A 2-minute game about a doctor's appointment.

name: Digit God
summary:
How fast is your brain? How quick are your fingers? Digit God will tell you.
Digit God is a digit-oriented game designed for your i-Devices. Do math at anytime and anywhere!

name: Disposition
summary: Race along a coastline as strange hostile entities chase you down. Try to reach your destination as fast as you can but don't lose control. Disposition is an attempt to combine racing with horror elements.

name: Digs Mini Icy
summary: Digs Mini Icy is a mini adventure starring Warf. It incorporates mechanics similar to old classics like Sokoban, but with uniquely designed puzzles and added features. Warf is stuck in an icy mountain and must find his way while collecting gems and overcoming various obstacles

name: Disney Superbia
summary: In Superbia, you are in control, your place, your friends, your rules! Why not decorate your own place, make your own ice cream sundaes, pick up new clothes or just chill out in your favorite Disney Channel area!

name: Dino Dash Party
summary: Dino Dash Party is a fast paced 4 player casual couch co-op/party game where you throw bombs, collect food and try to stay alive. Work together or compete against each other in a variety of minigames, add modifiers to change your game or try out our crazy wacky stages in our challenge mode

name: DieselDome: Oil & Blood
summary: DieselDome: Oil & Blood is a Survivors-like FPS with movement shooter mechanics. In every run, you will create absurdly powerful builds against hundreds of enemies at a time while facing the judgment of the crowd. It takes place in an original RomanPunk universe.

name: Discarded Empire
summary: Discarded Empire is a run-based deckbuilding game where each player turn is resolved by plummeting through a deadly 2D stage in a Sweeper mech with bottom mounted cannons to clear your path and slow your decent.

name: Dimensional Animals
summary: Five animal friends unite for one glorious purpose: recover the dog's... play ball? Explore beautiful dimensions in this metroidvania action platformer adventure!

name: Diets and Deities
summary: Diets and Deities is a rhythm game you can taste! Dodge, Dash and Deflect to the beat of absolute bangers and mash your way through YUMMY recipes you can cook at home!

name: Dinky Guardians
summary: The Dinkys are defenseless and the Zumbys are coming, join up with your friends (or by yourself), gather resources, build a colony with automated machines and keep the Dinkys safe!

name: DinoDash
summary: DinoDash is an action packed racing game set in a futuristic world where dinosaurs have been reborn as precious gemstones. After surviving extinction they race at high speeds on dangerous tracks to fill their adrenaline. Join this intense experience and see if you can become the DinoDash champion!

name: Diebrary
summary: Enter the Diebrary! Test your reflexes and wit in this fast-paced arena roguelike, where you must fight through thousands of enemies to make it out alive. Choose upgrades and power-ups to increase your chances of survival, then vote on new twists to spice up your next run!

name: Disk Dashers
summary: Plan trajectories, distribute energy, and outsmart your opponents in this simple but deep physics strategy game. Adapt to unusual environments and threats in singleplayer, or compete against opponents in strategic multiplayer.

name: Dirty Streamer Puzzle
summary: Live streaming sometimes turn even the quietest girls into dirty ones!

name: DinoPlanet VR
summary: Take a guided tour through your very own dinosaur zoo and see these extraordinary animals at their spectacular scale for the first time using VR headsets!

name: Digital Bojangles Saga HD Remaster
summary: Digital Bojangles Saga is a fan-made Shin Megami Tensei fangame that seeks to combine the fast-paced gameplay of mainline Megami Tensei with an unconventional story to deliver a unique experience.

name: Disco Dave
summary: Say hello to neon lights and funky moves! The disco fever begins with Disco Dave on the ever changing dance floor!

name: Die-Rise
summary: Shooter with light immersive sim elements. Fight your way to the top of a high-rise building.

name: Die Hard
summary: Die Hard is a third-person shooter. The player battles terrorists and rescues hostages in the Nakatomi Plaza, which is the setting of the first film in the series.

name: Die Hard 2: Die Harder
summary: Die Hard 2: Die Harder is presented as an on rails-shooter, where the player must stop terrorists who have taken over Dulles Airport from the second film.

name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
summary: In Die Hard with a Vengeance, the player goes on a joyride driving a taxicab, sports car, and dump truck throughout all of New York City and is tasked with finding and defusing several explosives before they can go off.

name: Disney Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Disney Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Disney High School Musical
summary: Relive the excitement of High School Musical anytime, anywhere with this compact handheld LCD game developed by Zizzle. Released in 2007, the game offers five built-in mini-games inspired by scenes from the hit Disney film. Players use physical buttons to navigate rhythm and memory challenges, all displayed on a classic black-and-white LCD screen. With character art and familiar themes, it’s designed for younger fans looking to experience the magic of East High on the go. No console required—just insert AAA batteries and start playing!

name: Disease Z
summary: On January 14, 2024, what we thought was the common flu turned into something terrible. It's been 6 years since then. You are the last survivor of Z City. Create, Build, Hunt and try to survive in a post-apocalyptic environment.

name: Die Rave
summary: Rave is a grim dark fantasy puzzle game where you play as a lost soul trying to find salvation from eternal suffering in the endless corridors of hell. You'll need to solve challenging puzzles and fight off enemies to progress through the game's immersive storyline.

name: Digits
summary: A daily numbers puzzle from The New York Times.

name: Dimension X
summary: F2P/P2E NFT game, built on the Flow Blockchain using Dapper wallet! ETH version coming soon!

name: Diamond Gems
summary: Simple and smooth game play, great music and amazing graphics. Three addictive game types in one, which brings you the ultimate gems blasting experience... plus more.

name: Disney Princess Cyber Arcade Pocket
summary: A handheld device with 150 games, 10 Disney's Princesses and 140 classic arcade games.

name: Digital Seclusion
summary: Isolated in a room repurposed into a personal shrine to esoteric Japanese media. Our nameless protagonist has dedicated himself to a collection of retro Japanese computer games, with a particular fondness for early visual novels. Although decaying in a slovenly existence to the untrained eye, his retreat into digital life is enriched by the scripted interactions with various charming 2D girls. His one purpose in life is to chronicle his thoughts and reflections on each of the digital worlds he immerses himself in. However, one day while pulling out the box of another visual novel to review, a girl leaps straight out of the cover art and begins interacting with him face to face. And perhaps most shocking of all to him, in a completely unscripted manner.

name: Dice Catcher
summary: Battle your way through the dungeon and collect back all of your magic dice!

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel-Gambler
summary: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Gambler within the game.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel-Mech Pilot
summary: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Mech Pilot within the game.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 4
summary: Dirty Room Chapter 4 DLC

name: Disney Speedstorm: Standard Founder's Pack
summary: Start your engines and hit the track with the Standard Founder's Pack!

name: Disney Speedstorm: Ultimate Founder's Pack
summary: Go full throttle in style with the Ultimate Founder's Pack!

name: Dig Deep: Chunky Pets
summary:
Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game - upgrade now!
Our new animal companions are here to take your gameplay to the next level by providing you with new bonuses such as increased basket capacity and faster experience gain. With Working animals DLC you'll be able to collect more items and level up faster than ever before!

name: Disney's Mulan Training Game
summary: Disney's Mulan Training Game is an Adobe Shockwave game made to promote the release of Mulan.

name: Diamond
summary: An Arkanoid clone.

name: Digit Monster II
summary:
Digit Monster II, also known as Digi Monster II (also sometimes called "Digimon" when included in multicarts) is a hack of Urusei Yatsura: Lum's Wedding Bell. In some versions, the music is slowed down.

The title screen has a strange, demonic-looking unofficial art version of Veemon from the Digimon series, and has the title "Digi Monster II". It also has two shooting stars and two options below in a box; 1 Player and 2 Players.

name: Diablo
summary:
Ànhēi Pòhuài Shén, also known as Diablo or Diablo II, is a backport of Diablo to the NES by Shenzhen Nanjing. The game is a turn based RPG unlike the real Diablo. The game's music has been taken from games such as Golden Sun.

Like almost all of Shenzhen Nanjing's games, dying in a battle will result in you going back to the title screen.

name: Digimon Adventure
summary:
Digimon Adventure (aka Digimon) is a bootleg platformer for the SNES and Game Boy Advance based on Digimon.

Digimon Adventure uses the same engine as Pocket Monster, thus the gameplay mechanics are the same. The game spans six levels, which include two boss fights. The only playable character is Agumon. The player can attack enemies by pressing A to shoot a fireball. Each level has a strawberry item that, once collected, transforms that the player into Greymon, who's fireball attack is much larger and stronger. Once the player loses all their lives, they're given a chance to continue, which seems to have no limit.

The game steals nearly all of its graphics from numerous other sources. Of all the levels, so far the only identified source is the background from the last battle being taken from Castlevania Dracula X. The sound engine and music are also stolen from Bonkers for the SNES, which, like the game engine, is also used in Pocket Monster and Pokemon Gold and Silver.

name: Digimon 2
summary:
Digimon 2 is a bootleg platform game by Makon Soft for the Game Boy Color.

The introduction and main menu song was taken from the original Digimon Adventure Japanese and Latin American anime theme intro. The intro starts with a picture sequence of Agumon evolving into Greymon, transitions into a short FMV sequence of Greymon firing a fire ball, then into a slideshow showing seven of the main human characters, and ends with a few screens of text, before showing the title screen and then the main menu. The intro is well done for a bootleg game, with accurate colors on part with what the system can handle (except for Mimi who has pink skin), a two second smooth FMV, and decently translated English text.

The player starts out playing as Agumon with three extra lives. Agumon can jump, and attack by shooting a fire ball from his mouth. On the first level, Betamon can be found as enemies.

name: Digimon 6
summary: Digimon 6, or Digital Monster 6, is a monster raising game originating in Hong Kong. In fact, it is the only unlicensed Game Boy game known to have originated in Hong Kong. Interestingly the game features metal connectors, which allow it to connect to official Bandai Digimon key chains for battles.

name: Digimon Crystal Version II
summary: Digimon Crystal Version II is a Digimon-based strategy RPG for the Game Boy Color. It was released in 2003.

name: Digimon D-3
summary: Digimon D-3 is a platform game for the Game Boy Color released in 2001.

name: Digimon Pocket
summary:
Digimon Pocket (called 數碼暴龍口袋版 on the title screen) is a bootleg game developed by Vast Fame for the Game Boy Color.

It is about Digimon trainers who have digital monsters fighting against each other. In the game, a Digimon trainer goes across several towns in the game. A Digimon trainer has a bedroom in his house, when one day a pink aurora portal teleports him to digital monsters world.

name: Digital Monsters 3
summary: Digital Monsters 3 (數碼暴龍水晶版3, also known as Digimon 3 Ultra Dream Version / Crystal Version and Digimon Ruby) is a bootleg game for the Game Boy Color, released in 2001.

name: Digital Exorcist Case_(0);
summary: Step into a dark world where cyberdemons haunt humankind. When mutilated bodies start appearing all over this sleepy town in the Mississippi inaka, Sawyer, ex-Agency operative; now unemployed shut-in, must exorcise the demon perpetrator in this story-rich, PC-98 style adventure game.

name: Dig2China
summary:
Dig through the center of the Earth in your backyard!
Upgrade your digger and plunge through 13 layers of the Earth to prove that if you dig deep enough, you really will make it to the other side. And make it back in time for dinner!

name: Disminal
summary: Wandering into the uncanny concept of liminality, captured in DV tape format you explore what seems to be another dimension, lost in an endless space that looks human-made but isn't.

name: Dippy & Chippy
summary: Join forces with your best friend and embark on a thrilling adventure as the two-headed ogre duo, Dippy & Chippy, in the ultimate two-player couch coop game of exploring dungeons and discovering treasures!

name: Divine Pearl: Survivors
summary: Divine Pearl: Survivors is a bullet heaven survival game set in a shounen anime world, unleash energy wave attacks and increase your power level on each new planet visited!

name: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut - Collage Mode
summary:
In Collage Mode, players have the ability to create and set the scene in and around Martinaise. They will have full access to characters, environments, effects, and custom dialogue to create the screenshots that they have always desired and fabricate completely new dramas from unforgivable punch-ups to fruity yet forbidden kisses.

Place and Pose – Place, rotate, and resize your favorite characters across the game’s painterly environments and then pick from a range of silly and sensible poses to strike.

Write Dialogue – Create a whole story with a single image by entering custom text that can be placed anywhere and even make it look authentic by using the FELD dialogue reel.

Be Aesthetic – Bring out your inner Art Cop by applying weird and wonderful filters; choosing from rain, fog, and snow; as well changing the time of day to capture the exact mood you’re after.

Stick ‘Em Up – Put gloves and guns in unsuspecting hands with a huge collection of items and clothing stickers or add extra style with new and extraordinary art from our talented collaborators.

Get Framed – Finish up by choosing a frame to wrap up your fantasy with audacious themes such as “Kim Catsuragi,” “F**k The World,” “Visual Calculus,” and “Building Communism.”

Bonus! Secrets to Find – Hunt for never-before-seen scenes from across Martinaise history if you’ve got a keen enough eye for it and enjoy a velvety new voiceover from the game’s narrator.

name: Diggy: Gold Rush
summary: You have a big mission! Help Diggy, the gold miner, dig deep into the earth and draw the path to find the hidden objects. In each expedition you can collect all kinds of items: gold, minerals, precious stones, special objects and much more! Use the ground digger and digging tools to help Diggy get rich!

name: Dice Soccer City
summary:
Build your Town. Pick your Squad. Roll the Dice, and Score!!
From the makers of Pixel People, comes a deep & charming game of strategy, luck and city-building, all rolled into one! As manager of a tiny colony's soccer club, you must assemble a team of local residents, use whatever skills they may possess, and bring home the glory you deserve.
Gifted with tactics, talent, and technology, you are destined for success – but a host of challenges stand between you and your fate!
Will you be able to attract enough players to your town? Will they be able to work together in winning combinations? Will you fulfil the dreams of becoming a Flagship City by winning the coveted Five Leagues? Who will you pick? Who will you drop? How far will you push them using the tools at your disposal? The choice is yours.

name: Diablo: The Hell 2
summary: The Hell 2 is a total conversion for Diablo, boasting a new renderer, many QOL improvements, more fine-tuned difficulty settings and tons of new content: ranging from new locations, quests, items and enemies to 36 total class archetypes.

name: Disney's Chicken Little
summary:
A New Hero Has Emerged!

Save the town of Oakey Oaks from alien invaders! Live the adventures of Chicken Little and his band of misfit friends, master an arsenal of gadgets and power-up and play as commander Ace.

name: Disney SpellStruck
summary: ourney to the Isles of Tiles with beloved Disney and Pixar characters and take on challenging crossword-style games in Disney Spellstruck! Flex your skills with Mickey Mouse, Tiana, Stitch, and others in a crossword-style adventure. Play with friends in online versus mode, complete daily challenges, and test your power as you claim the top spot on the leaderboards!

name: Disney's Brother Bear
summary: Disney's Brother Bear for the Game Boy Advance is a platform side-scrolling game with light puzzle/adventure elements that captures the story and character interactions of the Disney animated feature film of the same name.

name: Dinosaur Era
summary: Let's fight the dinosaurs ! With a powerful water jet stream, this game will give the players an amazing new water shooting experience.

name: Diamond Craze
summary: Get ready for an epic puzzle matching adventure. Slide and match tons of sparkling gems. Use crazy tools to whack crates, crack rocks and smash ice-cubes!

name: Dimraeth
summary: A 1-8 player fantasy RPG set in a handcrafted pixel world. Build your hero across 8 races and 6 classes. Explore ancient lands, master elemental combat, forge relationships, and shape a stronghold to call home. Fight for the fate of Dimraeth—together or alone.

name: Disgraced: Western Warfare Pack
summary: The Western Warfare Pack DLC for Disgraced brings several new weapons and gear from the West as you fight for justice in Feudal Japan against the evil Shogun!

name: Dimensions
summary: In the Multiverse everything is possible, so each level is another world, another universe, live this incredible adventure and at the same time go through the history of video games.

name: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut Bundle
summary: The ultimate edition of the groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city block to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders, or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

name: Dig Deep: Complete Edition
summary:
Grab a shovel and let's get digging! Join the adventure, hire miners and dig for a treasure.
Shovel your way to success: go underground and dig for treasure like a mole on a mission. But don't worry, you won't get stuck in a hole - unless you forget to hire workers to boost your digging empire.

name: Ding Dong Delivery 2: Pizza
summary: The retro 'Paperboy' is all grown up and has graduated to delivering hot slices of pizza around town. Take control of a huge variety of vehicles, from tanks to boats and all in between. Dodge traffic and deliver as much food as you possibly can!

name: Diablo IV: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Diablo IV is the next-gen action RPG experience with endless evil to slaughter, countless abilities to master, nightmarish Dungeons, and legendary loot.

This is only the beginning for Diablo IV, with new events, stories, seasons, rewards, and more looming on the horizon.

name: Diablo IV: Ultimate Edition
summary: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: Digscovery
summary: An artifact is just out of sight... why not dig for it!

name: Disney Speedstorm: Deluxe Founder's Pack
summary: Take the track by storm with the Deluxe Founder's Pack!

name: Dice Legacy: Definitive Edition
summary:
Roll and use your dice to gather resources, construct buildings, expand your settlement and face the menacing threats of a mysterious ringworld.

Dice Legacy Definitive Edition includes all the content from the original Dice Legacy release plus the three major updates.

name: Disney Tsum Tsum Stadium
summary: Tsum Tsum Stadium is a puzzle game where you have to compete against 50 rivals to see who can clear their characters off the board the quickest.

name: Die CD-ROM mit der Maus 1
summary: Playing, learning, puzzling, drawing and making music with the Mouse and the Elephant.

name: Die CD-ROM mit der Maus 2
summary: Playing, learning, puzzling, drawing and making music with the Mouse and the Elephant.

name: Die CD-ROM mit der Maus 3
summary: Playing, learning, puzzling, drawing and making music with the Mouse and the Elephant.

name: Dice World
summary: Dice World is a turn-based roguelike game. Create your own party by combining skills with character. You need dice to use skills, but you also need strategic dice choices depending on the situation. Collect relics and enhance your skills to defeat your enemies!

name: Dig Odyssey: Cosmic Mining
summary:
Explore the depths of a distant planet as a space miner in this exciting digging game! Dig deep and uncover valuable metals and precious gems as you search for the source of a mysterious signal.
A mysterious signal was received from the depths of the nearest exoplanet to Earth. An experienced miner was sent to investigate it. He has to become an astronaut and uncover the mystery of the signal.
Are you ready for an exciting adventure? Your task is to dig the soil and penetrate deeper and deeper until you find the source of the signal. The planet's crust consists of several layers of varying hardness, the mine contains many different metals and precious stones. Collect them - they are needed for crafting and upgrading equipment.
You have to dig quickly as you have a limited supply of oxygen! Improve your tools (pickaxe, drill, dynamite, etc.) to dig even faster!
With a limited supply of oxygen and challenging terrain to navigate, can you become the fastest ground digger and solve the mystery of the signal?
Best of luck!

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 5
summary: After knowing Dr. Q's whereabout, you rushed to an unknown graveyard...

name: Disasters Escape: The Island
summary: "Manage resources, face natural disasters, and save citizens from the island in "Disasters Escape: The Island". Show your courage and leadership skills in this engaging single-player strategy game."

name: Dicefolk
summary: Wield magical dice and build a team of powerful Chimeras to stop a mysterious evil in this tactical roguelite adventure. As a Chimera Summoner, recruit and create your perfect team of mythical beasts and command them to victory using unique dice mechanics.

name: Dice Craft
summary:
It is the first, real-time, strategic game to construct buildings by moving the board with dice, collect resources, and knock the opponent with bombardment and magic.
This is the real-time game opponent and I move at the same time.

name: Dinosaurs: Mission Dino Camp
summary: The schleich DINOSAURS have come to life and need your help! Find and rescue the legendary giant creatures while you an embark on an action-filled adventure deep in the amazon jungle.

name: Dimensional Dexterity
summary: Immerse yourself in the innovative gameplay, where the central mechanic revolves around the seamless shifting of Dimensions. With each shift, the world around you transforms, presenting new obstacles to overcome and hidden paths to discover.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Remembering
summary: In the biggest story update yet, uncover the mystery of the Forgetting in the Forgotten Lands Biome with help from a magical resident of the mysterious Pumpkin House. Journey through the Dreamscape—the dimension between Dreams and Reality—and experience epic story Quests alongside your Disney and Pixar friends in the Valley.

name: Diver Dogs
summary:
The evil Rocktopi have petnapped hundreds of puppies and dragged them beneath the ocean. It's up to Sharkie and the diver dogs to rescue them in time!
From the makers of GoNinja and ShaqDown comes a new action racing game for your mobile device. Master the art of drift boosting and use your racing skills to rescue lost puppies from under the sea and bring them to safety!

name: Digital Chain
summary:
Digital Chain is a short, mystery visual novel about 3 kids who explore a haunted school.

The game focuses on a supposed 'Haunted School' and an Incident that occurred there in the past. With your two friends, Shuhei and Hiromi, explore the Haunted School. Online there were claims of a ghost summoning ritual that allows you to speak with the dead using only your cellphones. They called this ritual, The Digital Chain.

name: Dismember Mind 3
summary:
The police have arrested Zoe for the murder of the couple who sold her to the Villa where she was all her childhood, now 4 years locked in a prison to experiment with people that society has rejected, something clouds Zoe's mind, feelings and pain, thanks to that he is able to survive this torment.

Here the argument arch of zoe closes.

name: Diener Dates
summary:
The good news is that you have gotten the chance to take over a prestigious diner, in a delightful location somewhere in the Afterlife! The bad news is that you died.

Diener Dates tasks you with running the diner of your dreams, a diner you would die for (literally). Customise the interior, purchase different types of food and make friends or enemies with the local clientele! Oh, did I forget to mention the customers? There are 8 charming customers that will visit your store regularly, so make sure to treat them well.

May the odds be ever in your flavor.

name: Diddl Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
summary: Solve puzzles of Diddl and friends in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Diesel Legacy: The Brazen Age
summary: Diesel Legacy is a 2v2 fighting game where four players battle on the same stage at the same time. This unique twist on the traditional fighting game formula adds an entirely new layer of strategy where cooperation will become the key to success. The fate of the city is in your hands!

name: Dignacia
summary: You are missioned to stimulate one of the planets in Dignacia Universe, Feed your animals and plant your seeds with using advanced technology. Upgrade your tools, explore the mysteries of the planet, dive into water, manage the city that you build and destroy bad creatures for bringing peace!

name: Dinogen Online: Commando Bundle
summary: Commando Bundle with 15 Shards, 3 Weapons, and 6 Character Items!

name: Dice Mayor
summary: Welcome to Dice city, new mayor. Govern your city with only dice. Dice Mayor combines dice rolling with city building in a roguelike setting.

name: Dimhaven: The Lost Source
summary: After several years, the team behind Quern - Undying Thoughts is back with new mysteries to unfold. Explore Dimhaven, solve mind-bending puzzles and uncover the truth behind the Ravenwood legacy in this first-person adventure.

name: Displaced Defense
summary: A turn-based, open world, class-based RPG. Explore the world and become stronger to get back home. Enjoy your time building your team to be the best they can be! Thank you for playing my first game release!

name: Dinosaur Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date? - 2 Winter of our Discontent
summary: Go beyond the dinosaur apocalypse in this DLC sequel to Dinosaur Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date?.

name: Dickland: Horror Quest
summary: Dickland: Horror Quest is a 2D quest, the main features of which are: black humor and graphics drawn with an ordinary pencil in an album and scanned afterwards. In the game you will find a lot of different puzzles, dangers and puzzles that you have to solve.

name: Dildo Catcher
summary: Dildo Catcher is a fascinating and colorful video game starring the charming Sofia. Her greatest passion is big dildos, which she is always eager to catch with her pussy and use to achieve incredible sensations.

name: Diablo IV: Crypt Hunter Pack
summary: Start your hellish journey through Sanctuary with the Crypt Hunter pack. The Crypt Hunter pack includes the Liath Icehowl mount, two weapon skin cosmetics Beginning's End dagger, Protean Axe, and 800 Platinum.

name: Divinity Arrival
summary:
Divinity Arrival is an idle role-play game based on global divinities.

Hundreds of glamorous divinities are waiting for you to collect and develop. Come to awake their inside divinity and found your own league. Ready to explore the sanctums around the world and search for the ancient relics with legendary divinities.

In this adventure, you’ll gradually gain the unrivaled power and create your own legends through challenging the throne of divinities.

Besides, the ingenious strategy is considerable important in each battle. As the leader of divinities, you’re expected to adjust your team according to each divinity’s divine power and links so that your team is invincible while conquering other divinities, even the hell and the heaven.

In addition, 24-hour idle rewards will be available through dispatching divinities to gain spoils of wars. You will definitely create your blissful garden of Eden in the end.

name: Dino Ranch: Ride to the Rescue
summary: Grab your hat and your lasso, it’s time to ride into a Dino-rrific adventure to save the Cassidy Ranch!

name: Difference Games
summary: Each level is comprised of two images which contain subtle differences. Don't worry though, if things get too hard you can touch the hint button to get a nudge in the right direction.

name: Disk-0 Madness
summary: You are a lone space-disk in an unfriendly territory, survive for as long as you can!

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Malignant
summary:
Corruption has befallen Sanctuary in Season of the Malignant, the first Season of Diablo IV. A deviant form of Lilith’s sinister machinations has given birth to a new threat, Malignant Monsters. These decaying abominations roam Sanctuary in a frenzy, mindlessly attacking anyone in range without hesitation. Wanderers will investigate this mysterious malady in a new Questline with the help of Cormond, a former priest of the Cathedral of Light, who also trains you to capture the Malignant Hearts fueling these foul beasts and convert them into build-altering powers. The malignancy that’s taken hold of the Burning Hells’ armies cannot remain unchecked—you must snuff it out at the source before all of Sanctuary becomes its thrall.

As you hunt down Malignant Monsters for their build-enhancing Hearts and partner with Cormond to discover the source of the corruption, you’ll earn rewards from the Season Journey and Battle Pass.

The Season Journey is broken into Chapters with tasks to complete. As you progress through the Journey, you’ll earn rewards befitting Sanctuary’s defender, such as new Legendary Aspects, a Mastery Title, and a Scroll of Amnesia, which provides a free Skill Tree and Paragon Board reset. The Journey also provides Favor—the resource used to climb through the Battle Pass’ Tiers—which is also earned naturally by playing the game, whether it be killing demons, completing Quests, and more.

The Season of the Malignant Battle Pass begins on July 20, 10 a.m. PDT and hosts 90 Tiers, 27 Free Tiers and 63 Premium Tiers. Smoldering Ashes are earned from the Free Tiers, which can be spent on Season Blessings that provide you with a bonus to earning experience, Gold, or Obols depending on the Blessing you choose. The bonuses gained from Season Blessings only last until Season of the Malignant ends.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 6
summary: You fainted after defeating the fat guy and can't recall what happened. The place just looks ancient ......

name: Die Siedler IV: Die Neue Welt
summary: The Vikings discovered America - the new world. But instead of claiming it for their own, they announce a regatta: Whoever arrives first in the new world, can keep it. Neither the Romans, Trojans or Maya say no to the challenge and each race has their own reasons to get to the promised land as fast as they can.

name: Die Siedler IV: Community Pack
summary: The fourth add-on to The Settlers: IV features over 60 new single- and multiplayer maps as well as four new campaigns which were all created by members of the community. The campaigns were inspired by historical events and tell the following stories.

name: Dishonored 2: Limited Edition
summary:
Reprise your role as a supernatural assassin in Dishonored 2. Play your way in a world where mysticism and industry collide. Will you choose to play as Empress Emily Kaldwin or the Royal Protector, Corvo Attano? Will you stalk your way through the game unseen, make full use of its brutal combat system, or use a blend of both? How will you combine your character’s unique set of powers, weapons and gadgets to eliminate your enemies? The story responds to your choices, leading to intriguing outcomes, as you play through each of the game’s hand-crafted missions.

The Dishonored 2 Limited Edition is a limited supply edition of the game (available by pre-ordering from specific retailers before the release date) that comes with additions. They include the following physical and digital rewards:

- A free digital copy of Dishonored: Definitive Edition, an enhanced version of the original title which includes all the DLC and features improved graphics
- Physical editions from participating retailers come with the Imperial Assassin’s Pack:
- Duelist’s Luck Bone Charm: bullet packs have an increased chance of holding one more bullet
- Void Favor Bone Charm: supernatural powers have an increased chance of consuming no mana
- Lore Book: A Musician’s Farewell
- Antique Serkonan Guitar
- 500 coins to use in black market shops

Retailer exclusives include:
- Best Buy: Dishonored comic book. (Also offers an exclusive The Royal Protector Bundle with Collectible Steelbook, Corvo Keychain and Dishonored: Corroded Man Novel)
- GameStop: a reversible mask
- Amazon: free Dishonored soundtrack

name: Dicentra
summary: You play as Basil, a young boy lost in forest of watchful trees and unfriendly guides. In a harsh storm, his only sanctuary is a seemingly abandoned mansion. He doesn't know if anyone or anything currently haunts these walls, but there is one thing he can conclude: He shouldn't have come here.

name: Disrepair
summary: Disrepair is a atmospheric horror mod that focuses around a lone combine hazmat worker. They have been dispatched to the radioactive ruins of Black Mesa to photograph visual evidence of the anomalies located in the faclity's office complex. Can they make it out unharmed?

name: Dimension Painter
summary:
Escape the maze with dimension pencil and save the gnome's planet in crisis.
Through the map editor, you can create and share your own game. Make your own game using various triggers and blocks. And compete with others.
129 stages! Various level of difficulty! If it's too hard, don't worry. We have walk through also!

name: Dinovaporate
summary: Delay the impending doom of the dinosaurs! Destroy groups of blocks by clicking. When falling magma blocks reach bottom you lose health and a vertical row. Upgrade your block level to convert falling magma blocks to normal blocks.

name: Dirt Track Racing Pinball
summary: Dirt Track Racing Pinball is an arcade pinball game based on Dirt Track Racing series. Gameplay is similar to other Wildfire Studios pinball titles and features two tables based on Dirt Track Racing and Dirt Track Racing: Sprint Cars games

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: DreamSnaps Update
summary: Summer is finally here – and so is new content for Disney Dreamlight Valley! Expect plenty of sweet surprises out of our DreamSnaps Feature Update, from a new Villager to new ways to earn Moonstones and other prizes. Vanellope, from Wreck-it Ralph, joins the Valley in this update.

name: Differlands
summary: A simple Spot-the-Difference can become a completely new game when combined with VR. Enjoy a Spot-the-Difference Game that goes beyond time and space! Only you and your sharp set of eyes can save the librarians of the Magic Library from their peril.

name: Dino World
summary: Embark on an exhilarating journey into a world where the heavens themselves tremble under the majestic wings of mythical beasts.

name: Dimensionals
summary: Dimensionals is an RPG that combines fast paced, action packed tactics with deep rogue-like replayability. Collect powerful heroes and fight epic bosses. Every run is unique, so equip your heroes carefully to pull off insane combos. Dimensionals is a total reimagining of the rogue-like genre!

name: Dimenders
summary: Dimenders is an online horror game playable in cooperative mode for up to 4 players. You and your team are recruited to investigate the emergence of portals linked to other dimensions. Your mission is to solve various puzzles to find the solution and close all portals.

name: Diehexegy
summary: Diehexegy is a hex grid turn-based 4x game with a unique twist: your armies are composed of dice. It has multiple victory conditions and straightforward gameplay. Challenge friends or fellow strategists in asynchronous multiplayer matches.

name: Dino Path Trail
summary: Dino Path Trail is a journey across a Wild West full of dangers in a world where dinosaurs have never gone extinct. Set up your camp and bring it along thanks to your classic western wagon towed by dinosaurs. Explore canyons, mountains and swamps and survive the harsh environment and predators.

name: Disney's The Little Mermaid: Ariel's Majestic Journey
summary: Take an exciting journey with Ariel, the beautiful and curious mermaid, and help make her dream come true! As kids explore the enchanting world under the sea, they engage in challenging games and activities that teach key school skills like vocabulary, counting, problem solving and more. Eight clever learning adventures take Ariel through her secret grotto, into a sunken boat and on a mission to save her trapped friends and her father King Triton!

name: Digital Ange: Dennou Tenshi SS
summary:
A simulation game developed by Koga Game Factory and published by Tokuma Shoten Intermedia for the Sega Saturn.

This is a reimagining of an earlier Super CD-ROM² game from 1994, Dennou Tenshi: Digital Ange.

name: Dickland: Racing
summary: Dickland: Racing is a two-player arcade action racing game! The main feature among such races is the amazing pipe world and the physicality of the game characters!

name: Dixie Kong Country
summary: A mod that replaces Donkey Kong with Dixie Kong, along with her gliding abilities.

name: DIY
summary:
DIY is a community project aiming to create maps out of solid color textures. It was originally conceived by xvertigox based on "One Bad Map" release.

The maps were ultimately arranged roughly in order of increased difficulty. By the end they turn very hard.

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Jollyball
summary: Making toys is hard work, and even Santa's elves need a break. Thankfully, the North Pole Elfletic League gives everyone at the Workshop a workout. The Winter Invitational is underway, giving all of Santa's helpers the chance to be crowned seasonal champions of the North Pole's most popular 2-on-2 sport: Jollyball. (It's like standard volleyball, only much cooler.) The teams are ready, the net has been set, the Power-up Presents are primed, and there's fresh snow on the court — are you ready to sleigh the competition?

name: Disintegration
summary: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. All difficulty levels are supported. Mouselook is recommended, but not required.

name: Disney's The Lion King: Simba's Mighty Adventure
Dirt Bicycle Rider Simulator
summary: Choose your bike, conquer the town and mountains! Test your skills in Dirt Bicycle Rider Simulator, packed with realistic graphics and exciting missions.

name: Disparity of the Dead
summary: Disparity of the Dead was originally created back in October of 2020 for the Dread X Collection 3. It is a 3d platformer / detective game hybrid in which you try to solve the mystery as to why people are dying and not showing up in the afterlife.

name: Dino Run
summary:
Roarrr! Welcome to the epic world of "Dino Run", where an unruly dinosaur is on the loose and won't stop for anything or anyone. Join our hilarious dino as he races through a prehistoric playground, dodging walls, fences and even crossing bridges like a boss!

You must watch out for those tricky corners! Make sure you turn correctly or face extinction! And what's more fun than demolishing obstacles? Smash those stone walls to pieces, not with your head (silly dinosaur!), but with mighty meteor showers! Take that, you pesky walls!

Devour delicious burgers along the way, run carefully and watch out for water, a dino can't swim (who knew?) Let's keep our dinosaur dry, shall we?

Are you ready for this wild dinosaur adventure? The fun is endless, just like our dino's world!

Go ahead, let's run like a dinosaur to victory! Rawrr!

name: Dig Girl
summary:
As the last surviving heir of your great uncle Ludwig, you’ve inherited his Bavarian castle and its underground treasures. It’s up to you to survive each level and find... the greatest treasure of all.
30-levels of ad-free, retro-style graphics and gameplay await. Supports game controllers, landscape and portrait orientation, and comes with a custom level editor.

name: Digital City
summary: Digital City is a novel simulator intended to support local authorities representatives and urban planners in their day-to-day work.

name: Diesel Mechs
summary: Physics-based demolition simulator with diesel mechs. Operate mechs and heavy equipment as if they were real. Learn how to effectively use the equipments in this physics-based environment.

name: Disruptive
summary: Immerse yourself in a first-person sci-fi horror experience, trapped in a desolate laboratory. Explore its dark corridors, unveil its horrors and find your way to survival, as you are stalked by atrocious threats. Question yourself, make decisions and discover your destiny.

name: Divine Guardian
summary: Explore the enchanted Vietnamese jungle, combat mystical monsters, and rescue creatures on your quest to challenge the gods and restore harmony to the Universe as the DIVINE GUARDIAN, immerse yourself in an epic 2D hand-drawn refreshing adventure.

name: Diamonds Mine
summary:
Arrakis Software's take on Boulder Dash, released on the Amiga in Poland.

The game has settings for difficulty and the number of starting lives. Some levels require specific use of new tools they added to the format while others challenge your reaction time, made harder by the screen scrolling slower than the you can move, as you attempt to evade enemies and hazards while collecting the required number of diamonds before reaching the exit.
There may have been a level editing program available from Arrakis as well.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 7 & 8
summary: Start final battle in an old city, Chapter 7 & 8 included.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Quameno and Gizureans
summary: The Galaxy Expands. The second Distant Worlds 2 expansion brings two new playable factions – the introverted puzzle-solving Quameno and the numberless and ruthless Gizureans.

name: Discarded Memories: Mysteries of the Past
summary: Andrew Connor always knew that there was more to the story of the death of his fiance. Now, on the accident's 10 year anniversary, he decides that he's going to get the answers he knows are out there, no matter what. Explore the clues to discover the answers that nobody thought would be found.

name: Diamond Rush
summary: Diamond Rush is the simplest 3D game in which you have to overcome various traps and look for diamonds.

name: Discovering Endangered Wildlife
summary: An interactive program endorsed by David Bellamy, designed to help children and parents learn about animals and wildlife in danger of becoming extinct.

name: Distribution Center
summary: Distribution Center is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using the GZDoom source port. It was designed by Blake Collins (Rayzik) and uses the music track "The Imp's Song" by Robert Prince. Distribution Center was originally created in 2016 for the Vine Mapping Contest 2016, where it went on to win first place, and was publicly released in 2017.

name: Discordia by Iron Games
summary: In 'Discordia', you develop your city by building farms, barracks, defenses, harbors, and markets, and by trading with ships. Use your seamen, soldiers, merchants, and farmers profitably, fulfill decrees, and secure privileges — acting carefully at all times so that your city grows neither too fast nor too slow. Will you have the best-developed city at the end of the fourth year and score many points, or will you manage to impress the empress before then and win the game early?

name: Diablo IV: Season of Blood
summary: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: Dissent on Mars
summary: A sci-fi life sim where you create new societies unlike anything on Earth. Design your economy and government, build your colony, and experience your choices firsthand by living as a colonist. Will your society become a living utopia, or another dystopia?

name: Dirt Bike Racer Simulator
summary: Get realistic motorcycle experience on offroad terrains with Dirt Bike Racer Simulator! Complete quests, explore the open world, and enjoy the adrenaline-filled ride.

name: Disciples of Varahces
summary: Disciples of Varahces is a roguelike where you fight waves of increasingly stronger enemies, gathering items along the way to grow stronger yourself.

name: Dirty Texts: Are You Sure?
summary: In "Are You Sure?" you play the role of a husband who, wanting to spice up their sex, convinced his wife to try a one week open marriage adventure. During this week you and your wife will test different things and see if this will improve your relationship or destroy it.

name: Dirty Texts: Melissa's Secret
summary: In "Melissa's Secret" you play the role of a man whose girlfriend's daughter, Melissa, decided to start a JustFans page. A platform which she uses to sell sexy pics of herself. Since you're the closest thing she has to a male role model, it's your job to talk her out of it.

name: Dirty Texts: New Intern
summary: In "New Intern" you play the role of a man who's the CEO of an important marketing corporation. The game starts when a new employee, Sophie, takes a position as your intern. It's your responsibility to guide and groom Sophie to become a successful, productive asset for the company

name: Divine Shock
summary: Swing, smash, and combo your way through the dead. Divine Shock is an infinitely scaling first-person rogue-lite, where you are a Paladin, standing between the dead and the mortal realm.

name: Dimension Omega
summary: Explore, survive and escape the numerous levels of Dimension Omega in order to return to the real world in a creepy, liminal and eerie First-Person-Singleplayer experience while avoiding various terrifying entities that lurk in the shadows, waiting for you...

name: Dinosaur Assassin: I-Evolution
summary:
​On your Dinosaur Assassin journey you’ll require a host of weapons and a variety of ways to travel through this dangerous world.
You can build up your weapons to include: Pistol Crossbow(Explosive Arrows), Compound Bow, Proximity Mines/Gas Canisters, Handgun, Rifle.

name: Dive On
summary: Dive On is an Action game, developed and published by Min, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Dinobreak
summary: Dinosaurs have returned in this retro survival horror crisis.

name: Diary of Lucie: Hammer Weapon Pack
summary: New Weapon: Hammer 13 types of weapons and 14 types of related weapon characteristics are added.

name: Dino Hunt
summary: Dino Hunt is 3D first person shooter, made with Javascript, WebGL and Pointer Lock API. Start your journey as dinosaur hunter. Make money by hunting dinosaurs, upgrade your character and weapon.

name: Dino Hunt 2
summary: Dino Hunt 2 is a next release of 3D first person shooter, made with Javascript, WebGL, Pointer Lock API and and Touch Events API. It should work in mobile browsers with multitouch and WebGL. Start your journey as dinosaur hunter. Make money by hunting dinosaurs, upgrade your character and weapon.

name: Discarnate
summary: Immerse yourself in the chilling ambiance of the 1970s, an era that witnessed the surge of amateur paranormal investigators. Step into their shoes in Discarnate, unearthing authentic demonology lore and summoning a world where malevolent entities lurk. Your task? Bring them to light and banish them.

name: Dirappen Restoration
summary: The planet has been overrun! Play as the lone Dirappen Soldier Unit D6-4 in its epic quest to defeat the alien invaders and restore the planet of Darptha to the rightful rule of King Darpon.

name: Disrepair
summary: Disrepair is a 9 (10 counting secret) map episode that makes use of G/ZDoom enhancements, including, but not limited to, DECORATE monsters, 3D Floors, and Scripted Events. There is also a Survival Mode included, which changes seven of the maps into an endless horde mode with some slight objectives.

name: Disrepair 2
summary: Disrepair 2 is an 11 map episode for GZDoom that expands upon the ideas and themes of my original Secretdoom episode "Disrepair" and transforms it into a new expansive world. This mapset features new monster types, new music, new textures, and of course new maps .

name: Die in the Dungeon: Origins
summary: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and discover the story behind Die in the Dungeon!

name: Digit Dare
summary:
Dare yourself in this challenging puzzle game.
Digit Dare is a fast puzzle game where you can prove yourself and grow your skill to finally feel confident and competent at mental math.
Solve nine puzzles before the time runs out or play the relaxing Zen mode to train your brain. Dare to ascent the tough pyramid and improve yourself with gold medals along the way. See your progress while completing quests, collecting stars and gaining new levels.

name: Dice Crypt
summary: Dive into Dice Crypt! A thrilling digital board game where you and your friends compete to conquer a mysterious dungeon. Roll the dice, face monsters, loot treasures, and outwit rivals. Will you conquer the crypt?

name: Disc Station 98 #00
summary:
Software compilation for early Disc Station series, limited interaction on the third disc.

The First Disc is Prince of Perisa
The Second Disc is PowerMonger

name: Disc Station MSX #01
summary: Early Disc Station compile.

name: Disc Station 98 #1
summary: Early Disc Station entry. Includes demos for Regional Power and Toushin Toshi.

name: Disc Station #09
summary: Disc station compile marking the swap to CD, features much more content than the previous compile works.

name: Disc Station MSX #02
summary: MSX Disc Station Compile.

name: Disc Station MSX #03
summary: MSX Disc Station compile featuring some demos including a Baseball and Godzilla game.

name: Disc Station MSX #06
summary: MSX Disc Station compile with Xyzolog.

name: Disc Station #11
summary: Last PC-98 Disc Station compile.

name: Disc Station MSX #08
summary: MSX Disc Station Compile

name: Disc Station #12
summary: First PC available Disc Station game featuring a version of Madou Monogatari.

name: Disc Station MSX #09
summary: Disc Station MSX compile with a lot of demos.

name: Dinosaur Island
summary: Dinosaur Island is an interactive story developed by Game Arts and released for Saturn and Windows 95, created by Izumi Takemoto.

name: Disc Station MSX #11
summary: Disc Station compile, features Valis II demo.

name: Disc Station #15
summary: Disc station compile featuring many videos.

name: Disc Station 16
summary: Disc station compile with a few full exclusive games.

name: Disc Station Vol. 17
summary: Disc Station compile game.

name: Dirty Aim Trainer VR
summary: Dirty Aim Trainer is designed to make transitioning from no VR FPS mechanics to a more experienced VR player. Review your stats, custom playlist fit to your weaknesses, up to 25+ levels & 15+ playlist, and a leaderboard with the top players and inclusive settings to make training fit your style.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Enchanted Adventure
summary: This update for Dreamlight Valley adds a Beauty and the Beast Realm to the game, two new characters (Belle and the Beast), new quests for The Forgotten, the Haunted Holiday Star Path and the return of Halloween Dreamlight Duties.

name: Dicey Dungeons: Halloween Special
summary: Dicey Dungeons: Halloween Special is a extra levelpack containing three episodes. Halloween Special sees Warrior, Inventor and Witch back into a new horror themed dungeon, with three new enemies, returning enemies with new costumes, two new locations, and new scary music.

name: Diver
summary: Net Yaroze game by Nahoisa Kamei.

name: Dishonored 3
summary: Dishonored 3 is the upcoming third entry in the Dishonored series. The title was leaked in court documents relating to the FTC v. Microsoft case.

name: Dino
summary: Recreate Chrome's offline dinosaur game on Playdate, in Rust.

name: Disco Samurai
summary: Disco Samurai is a unique rhythm combat game in a cyberpunk setting. Challenge your skills by smoothly combining attacks, parries, dashes and other abilities to the beat of the electronic music. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying soundscape of synthwave and rock!

name: Disney's The Haunted Mansion
summary: A cancelled port of Disney's The Haunted Mansion for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Disney Junior Ready for Preschool: Forces in Motion
summary: Work with Spidey and team to stop Rhino while you learn about different types of Force.

name: Diet Family
summary: Diet Family is an "Unique! Fusion Shooting Game!!!", at least according to the advertising flyer. The game's official description for the Game Rating Board is more humble, it bluntly calls the game out a Galaga clone, which seems to be the more appropriate version. One or two players shoot cartoony enemies in front of abstract, non-scrolling backgrounds. It is possible, though, to move in all 4 directions, contrary to Galaga's restrictive horizontal only movement.

name: Divemensions
summary: Divemensions is a 2D Puzzle Platformer.... just that the levels are not actually 2D! In this game you'll need to move between the layers of the world to overcome various challenges! Get ready to solve puzzles by understanding the 3D layout of the levels or create your own with the level editor!

name: Disaster Golf
summary: Disaster Golf is a new, fast-paced take on golf that requires you to react on the fly. Experiment with many combinations of natural disasters to navigate the golf ball through wild and diverse courses as fast as you can!

name: Diceomancer
summary: Diceomancer is a roguelike deck-building game. Despite aspiring to live a peaceful life, fate forced you to embark on an adventure. Make the most of your deck and dice in a world filled with swords, magic, and guns, all to restore the tranquility you once knew!

name: Dice Assassin
summary: Dice Assassin is a challenging game where you defeat enemies on the board according to the dice numbers. Choose attacks using cards, position yourself strategically to overcome enemies on the board, and devise tactics using action cards.

name: Digitris
summary: In the best tradition of the worlwide known Russian puzzle game, Digitris will test your agility and dexterity. Align digits so their sum equals a target sum that increases at each level, making the game increasingly difficult.

name: Die drei???: Das verfluchte Schloss
summary: A new case leads Jupiter, Peter and Bob to an abandoned castle where a ghost is up to mischief. But the three detectives soon discover that there is much more to this spooky story than initially assumed - The new Wii game will be released in spring 2009 to coincide with the start of the new feature film by the cult detectives, "The Three ??? - The Cursed Castle". can replay Wii. The exciting location Schloss offers numerous partially hidden rooms to explore and many tricky puzzles and exciting tasks to solve. Quick reactions, knowledge and logical thinking are required to solve the mystery.

name: Disgaea 7: Glasses Costumes Set
summary: Adds a set of 7 unique character costumes (glasses).

name: Dino 3D
summary:
Get ready to embark on a thrilling prehistoric adventure like never before in DINO 3D!
This exciting video game takes the beloved classic offline game to a whole new dimension, bringing the endless runner experience into the immersive world of 3D.

name: Die Bücher Luzifers
summary: Die Bücher Luzifers is the second game of German RPG Maker developer Kelven and is yet another horror game. While influcenes of Silent Hill and Resident Evil do exist in this one, they're more subtile and the plotline and world do feel a lot more unique, then in the first game.

name: Die Bücher Luzifers 2
summary:
Die Bücher Luzifers 2 is the sequel to Kelven's Die Bücher Luzifers.
The player is once again tasked to find the origin of all the demonic chaos happening, this time in New York City. The gameplay stays close to it's predecessor while improving the graphics and letting the battles themselve take place in the actual environment, instead of a special arena for each fight.

Unfortunately the game was cancelled after it's demo release in 2003.

name: Divinity Hunting
summary: A turn-based combat strategy game, looking for the magical skills left by the ancient immortals.

name: Dinosaur King: D-Team vs the Alpha Fortress
summary:
The third entry of the arcade machine series, where you fight with dinosaurs with a rock, paper, scissors enhanced system.

A continuation of the previous story. The D-Team continues on their work of stopping the Alpha gang's intentions, by destroying all of their fortresses, but then, in the middle of their mission Rex went captured, now, being the main focus rescuing him from the Alpha gang, while you notice that they kept with the experiments seen on the previous game.

name: Divine Frequency
summary: A bewildering tale of a trashcan hobo's rise to becoming the universe's most effective security software.

name: Diggy Diggy Dwarf
summary: Rise like the hero when your teammates need it, survive monsters, search for treasure, smelt, forge and create in this game like no other. Will you become the richest and strongest dwarf? Can you manage to be the best by reaching an unmatched status of greatness among the dwarves?

name: Die 3
summary: Die 3 is a story driven game about Dave, a barber who has an obsession to make people kill themselves. After he succeeded making an innocent boy taking his own life, he is on the search for a new victim.

name: Die drei ??? Das Geheimnis der Geisterinsel
summary: "Die drei ???: Das Geheimnis der Geisterinsel" is an adventure game based on the eponymous cult novel. Investigator Justus, Bob and Peter are heading to South Africa to help set up a theme park. But suddenly the construction work is paralyzed by a mysterious monster. Play detective and combine the different skills of the three. So you will solve the puzzle.

name: Die drei ??? Das Geheimnis der Toten
summary: A mystery game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Dino King Battle: Taiko Kara no Hyouryuusha
summary: Dino King Battle: Taiko Kara no Hyuuryuusha is a TCG game for the Nintendo DS system developed by Skonec Entertainment and published by Taito Corporation. It was released exclusively in Japan on August 24 2006, and it was a port of a Korean arcade game from 2005 made by Netdol and D-Gate known as Gongyong Wang (공룡왕 lit. Dinosaur King. It was known as King of Jurassic in Southeast Asian countries and in Taiwan, China and Hong Kong). Despite Gongyong Wang being released by Taito in some Asian countries, Dino King Battle: Taiko Kara no Hyuuryuusha remained as a Japan-exclusive game.

name: Diddl in the Cheesecakeland Diddl en Diddland
Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Instructor, Steward, and Fallen Angel of Love
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Valvatorez - Fenrich - Flonne

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Delinquent, Curry Lover, and Lady Overlord
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Raspberyl - Usalia - Girl Laharl

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Hothead, Princess, and Dreamer
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Adell - Seraphina - Fuka

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Honor Student, Final Boss, and Ex-President
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Mao - Desco - Axel

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Zombie Sibs and Angel Little Sister
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Zed - Bieko - Sicily

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Special Weapons Set
summary: Adds a set of 9 types of weapons that will help your characters grow.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Pleinair Completion Bonus
summary: Adds Pleinair as a playable character and save icon.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Overlord, Demon Lord, and Sheltered Girl
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons.

name: Die, Pablo!
summary: The world famous chef Louis is mad! He animates all sorts of inanimate objects to attack the restaurant critic Pablo for an alleged bad review of his restaurant. Luckily, Pablo likes playing tower defense games and knows exactly how to defend himself!

name: Dice to Meet You
summary: A cute, casual puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning with every turn of the dice.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Kind Demon, Singing Princess, and Thief Angel
summary: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Killia - Melodia - Artina

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Season Pass
summary:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Bonus Story: The Overlord, Demon Lord, and Sheltered Girl
- Bonus Story: The Hothead, Princess, and Dreamer
- Bonus Story: The Honor Student, Final Boss, and Ex-President
- Bonus Story: The Instructor, Steward, and Fallen Angel of Love
- Bonus Story: The Kind Demon, Singing Princess, and Thief Angel
- Bonus Story: The Zombie Sibs and Angel Little Sister
- Bonus Story: The Delinquent, Curry Lover, and Lady Overlord
- Pleinair Completion Bonus

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Costumes Set
summary: Adds a set of 7 unique character costumes (from previous games in the series).

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Includes the following:
- Disgaea 7 game
- Cosmetic Set
- Special Weapons Set
- Starter Support Set

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Complete Edition
summary:
Includes the following:
- Disgaea 7 game
- Cosmetic Set
- Special Weapons Set
- Starter Support Set
- Season Pass

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Cosmetic Set
summary:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Glasses Costumes Set
- Disgaea Costumes Set
- Magical Girl Magic Knight & Spirit Costumes
- Charming Prinny & Slumber Cat Costumes
- Short-Hair Succubus & Felynn Costumes
- Animal Ear Armor Knight & Witch Costumes
- Gamer Professor & Mecha Girl Costumes
- Nurse Kunoichi & Cleric Costumes
- Oni & Kappa Prinny Costumes

name: Dinobreak Killer Crisis Collection
summary: Two retro survival horror nightmares overflowing with dinosaurs and zombies!

name: Dinolords
summary: Dinolords is a realtime strategy game where you gather resources, build fortifications and command units in defence against the invading Danes with their arsenal of fierce dinosaurs. A shocking new age in medieval warfare.

name: Di Gi Charat RPG
summary: Di Gi Charat RPG is a Korean exclusive mobile game based on the anime Di Gi Charat.

name: Digimon 20th Anniversary Digivice
summary: An updated rerelease of the original Digimon virtual pet from 1997. New features include caring for two Digimon at the same time, multiple new obtainable Digimon, and a single-player Arena battle mode.

name: Ding! MONO
summary: A hexagon-based strategy game created by Gruppo One. It has an aesthetic inspired by tabletop wargames, which characters that look like figurines.

name: Dinosaur King: Fierce Battle! Zanjark!
summary:
The fourth entry of the arcade machine series, where you fight with dinosaurs with a rock, paper, scissors enhanced system.

This version brings a totally new story, where apparently Alpha gang stop being a menace to the dinosaurs, but now, the D-Team has to face a new enemy, Zanjark, space pirates who want universal dominance.
This entry has the habitual new dinosaurs and moves introduction, but also, added the first power up/gimmick to the series, Armored dinosaur, Dinotector for the heroes, and Jark armors for the enemies.

name: DisOrder in the Court
summary: DisOrder in the Court is a 3-8 player party game where players must talk themselves out of comically embarrassing or ridiculous scenarios. Play as convicts competing for a presidential pardon as your questionable past is brought to light.

name: Disposal Of Otherworldly Monsters
summary: A large Doom themed map, using the SMEJ2 progs (already included). Contains music from Doom 2 OST.

name: Digs03
summary: Large interconnected metal-style windtunnel map.

name: Dismal Signal
summary: Medium-sized lava-industrial facility on a desert planet, using custom textures. It comes with a custom skybox and the map source is included.

name: Dimension of the Doomed
summary: Medium-sized base/wizard map where two Quake dimensions clash.

name: Disengage the Simulator
summary: Smallish slaughter-map "simulation" in a DE_DUST (from Counter Strike) setting, complete with dead terrorists and plantable bombs. Comes with custom textures, models, and sounds. The map source and a texture wad are included.

name: Diminutive Abyss
summary: Small void map with a focus on exploration.

name: Dimension of the Diminished
summary: Small level that combines one room from each map in Quake's first episode into a cute little summary or reminder of it.

name: Dinosaur King: Wake Up! New Power!
summary:
The last entry of this arcade machine series, where you fight with dinosaurs with a rock, paper, scissors enhanced system.

This version concludes the story, by presenting how, after the defeat of Space Pirates, Jark's son, Goma, takes the leadership and tries once and for all the universal domination, and now, D-team has to stop him and his powerful ace, Eocarcharia.
This entry is special because it had more playable novelties of all the games, including 6 special critical move attacks which are quick time event moves, one per elemental type, and also another power up/gimmick, the awaken mode, in which, once you win or lose you can activate, being a One turn exclusive power up where your attack and defense is duplicated.

name: Discone
summary: The first disc in the pondlife disc series; a run & jump & talk 'em-up. an opportunity to interact with your controller.

name: Die Scraper
summary: A single player city-style Duke Nukem map.

name: Divadlo
summary: 'divadlo' is Czech for theatre, so it's no surprise that this level is set in and around one.

name: Discarded Stronghold
summary: EDF base has been overrun by aliens who are now looting the base, searching for information that could jeopardize the existence of mankind. Duke has been sent to investigate the base, or what's left of it, and make sure that no alien survives.

name: Dimension Shift
summary: After escaping the alien planet in Alien Abductee using a stolen ship, Duke returns to earth but is blown out of the sky by the mysterious red ship. Escaping through the small hatch in the side of the cockpit and falling towards a lake, Duke now finds himself in front of an old forgotten house. Whilst it is overgrown and looks abandoned he can't shake the feeling that someone is watching him from behind those dark windows. The bushes too thick to pass and the door surely jammed, the only way in is through the basement but it quickly becomes clear that something is very wrong here.

name: Dispel
summary: Dispel is the third-person, action RPG that features permanent death and procedurally generated levels. Adventure solo in this challenging roguelike-inspired game.

name: Dino
summary: A collection of 2D games built in one project, an open-source monorepo. The games mostly start as jam submissions, but are growing to cover a range of genres, including metroidvania platforming, top-down adventuring, beat-em-up action, puzzles, runners, and more! Dino is built with Godot.

name: Ding Dong Dead
summary: "A slasher horror game where the player's decisions matter. Babysit Rex, invite others, order pizza, survive the murderous Ripper, or give it to your dark side. The choices are yours."

name: District XiLin
summary: This is a first-person city exploration game similar to a walking simulator. It is an open-world game that takes place in a real Chinese city called XiLin.

name: Dinobreak Triassic Torment Collection
summary: Experience three unforgettable survival horror nightmares!

name: Dino Tower Arena
summary: Lets beat'em all! In this dinosaur combat roguelike, you will build and upgrade your own dinosaur with lots of special abilities and fight over enemy dinosaurs while going up the floors of a enormous tower

name: Dink Smallwood HD
summary:
Dink Smallwood is a humorous role-playing video game. It was first released in 1998 before becoming freeware on October 17, 1999. It was developed by Robinson Technologies, at the time consisting of Seth Robinson, Justin Martin, and Greg Smith. Mitch Brink composed several of the game's music tracks, while others are MIDI forms of classical music such as Debussy's Reverie. The game has a small but dedicated fan following that continues to develop add-ons for the game more than a decade after its release.

The HD version features remastered soundtrack, new quality of life features, built-in mod support, an upgraded engine, and gamepad support.

name: Diari
summary: Arise player, welcome to Diari! Explore the world of Ekrose with Aimacra, giving them insight as she traverses through platforming and puzzles to meet her friend Sirestias. Guided by intuition and emotion, you will shape Aimacra through her journey and how it all ends.

name: Digital Cities
summary: The main idea of project is to explore the capitals and ordinary cities of the world, giving the user the opportunity to get into the atmosphere of new places and discover new corners of the planet with the help of RolePlaying game mode. Up your skills, go to work, trade, travel, all in one game.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 9
summary: After climbing up with a ladder, you finally saw Dr. Q, who seems to be awaiting you. And have made up your mind to go after Dr. Q immediately.

name: Divine Prophecy
summary: A simple and refreshing flying shooting game.

name: Dig a Little Deeper
summary: Dig, find valuable resources, and make your colony prosper in Dig a Little Deeper. An accident has taken your small group of colonists to an inhospitable and unknown planet. Only with your leadership and your management skills you will be able to build a new home. Let's start digging!

name: Divine Pig
summary: The player is an ordinary warrior who is turned into a pig when defeated by a water monster in battle. In order to become human again, players need to go through different levels Step by step, transform into human form and acquire skills. Defeat demons through ultimate efforts and become humans.

name: Dinopunk: The Cacops Adventure
summary: Welcome to "Dinopunk: The Cacops Adventure"! You're an amphibious dinosaur with the power of water. Face challenges, recover your stolen egg from a ninja, and surf in championships. 2D Jurassic action awaits!

name: Disc Golf
summary: Disc Golf is an innovative flash game that combines golf and frisbee into one sport. In this game, you have a selection of discs to choose from. Each disc is made out of special material that affects their flight (angle and strength). Select an appropriate disc for your shot and complete the course in as few shots as possible.

name: Digital Monster X
summary: Digital Monster X is a brand new Digital Monster Virtual Pet which is focusing on X-Antibody Digimon. Several mechanics from the Digimon Pendulum X series also make a return, such as the XAI System.

name: Digital Monster X Ver.2
summary: Digital Monster X Ver.2 is a Digital Monster Virtual Pet which is focusing on X-Antibody Digimon. Several mechanics from the Digimon Pendulum X series also make a return, such as the XAI System.

name: Diet 32in24
summary: Diet 32in24 is a special edition of the 32in24 series, which took place on 21 October, 2007, shortly after the fifth session. It is called Diet 32in24 as it actually only features 16 maps, which are designed for single player. Development of this WAD took the same approach as 32in24-5, with mappers creating their entire layout (plus thing placement) within 24 hours, and then the maps would be passed on to a second mapper who would detail the maps using a texture WAD compiled by Sarah Mancuso (esselfortium). Each map also contains at least two billboards, which feature humorous adverts that mostly relate to Doom and its community, or other games of the era. In total, the WAD contains 37 billboards.

name: Diabolos
summary: Diabolos = Greek word for the devil. This level will test your awareness and of course, pit you to survive in many different and confusing 3 Dimensional environments. As you explore the complex of chambers and sewers, you'll find that areas are organized in an intelligent composition. when you see a bloodfall, you can track it to its source.

name: Diorama
summary: A comfy game about designing your own personal home.

name: Dice Up
summary: Dice Up is a puzzle platformer where you eat food to gain powers. Eat a large block of food to get a single use strong effect, or dice your food up into smaller pieces to gain a weaker effect that you can use multiple times. Determine how to dice up each food to reach the exit.

name: Dinobreak Strange Mutations Collection
summary: Get ready to return to the world of survival horror as you fight through dinosaurs and the undead across the entire Dinobreak and Outbreak series!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time
summary: Expand your journey to Eternity Isle, where more adventures await!

name: Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred
summary:
The battle against Hatred has only just begun.
Journey into the new region of Nahantu in search of Neyrelle, who is both suffering the fate of her choice to imprison the Prime Evil Mephisto, and seeking a means to destroy him.
