Become the apex predator of the jungle as the all-new Spiritborn class. Recruit Mercenaries to aid you in combat, fight together in a new PvE co-op activity, & more.

name: Disney Frozen: Arendelle’s Winter Festival
summary: Enjoy an enchanted celebration throughout Arendelle with Anna, Elsa and Olaf. Children use mathematics skills in active game play to toss snowballs, create beautiful ice sculptures, collect magical snowflakes and trace a path on the ice rink.

name: Disconcerting Unease 1
summary: Weekend-long impromptu speedmapping session: four around medium-sized metal levels.

name: Disconcerting Unease 2
summary: Four small to medium-sized spooky Halloween maps: an arctic outpost, a Q2-textured mining complex, a pumpkin spice latte franchise place, and an infinite horde arena. Comes with a few new features, a custom skybox and new sounds.

name: Disney 100
summary: Disney 100 is a mobile-browser game by McDonald's. The game was made as a promotional tie in for the November 2023 Disney McDonald's Happy Meal campaign, which was made to celebrate the 100th anniversary of Disney.

name: Dinky Kong
summary: A demake of Donkey Kong in PICO-8 starring Minio and Dinky Kong.

name: Dice Captain
summary: Dice Captain is a thrilling roguelike adventure that invites you to command your own ship and crew. Explore a randomly generated maps, select unique sailors with upgradeable dice, and master the art of tactic with talismans and one-time-use cards. Are you ready to become the ultimate Dice Captain?

name: Dinosaur Island Escape
summary: Explore an uncharted island filled with prehistoric predators that see you as nothing more than a free meal. Solve mysteries, uncover secrets, and explore this open world in a unique way.

name: Digimon Pendulum Ver.20th
summary: Digimon Pendulum Ver.20th is the remake of the original Digimon Pendulum Virtual Pet for the 20th Anniversary of the device. It contains all of the previous Digimon from the Pendulum generation Digimon Virtual Pet line but not all are obtainable in one device.

name: Digimon Adventure Trading Card Game
summary:
Pokemon TCG but with Digimon.

All Pokemon swapped out for Digimon, all attacks shuffled and reworked for improved balance, less coin flips for increased strategizing, evolution cards buffed to be worth the investment, all types balanced; every type has exactly 2 weaknesses and 2 resistances, Fighting and Psychic replaced with new "Earth" and "Dark" types, respectively and minor dialogue tweaks

name: Dinosaur World
summary: Dinosaur World is a survival game about dinosaurs. You can tame and hunt dinosaurs, ride them, grow crops, craft a variety of weapons, build houses and furniture.

name: Dino Survivors
summary: Face hordes of Dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures in this survival game with minimalist gameplay! Dino Survivors is a casual game with Roguelite elements, where you need to be faster and survive several species of extinct animals. Your choices will determine this.

name: Diamond Dash: Plaid Peril
summary: Dive into Diamond Dash: Plaid Peril, a unique rolling ball game for Perspectacles 3D glasses. Conquer the perilous plaid path, collect diamonds, and leap between tracks. Challenge levels and global competition await. Experience gaming in a visually stunning world.

name: Dizzy Fight
summary: Dizzy Fight is a fun dynamic fighting game with bright effects that you can play against the PC or with friends. Choose your character with his superpowers, and put the heat on all the enemies!

name: Digital Circus Shooter
summary: You have come to the territory of the digital circus where not friendly creatures live at all. Beat off all waves of enemies. Buy new weapons and hire allies.

name: Digital Circus: Obby Parkour
summary: Pomni is stuck in the Digital Circus and your her is to overcome many blocks and obstacles as she can to reach the finish line. Each level increases in difficulty, and you have to help her with her parkour skills to overcome all obstacles.

name: Disillusion ST
summary: Strange journey throughout an elaborate labyrinth awaits featuring hundreds of characters and happenings as you try to gather items that once brought happiness to others. An early access glimpse at the prequel to Disillusion, the oneiric dungeon crawler detailing the events leading up to the tower's creation.

name: Divergence
summary: Explore a mysterious island with the help of a time manipulation device. Rewind and diverge from your current timeline to combat the ancient guardians and discover the secrets behind Titans.

name: Dice & Fold
summary: A turn-based dungeon crawler where your only way of attacking the enemy is by rolling dice. Roll dice to damage enemy cards to FOLD. Inspired by classic Solitaire, in a top-down table and enemies made out of cards, try to beat the dungeon with 20 unique classes. Build your deck, kill monsters.

name: Dimlight Dungeon
summary: A dark fantasy dungeon crawler where the player controls a reptilian brawler and travels within the ruins of a once mighty heroic fortress.

name: Didaskalia
summary: It's year 1989, you are tired of your life, everything and everyone pisses you off. One day you decide to join the army, as a combat medic. You and your companions are sent to "Phobos". The mission is to get rid of the monsters that took control of the planet. You arrive a bit late, because you had some work to do. Every soldier brutally dies, you are left all alone. You hear in the radio that people from earth have sent help to rescue you. But soon it turns out that they want you DEAD.

name: Die Cook
summary: Presenting Die Cook, the first ever dice-based restaurant management game! Open your dream business, upgrade and equip your kitchen, level up employees to customize their dice. Express yourself with a customizable character and indoor decor. Aim for a 5-star rating in this unique relaxing simulator!

name: DIY Paper Doll
summary: Become a doll stylist and design fabulous outfits for your adorable paper princess!

name: Dice Duel
summary:
You've been greatly offended by Sir Robert but can't duel him ... unless Miss Ara has a plan for you, and she does.

Win 3 duels to finish this short game mixing math, randomness and narration!

name: Dino Mayhem
summary: Cause mayhem in this retro platformer by devouring people and destroying vehicles to earn points.

name: Dimensional Shift Awakening
summary: This game is a soul born inspired action adventure RPG game. I want to make each character unique and flesh out their own story, background, personality then all of this will affect the character powers, type, talents, skills, fighting styles, and weapons.

name: Diesel Burners
summary: Diesel Burners is a fast-paced aerial shooter. Destroy hordes of enemies while collecting resources and power-ups. Buy, upgrade, and customize your character and planes; and put your skills to the test facing bosses in a variety of single-player and multiplayer modes!

name: Disc Dimension
summary: Step into the mesmerizing world of Disc Dimension, a VR disc golf game blending realistic physics with mystical landscapes! Traverse ethereal courses filled with elemental hazards, master your throws, and uncover the perfect balance between skill and enchantment in this immersive sporting adventure.

name: Dirty House
summary: Dirty House - An exciting 3D game that will help you relax and unwind. You are an ordinary citizen who has just been hired and you are already full of orders! Your main task is to restore perfect order in the house! Clear rooms of trash, bottles, boxes, broken trash, etc.!

name: Digested
summary: Digested is an open-world horror survival game in which you must evade a giant snake intent on eating you alive. Utilize various tools and abilities to formulate an escape strategy, and use the map to navigate through unfamiliar terrain. Locate your extraction pod and don't get digested.

name: Dig Dirt
summary: ULTIMATE DIGGING SIM

name: Dirt And Flo
summary: Travel accross a peaceful land To reach your spaceship resolving puzzles by switching beetween Dirt and Flo, two extra terrestial lifeform from outer space wich have some problems with their flying saucer and get the time of visiting Earth.

name: Divine Doubt
summary:
"I can give you that which you desire most. Your humanity."

This was all that was promised to Callum Röttwell in the mysterious email he received out of the blue one day. It was enough though for him to uproot his life and travel to the city of Starhaven to start anew. As an angel from a small town, he has to adapt quickly and learn how to interact with those he's never encountered before: demons. Especially since he must share a bedroom with one in a cramped apartment. Throughout this journey, Callum will meet many characters, explore the city of Starhaven, and dive deeper into what that strange email entails for him. But he must be wary, for his goddess is watching closely.

name: Diabetor & The Sugar Monsters
summary: DIABETOR AND THE SUGAR MONSTERS! Diabetor was wreaking havoc on diabetics across the nation. The world needed a hero! Years ago the Insulator read a book that held the secret on how to defeat Diabetor. It is now time to defeat Diabetor and his evil sugar monsters!

name: Dice Dice Fantasia
summary:
Dice Dice Fantasia is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Broccoli, which was released in Japan in 2009.

``Yuhodo,'' which handles systems for numerous card games, is in charge of system design. It's a simple yet deep board game with lots of elements to play with.

In addition, Munetsugu Kusaka, who works on illustrations for light novels and bishoujo games, has been appointed as the character designer and original artist. The theme song will be delivered by a lineup with Elements Garden producing the music and Haruka Shimotsuki on vocals!

name: Dire: Flesh and Phobia
summary: Embark on an epic roguelike adventure in "Dire:Flesh and Phobia", where visually spectacular monsters engage in intense card battles. Craft your deck, navigate immersive maps, and conquer foes, culminating in epic boss battles. With unique abilities, strategic deck building, and stunning visuals, Dire:Flesh and Phobia is a thrilling journey to become the ultimate monster master. Are you ready to face the challenge and claim victory in this visually captivating world?

name: Dice Battle
summary: Dice Battle is a casual game in which you could act as a rolling dice jumping over your enermy and flatten them in Level or endless mode. Fully control your dice to avoid the barrage and beat the enemy dice.

name: Dino Get Out!
summary: Get ready for a unique adventure! Join our jumping dinosaur in his exciting mission to escape from a world full of challenges in this platform game.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time - Chapter 1: Welcome to Eternity Isle
summary: The first of 3 chapters of the "A Rift in Time" expansion pack for Disney Dreamlight Valley. Explore Eternity Isle and meet Rapunzel, Gaston, and EVE on your island adventures!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Pumpkin King Returns
summary: The 1.0 update for Disney Dreamlight Valley finishes the Early Access period, brings Jack Skellington from Disney Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas as a villager, new multiplayer functions and the Royal Winter Star Path.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Gold Edition
summary: Explore a magical world in Disney Dreamlight Valley alongside Disney and Pixar friends and expand your journey to Eternity Isle where more adventures await!

name: Diablo
summary: A cancelled Game Boy version of the Playstation game Diablo. Why it was cancelled is unknown, but a tech demo was produced and never shown to the public.

name: Divine Duel: Season 2
summary: Season 2 brings a free battle pass and the new playable hero Flint, the Astroravager.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time - Chapter 2: The Spark of Imagination
summary: The second of 3 chapters of the "A Rift in Time" expansion pack for Disney Dreamlight Valley. Explore Ancient's Landing to uncover more of its secrets and befriend a very lucky villager.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time - Chapter 3: Treasures of Time
summary: The last of 3 chapters of the "A Rift in Time" expansion pack for Disney Dreamlight Valley. Foil Jafar's schemes and fix the rift in time.

name: Die For Light
summary: This is a game about repetition and never ending failure, face the unknown road ahead, failure is inevitable, but "memory" will record this failure for you, help you to cross it next time, until "right".

name: Divine Journey: The Life of Jesus
summary: Embark on a Devine Journey, a captivating game narrating Jesus' life through 25 chapters, from birth to resurrection. Experience divine miracles and profound teachings.

name: Diam's
summary: If someone steals your diamonds... What will you do?

name: Disney Junior Magical Holiday
summary: Disney Junior Magical Holiday is a Christmas themed mini-game compilation featuring characters from Disney Junior shows.

name: Divine Journey 2
summary: Divine Journey 2 is a Minecraft 1.12.2 Expert modpack that is the spiritual successor to the 1.7.10 Divine Journey modpack. It features a unique progression line and a lot more mods to go through than its predecessor.

name: Disappearance: Takeshi. You were right. That Abandoned Village is Too Bad
summary: Shissou: Takeshi Omae no Iu Toori datta Ano Haison ha Yaba sugiru is a first-person horror comedy game that explores an abandoned village in Japan to find your lost best friend.

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Construct
summary:
Ancient forces threaten Sanctuary. Aided by your Seneschal Companion, hazard the many traps and devastating Constructs beneath the deserts of Kehjistan.

Deep beneath the swirling sands, elemental forces are amassing for malicious whims of the demon Malphas. Only by descending far below the surface will you be able to cull this cursed threat from its root.

Prepare to uncover the powerful secrets of Zoltun Kulle’s Loom with a new Dungeon type called Vaults, a seasonal robotic Seneschal Companion, and Weekly Leaderboards in The Gauntlet. Several key quality-of-life features—including almost constant Helltide events—arrive to help aid your conquests while fighting in the Vaults.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition of Disgaea 7 includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of Disgaea 7
- "The Art of War" hardcover art book
- "The Songs of Honor" 2-disc original soundtrack
- Steelbook
- Mini Byoubu Art Display
- "Netherworld Warriors" Yunomi Tea Cup
- Collector's Box

name: Digital Keiba Shinbun: My Trackman
summary: A simulation game by Shouei System for the Sega Dreamcast. It simulates an off-track betting station, allowing users who are connected to the Internet to bet on horse races from home. The service lasted a year and a half — Shouei System went bankrupt and shut the service down on October 1, 2000 at 17:00 (JST). The game may also be a standalone horse racing sim, however this is unconfirmed.

name: Dice of God
summary:
Dice of God is a turn-based adventure game.
Player uses dice during fights. The numbers on the dice determine the offensive and defensive power.

name: Die Drei ??? und der Riesenkrake
summary: A mysterious giant octopus appears on the beach. And the strange monster seems to do its foul work onshore, too. The news spread like wildfire. However, there is something really odd about this story…

name: Dilemo
summary: This is a mobile trivia game where players progress through levels in different categories by answering true or false questions.

name: Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei
summary: A remake of Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei released in the Kyuuyaku Megami Tensei bundle.

name: Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei II
summary: A remake of Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei II released in the Kyuuyaku Megami Tensei bundle.

name: Dinkie Dino
summary: A virtual pet simulator, similar to the Tamagotchi.

name: Dino Race: Dinosaur Ride Ranch
summary: Unleash the Jurassic speed, conquer challenges, and race to triumph in this epic, adrenaline-fueled adventure.

name: Digitalter
summary: Simple, zen puzzle game where you alter sequences of digits in columns and rows.

name: DitherDream
summary: A trippy little exploration game. Let the world guide you through a strange and uniquely beautiful archipelago.

name: Dive The Depths
summary: Dive The Depths is an action-roguelike set beneath the ocean's surface. As a humble diver, you must navigate the world filled with bizarre sea creatures, submerged ruins, and forgotten histories. Can you conquer the depths and unravel the secrets that hidden beneath the waves?

name: Divine Twins
summary: Dual roles, open world adventure，be both hero and spouse.

name: Dirty Rotten Bounders
summary: An original game, combining the strategy of Reversi with all of the excitement of a fun, fast-paced, tile-flipping, arcade action game. Jump player around the boards of 9x9 tiles, destroying chasers caught on flipping tiles. 15 boards per level, 3 levels of difficulty.

name: Discrete Heart
summary: Discrete Heart is an emotion-building game in a 2D pixel style from a top-down perspective. Joy, trust, fear... Each initial emotion corresponds to different initial attributes and props. "Inject" and control the characters to build 8 basic emotions, looking for the answer named "Unintentionaler".

name: Dice TD
summary: Dice TD is a board-themed tower defense game with fantasy dice, instead of towers. Merge your dice to increase their pips and powers. Defend your base from the incoming enemies and construct epic mazes to slow them down.

name: DI: Debt is Inevitable
summary: DI is an endless wave-based FPS where you must micromanage the ever-increasing shop prices in order to defeat ever-increasing hordes of enemies. Powered by GZDoom.

name: Die Erdnussbutter
summary: Shoot, dash, and power your way through enemy lines in the arcade-style 2D side scroller, Die Erdnussbutter!

name: Dice & Sword
summary: DICE & SWORD is a board game base RPG developed by a solo-indie base in Hong Kong. Let roll the dice to start your adventure!

name: Diary of a Zomboni Driver
summary:
What do hockey pucks, a midwife of the dead, and a plot to turn the lives of great players into evil tribute all have in common? They’re all found in the latest and greatest RPG for the Nintendo Entertainment System! Travel the underworld as an undead superstar athlete, battle monster hockey teams, find new gear and abilities, and take on an evil sports agent demigod!

Skate hard. Shoot straight. The Zombie Hockey League is in your living room!

name: Digical League
summary: Digical League is a cartoon baseball game in the style of the Pawafuru series.

name: Diamond Hollow
summary: Shoot, upgrade, conquer enemies, attempt achievements, collect gems, all in an attempt to escape an endless cave

name: Diamond Hollow II
summary: Shoot, explore, upgrade, conquer enemies, defeat bosses, acquire achievements, collect gems, all in an attempt to save yourself and your gun from the clutches of the evil Professor. The Sequel to the original Diamond Hollow game.

name: Dino Tour VR
summary: Dino Tour VR: Simulated T-Rex, Triceratops, Velociraptor, etc., can be seen on VR screen to view various dinosaurs on a dinosaur ride.

name: Dimension Fight
summary: "Dimension Fight" is a multi-team brawl type action game. People from nowhere, throwing punches for no reason, just to prove they're better?

name: Discarnate: Locust
summary: You are tasked by The Collector to find a painting that has been locked away in the depths of an abandoned house. The Collector does not care how you find it, he cares about results and confidentiality. DO NOT attract unwanted attention, DO NOT fail him. Good Luck.

name: Dicey Jump
summary: Short jump or Long jump? Make the right choice before the saw gets hold of you.

name: Dire Decks
summary: Craft the perfect deck to slay hordes of enemies.

name: Dino Dino
summary: Playfully extend your knowledge about dinosaurs in a collection of mini games. Created in cooperation with the German Paleontological Society, featuring voice recordings and hand-drawn illustrations, Dino Dino sets out to awaken your kids's interest in complex topics while being a lot of fun.

name: Dick Hook
summary: Draw all the girls in the game, without exception! Visit colorful winter locations and real space! Play and have fun with pleasant music!

name: Dinos vs. Robots
summary: Dinos vs. Robots - Robots from the Future time travel to the Present to fight Dinos from the Past.

name: Diamond
summary: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Diamond.

name: Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII International
summary: Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII International retains the new features incorporated into the North American and European releases.

name: Diablo IV: Beckoning Thunder Pack
summary: Answer the call of the elements with the Beckoning Thunder Pack.

name: Dino Adventure Legend
summary: Dino Adventure Legend is a 2D platformer released for the TimeTop Gameking.

name: Dice
summary: A dice game. The player selects between "small number" (S), "large number" (L) or "three fives" and proceeds to roll three dices. An extra point is gained when the rolled number of dice corresponds correctly with the selected option.

name: Dinostria
summary: Dinostria is a currently lost old Scott Cawthon Game also released in around 2003. From the few screenshots available, the game appears to be some sort of overheard dungeon crawler where you play as some sort of gold and silver knight.

name: Diora
summary:
After a strange accident, you’ll travel across the world to uncover a mysterious force that is manipulating structures and the people around them.

As you explore, you’ll find new ways to solve puzzles, and free each island from the signals controlling it.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Laugh Floor
summary: The 9th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings the Monsters, inc Realm, Mike Wazowski and Sulley as Villagers, the Lovely Monsters Star Path, an expansion to Scrooge's Shop and new items on the Premium Shop.

name: Divine Journey 2: The Five Books of Moses
summary: Embark on an immersive journey through the foundational stories of the Bible in "The Five Books of Moses," the captivating sequel to Divine Journey: The Life of Jesus. Explore the epic tales of these ancient texts, encountering miracles, laws, and the divine guidance that shaped a nation.

name: DinnerDinnner
summary: "DinnerDinner" is a horror adventure game set in the modern era. You become a diner staff member and encounter strange events - customers with bizarre stories, engaging in trivial conversations, and discussing incomprehensible matters.

name: Dice Blaze
summary:
Dice Blaze - 1v1 Turn-based Combat game

Immerse yourself in strategic battles, unleash powerful abilities, and master the art of the dice.

Dive into a world of strategy and chance, where epic battles, cunning tactics, and thrilling adventures await.

name: Diamonds Collector
summary: The pursuit of wealth - How it feels?

name: Disney's Toy Story
summary: A Toy Story game that released for Genesis / Mega Drive.

name: Diet of Dinos
summary: Diet of Dinos, a prehistoric turn-based rogue-lite, you embody a carnivorous dino on a quest across a mysterious island to feed your captive ruler.

name: DIY Fashion Star
summary: Refresh your wardrobe with stylish DIY projects and put your clothing design skills to the test!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Arts & Crafts
summary:
Redesign your new clothes and decorate them with new patches and accessories!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- new DIY summer top
- new stylish DIY skirt
- new elegant DIY dress
- skull patch
- lips patch
- eye patch
- blue bow accessory
- orange button accessory

Use your designer imagination and create new DIY projects that everyone will love!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Glow Up!
summary:
Give your doll a unique look with new stylish hairstyles and a new face-painting option!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- 2 different hairstyles with beautiful braids
- face-painting tab with 10 different colorful designs ranging from butterflies and stars to lovely flowers

Dye your new magical hair and paint your face using the new feature!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Stylish Outfits
summary:
Change your doll's style with cute and brand-new clothes!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- beautiful dress in red, green, pink and orange colors
- stylish glasses in blue, aqua blue, orange and pink colors
- baseball sweatshirt in red, blue, orange and purple colors
- denim shorts in blue, aqua blue, red and orange colors
- fashionable heeled shoes in blue, pink, orange and green colors

name: Dispatch Madness
summary: Manage the flow of a fresh produce warehouse ! Place orders with suppliers, handle incoming pallets, and dispatch them from the loading bay to your customers. Stay cool under pressure ! Deal with the increasing pressure and unexpected events.

name: Diablo IV: Dark Pathways Pack
summary: Traverse all of Sanctuary with the Dark Pathways Pack.

name: Dirge: Wendigo
summary: From the chilling depths of Quetico Forest, where harsh winters shape the land, emerges the Wendigo—a hulking monstrosity born of desperate survival and driven to hunt in the frozen, unforgiving wilderness of Dirge.

name: Dirge: Revenant
summary: Stalk the players in a head to head match. Pick them off one by one with your massive strength to crush the humans' skulls. Devour the corpses of your enemies to regain strength to hunt again, or rest from the action for a moment to regain health.

name: Dice-Zee!
summary: Dice-Zee! brings back a classic and beloved game that is popular across the world! Can you rank as one of the best dice scoring players in the world?

name: Dino Park
summary: Dino Park is a cozy idle game about collecting dinosaurs! Watch your dinosaurs level up in real time, earning more money for your park. Create the perfect environment for your dinosaurs to increase the chance of discovering super rare variants! Can you collect them all?

name: Diddy Kong Racing: Ocarina of Time
Dice Birth Road
summary: Dice Birth Road is an independent single player Rogue turn based deck building game. Faced with powerful enemies, you need to fully utilize dice card management to manage your hand and defeat them. Defeat all enemies and explore the story behind the game.

name: Dire Island
summary: Caught in a sudden storm, your team's once-promising voyage ended in disaster, leaving you stranded on Dire Island. United by the need for survival, you now face the island's mysteries and challenges together.

name: Divnozemye
summary: "Divnozemye" is a card game like the famous game "Arcomage" (from "Might&Magic"), but in the setting of folk fairy tales and with its own feature - heroes.

name: Dirty Harry: Excessive Force
summary: An unreleased video game based off the Dirty Harry film franchise by Warner Bros..

name: Die drei Freunde von der Reitschule
summary: Real estate sharks are targeting Laura's uncle's beautifully located riding school. To save the indebted riding school, Uncle Arthur needs a lot of money, which his son Christian wants to win by winning the big horse show. However, a mysterious accident prevents him from doing so.

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Contemporary Cool"
summary: Adds new brand new dice sets to your Dice-Zee! game instantly without needing to grind for DZ coins within the game!

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Autumn Auras"
summary: Adds six brand new dice sets to your Dice-Zee! game!

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Serene Chromas"
summary: Adds six all new dice colors and designs to roll for those hard-to-roll numbers!

name: Dice Dice Dice: A Roll Playing Game
summary: Roll the dice and explore a dicey world were all your actions and out comes are decided by the roll of a dice. Build up your team customize your dices and roll play your way through combat.

name: Dissecting Love
summary: An autopsy of a queer relationship.

name: Distant Past
summary: 50,000 Years ago a once thriving and industrious earth was invaded by monsters and all manner of evil. Can you stop them before they send the world back to the stone age?

name: Dino Cats
summary: Hidden Dino Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this dinosaur park! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️

name: Dishwashing Simulator
summary: A unique survival-farming-base-building-tycoon-horror game where you must survive through washing dishes. Explore mysterious depths, manage resources, and unravel a cryptic narrative. In DWS, a chore becomes a journey to freedom.

name: Divineko
summary:
You play as a cat who casts spells by drawing increasingly complex shapes that match incoming enemies.

Throughout your journey, you will meet a wide range of enemy archetypes with unique gameplay mechanics, challenging bosses, and you will acquire divine abilities along the way (e.g. block attacks, slow down time, hit all enemies on screen). These abilities will help you rise to the top of the leaderboard in the Endless mode and achieve your end goal: establish your authority as the god of cats, the Divineko!

name: Dice Life: Dice Game
summary: A town-building game involving dice rolls that Jelly Button developed but never fully released before Playtika shut down their studio.

name: Dice-Zee!: Dice Pak - "Gold & Pearls"
summary: Adds six brand new dice sets for rolling all those hard-to-roll numbers in Dice-Zee! Maybe they won't add any luck, but at least you'll do it in style!

name: Diorama Maker
summary: Diorama Maker is an easy to use sandbox toy that lets you build dioramas in both VR and desktop. Choose from thousands of objects and create your own world.

name: Dirt 5: Energy Content Pack
summary: The Energy Content Pack for Dirt 5 adds new vehicles, events, sponsors, and customization options to Dirt 5!

name: Dice Mage
summary: DICE MAGE is a spell combat RPG with magical exploding dice. Explore floating worlds, fight enemies and win loot in high-stakes games of chance on a quest to defeat evil.

name: Distill, My Beating Heart!
summary: Work your way up from making bottom shelf swill to high end whiskey!

name: Dirt 5: Wild Spirits Content Pack
summary: Continue your journey in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the Wild Spirits Content Pack - with new cars, Career events, sponsors and customisation items!

name: Dirt 5: Uproar Content Pack
summary:
The quartet of cars coming to DIRT 5 in the Uproar Content Pack restore four of the most exciting and eye-catching machines from our previous extreme off-road title, DiRT Showdown.

First up, the Duke Coupe – a powerful long-wheelbase car with hot rod stylings and huge tyres, ready to conquer DIRT 5’s routes in its own unique style from the Rally GT Class. In the RallyCross class, meanwhile, the Zenden Cup is a perfect addition, with its compact boxy chassis and aerodynamic flair housing a powerful engine – the ideal mix of speed and handling for our off-road events. The Jackson Adventurer, meanwhile, is a bigger beast for the Unlimited Class that’s low on the unnecessary extras and big on shock absorbers, suspension and speed for those big jumps. Finally, the Jackson Eulogy – the most unique of our new cars, with an estate chassis decked out with custom details and performance upgrades, dropping into our Classic Rally class.

Each of the four cars will feature in a new thread of 25 Career events for all players to take on, available in the new ‘Uproar’ option in Career. Every event either takes place at night-time or features dynamically changing weather that includes night racing, meaning a fresh test of your nerve, reaction and skill. The 25 events will take you across the globe in new race scenarios for New York, Nepal, Italy, South Africa and more locations.

Two new sponsors are also added into Career mode in the Uproar Content Pack: PUMA and OffRoad Xtreme. Race through Career events when signed to these sponsors to unlock new items, including unique liveries, player profile options and custom livery patterns, to show your style on the track.

name: Direct-X
summary: Doujin shoot-em-up for the Sharp X68000

name: Dissonators
summary: Dissonators is a dynamic multiplayer shooter where you'll engage in battles on diverse maps, utilizing your skills, gadgets, and abilities to their fullest to overcome the enemy and snatch victory from their grasp.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball
summary: Digital Diamond Baseball is a statistically accurate baseball simulator and tabletop board game companion.

name: Dinosaur Crossing: Unravel and Discover
summary: Embark on a journey with these unique and daring kids as they discover a secret island and encounter dinosaurs of all kinds.

name: Dimenshift: Direction is Meaningless
summary: A minimalist sci-fi 2D platformer where you shift through walls and machines. Explore and find secrets in a strange, maze-like dimension, where the laws of physics don't seem to make sense.

name: Dissimilar
summary: Dissimilar est un jeu narratif en 2D isométrique, avec une exploration semi-ouverte et des combats stratégiques en tour par tour.

name: Diorama Builder: Noir City
summary: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the diorama "NOIR CITY", which will allow you to set up a central area of a city in NOIR style, representing the architectural style of the 1940s and 1950s.

name: DinoEscape in the Time!
summary: A portal opened and launched the dinosaur into the modern world, now it's up to this dinosaur to turn on 5 generators and turn on the time machine to go back to the past.

name: Dillo Guy
summary: Dillo Guy is a Single-screen, 2D platforming game where the player needs to collect 50 gems inside 50 rooms, or else the World will end.

name: Diminishing Light: Wheeled Carnage
summary: Diminishing Light is a zombie-themed top-down action driving game. Customize your vehicle and battle zombies and marauders to survive in the post-apocalyptic wasteland. Establish lifelines during every drive to increase your chances of survival.

name: Didi: The Final Chapter
summary: Didi, a spirited protagonist grappling with the universal ordeal of loss. This story-driven adventure unfolds across five distinct stages, each embodying the psychological phases of death: denial, anger, bargaining, depression, and acceptance.

name: Discovering Galimore
summary: Rebuild your lost home by establishing a new village in a mysterious land. Solve the problems of the settlers, explore the unknown, catalog fantastic flora and fauna of the island and discover its secrets. Start a new life on Galimore!

name: Digital Monster: Net Driver
summary: Digital Monster: Net Driver is V-Pet's final evolution! Will you be able to overcome hardships, difficulty and other players to reach the final evolution? Test your might and aim for the top of the global ranking in online PVP!

name: Disaster Town Tycoon
summary: Disaster Town Tycoon is an Android simulation game developed by Rogue Harbour Game Studio Inc. As the newly elected Mayor of Disaster Town, you have to build a city of your dreams on the most accident-prone stretch of land on the planet. Your task is to mitigate the disaster damage and keep your citizens happy and alive.

name: Die Last
summary: We must revive this post-industrial world. Plant trees to earn Karma, build pipes, join Guilds, and participate in league tournaments to stay alive. Find lost objects to craft secret messages. Go rogue, wander with your dog, steal other players' Karma and grow stronger with every battle

name: Dice Guess
summary: A minimalistic logic game where you predict the number the dice will display face up after a roll. Discover tricks and strategies to eliminate luck from the equation and ascend to become the ultimate dicempion.

name: Diary of a Stoner
summary: Wander through the Stoner Universe and Duel with Magical Cards! Will you use your power for Good? Or Evil? Many different endings are available depending on the choices you make. You are about to embark on a wonderous stoned adventure!

name: Diamond Drone
summary: Put your drone piloting skills to the test in Diamond Drone! Race against the clock to collect all the rubies while keeping an eye on your battery level. Don't forget to search for batteries on the floor to recharge. How skilled are you at maneuvering drones?

name: Dirge For The Zone
summary: Dirge For the Zone/D4Z is a top-down shooter with role-playing and base-building elements. Build your base, protect your people and send them to explore the Zone.

name: Didnapper
summary:
Didnapper is a non-profit fan RPG Maker game originally developed by Wychkith for the ADIDAS Message Boards as a fun little curiosity before it became a full game after developer Kendrian became lead developer in 2012.

The story revolves around a princess from a unnamed fantasy kingdom named Suki who, after being betrayed by her cousin Cherisa who wanted to inherit the throne instead of her, is given the choice to join the Kidnapping Guild that held her captive in exchange of not being bound and gagged in a cell and to discover why Cherisa betrayed her.

As a kidnapper, she is tasked to kidnap girls for ransom while her guild searches for information on her cousin's whereabouts.

name: Dice-Zee!: Duels
summary: Dice-Zee! DUELS adds a whole new dimension to this classic dice rolling game! Now you'll not just be trying to achieve a high score, but you'll be trying to survive epic old school RPG battles against AI opponents as well as fierce fantasy beasts such as fire golems and majestic dragons!

name: District Panic
summary: an action-packed arcade shooter that takes you deep into the heart of a computer under siege.You're the system's last line of defense.

name: Dinner Defenders
summary: Protect your campfire cooking in Dinner Defenders, a roguelike tower defense game. Summon units and utilize combination of their skills and synergies to fend off the hungry goblins and orcs. Survive, and finally have your well-deserved meal in the middle of forest!

name: Disgaea 7 Complete
summary: A complete edition of Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless containing all existing downloadable content and bonus items, plus a new bonus story, new characters, and new post-game elements.

name: Divine Rush
summary: Divine Rush is a battle royale platform game for up to 16 players. The game is about outsmarting the rivals using shooting, hooking, or trapping tactics, collecting diamonds, and earning upgrades.

name: Discin
summary: Discin is about throwing the disc in the basket. Experience the beauty of flight as you explore our custom-crafted disc golf courses. DISCIN currently features 3 unique courses and 4 discs with varied flight characteristics.

name: Dinosaur Island
summary: Players need to survive on an island filled with dinosaurs and other dangerous creatures.

name: Distant Isles
summary: Distant Isles is a party-based RPG with roguelike features. Stranded on a procedurally-generated island you will gather party members, explore and fight creatures in search of hidden treasures.

name: Disc Frenzy
summary: Welcome to Disc Frenzy, a virtual reality disc golf adventure that takes you to the charming alien planet of Udarvia.

name: Dicey Dungeons+
summary:
This is a re-release of Dicey Dungeons for Apple Arcade. It requires a subscription to play.

A fast-paced deckbuilding roguelike. Become a giant walking dice and battle to the end of an ever-changing dungeon! Can you escape the cruel whims of Lady Luck?

name: Diesel Skies
summary: Build and customize your cars, scavenge for scraps and fuel and fight raiders for survival in a vast post-apocalyptic open world filled with danger.

name: Dino Rush
summary: Welcome to Dino Rush – the ultimate test of survival in a prehistoric world! Dodge and sprint your way through a relentless horde of dinosaurs as you strive to survive for as long as possible. Encounter a variety of dinosaurs, push your reflexes to the limit in this pulse-pounding action experience!

name: Dirt Bike: Unlimited Bike Experience
summary: Craft your ultimate off-road machine by customizing every part, from wheels to exhaust. Race through sprawling landscapes, mastering jumps to hit checkpoints before time runs out. Explore the wilderness, conquer the trails, and become the off-road champion!

name: Diorama Drift
summary: Diorama Drift aims for driving delight, offering a relaxed experience as you skillfully drift through otherworldly dioramas. Unleash the art of controlled slides in this journey of exploration and joy.

name: Dirok
summary:
Dîrok is a unique game. First because it is the first game that combines four in a row with deck building and second because it is the first turn-based game in real time.

That means that while you are on your turn to make your move, things continue to happen on the board. This raises a new level of strategy never seen before.

In addition, the game has more than 100 real historical figures with which to form your deck and all of them will have a bio that will help us better understand who they were.

As if that were not enough, the characters will have different levels of strength, defense, life and dodge, in addition to having unique positive skills for allies and/or negative ones for enemies, thus being able to change the dynamics of the game at any time.

name: Dirk Valentine and the Fortress of Steam
summary: Use your chain cannon to create platforms in this steampunk world.

name: Digital Audio Wasteland
summary: Digital Audio Wasteland is a comedic first person exploration game about discovering the music in the world and using that music to change it by throwing the biggest rave at the end of the world through the music you find along the way

name: Disinherited
summary: A roguelike 2D platform-action game about catching, throwing, and parrying your way through the Reaper's catacombs. Why? To spite your dead, banking mogul father.

name: Diorama Builder: Medieval Castle
summary: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the diorama "MEDIEVAL CASTLE", which will allow you to assemble a complete Medieval Castle, with a royal bedroom, weapons room, prison, main hall, kitchen and everything with lots of details, such as armor, cannons, crossbows and more!

name: Dissociative
summary: A merging of dissociation between dream worlds. Lost in nightmares. Find your way through the desolate worlds, happy dreams and hidden horrors.

name: Distant Oceanic Getaway
summary: Distant Oceanic Getaway - A Dating Adventure for WLW. You take on the role of Maeve, a heartbroken woman determined to move on from her cheating ex by embarking on this cruise alone. Will Maeve open her heart to new romance and the possibility of finding her soulmate at sea?​​

name: Diegesis of The Ruined
summary: A dark Christian-based post-apocalyptic survival card game, that is a retelling about the last community of survivors who were traveling the lands trying to survive and constantly seeking a safe place from the horrors that have come upon the earth, which were born from the sins of humanity.

name: Distance and Mirage
summary:
Laurel disappeared when the two of you were just stupid kids, playing out past your curfew. The thing at the molten heart of the desert?

It knows something.

name: Dicy Chess
summary:
Experience the full feeling of playing chess...
BUT WITH RANDOMNESS
At the start of each turn you roll a dice and the outcome determines how far you can move

name: Dig VR
summary:
DIG VR captures the sheer joy, adrenaline and frustrations of life on a digger in an exciting experience for novices and pros. Featuring authentic, immersive controls that recreate the feeling of driving a real digger, DIG VR is a light-simulation game with a casual arcade-twist!

Grow your business in the charming town of Diglington, a place where everything can be fixed by the power of a digger. Take on a variety of jobs for the town's residents - from traditional construction jobs, to more obscure requests! Accompanying you is DIG FM, a dedicated radio station with a wide selection of music to brighten any day.

Progress from micro-sized to colossal diggers, with a diverse set of attachments to overcome any challenge. Dig in style by unlocking over 70 customization options to suit your aesthetic!

Available to play solo or with a friend, get hands on with the fast-paced mini-games or unwind in the sandbox mode. Then, discover a trove of Lost Treasure in a standalone mode where new items are added regularly.

Whether this is your first time operating a digger or you’re already a master, digging fortunes await!

name: Discontrolled
summary: Remember what you've picked up to make your way through this puzzle-platformer. PlayJam 5 Winner!

name: Diablo IV: Loot Reborn
summary:
Become the hero of your choosing. With a newly improved itemization system, the power is in your hands to craft the weapons of your dreams. Temper your gear with a new crafting system to face down hordes of enemies in the updated Helltides. Achieve the pinnacle of your build through Masterworking and try your hand at the daunting challenge of the Pit.

The armies of Hell are expanding their reach across the world of Sanctuary. New threat system, enemies, Blood Maiden boss, and events. Join the Iron Wolves in this seasons’ activities and fight to beat back the tides of Hell, earning you Reputation and rewards.

name: Die Rowdy
summary: Die Rowdy is a 44 map megawad created as the thirty-third edition of the Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series in December of 2023. Loosely Christmas themed and highly Die Hard themed, each map was made with a skyscraper prefab and an elevator, courtesy of ViolentBeetle's Hellavator, of which players will be required to find a red keycard in order to advance to the next floor.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Thrills & Frills
summary: The 10th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings Daisy Duck to the Valley, the new building Boutique to expand the Magic of Touch feature, the A Day At Disney Star Path, new features on Valley Visits and new items (and a new interface) on the Premium Shop.

name: Disney Infinity
summary: The Wii version has a number of differences due to it’s weaker hardware.

name: DinoLauncher
summary: A mod launcher for Dinosaur Planet which applied the latest patches for the game, which is otherwise unplayable in its original form, and has a high quality models feature.

name: Dish Puzzle
summary: Puzzle Game for Little Gourmets

name: Diortem
summary: Fight for survival in this metroidvania where you are an unkillable parasitic organism that can invade other life forms and use their abilities for your own gain.

name: Disney's Peter Pan: Return to Neverland
summary: Players take control of Peter Pan. He can fly with Pixie Dust if he has Tinker Bell, but if he runs out of Pixie Dust, Peter cannot fly. Enemies are in this game, but all can be defeated, except police officers. Enemies can be defeated by any attack, such as ground pounding, throwing his sword or fighting.

name: Dimensi Lain Serena
summary: ERRORS! The ghosts who have a grudge against Serena take her soul to the Other Dimension! They fill every place Serena's memories in real life are so Serena can be stuck there forever!

name: Digimon Crystal Version
summary: A Digimon rom-hack of Pokemon Crystal. Features all 251 Pokemon replaced with Digimon, the Fairy type, Physical-Special split, running shoes, most HMs replaced with key items, forgettable HM moves, evolution parameters included in each Dex entry, increased difficulty and improved level scaling.

name: Digimon Emerald Project
summary: A Digimon rom hack of Pokemon Emerald which features 350+ new monsters with unique stats, abilities, typing, and movepools built from the ground-up,as many as five to six stages for prominent Digimon, custom moves from the Digimon canon, Digidex Entries state criteria for evolution, EV/IV Checker, Up to Gen VII Abilities and Moves, Reusable TMs, Fairy Type, Physical-Special Split, Poison Survival, BW Repel System, and much more.

name: Dimachaerus
summary: Dimachaerus is a Hack'n Slash game in which you have to face hordes of enemies using weapons found in the scenario, use different weapons and make different combos to defeat the zombies that have dominated the kingdom, but be careful too you're fragile like an undead.

name: Disaster Plan Z
summary: Disaster Plan Z is a hardcore single-player shooting survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players need to utilize various weapons along with their unique skills, construct different buildings, and continuously upgrade to resist the invasion of countless zombies and mutant creatures.

name: Diatomic
summary: Diatomic is the movement shooter with gun juggling, epic boss fights, hardcore parkour and more blood and chaos than the term "fantasy violence" should probably allow for! Kill - Steal weapon - kill again!

name: Disrtust and Goliath Premium Survival Bundle
summary: Here we present our most lovable survival titles Distrust and Goliath to you!

name: Dice Player One
summary: "Dice Player One" is a roguelike strategy game where dice reign supreme! Roll your dice, seize pivotal moments, and transform limited chances into boundless opportunities. Conquer challenges, unearth hidden secrets, and master the art of dice manipulation!

name: Disaster Slayer
summary: Be a national secret agent with special abilities to face disasters. Leap across buildings to avoid lava in a disaster-stricken city. Procure vital national assets and classified documents. Drive an evacuation vehicle through debris-filled streets to reach the safe zone.

name: Dish Up Fruit
summary: Dish Up Fruit is a 3D puzzle game where you combine fruits and arrange them on a plate. Enjoy the colorful design and changing fruits as you play. Load up on lots of fruit and beat your high score now!

name: Dice 'n Goblins
summary: Explore a mysterious dungeon in this dungeon-crawler RPG. Fight with dice in turn based combat. Use your skills to make combos and beat bad luck. Loot, buy and upgrade your equipment to build a dice pool able to fend your foes, monsters and humans alike!

name: Ding Dong Dang
summary: Ding Dong Dang is the most interesting casual MMO game! Series of the Crayon Shin-chan are waiting for discovery! There are three islands here to explore. Each island has its own style. Double fun to invite friends to play together! Ding Dong Dang will definitely bring you infinite happiness!

name: Die drei???: Plan der Chamäleonbande
summary: A wave of sophisticated robberies is keeping the whole country on tenterhooks. The well-camouflaged "Chameleon Gang" is said to be behind it. Strangely enough, the places and times of the burglaries coincide with the tour schedule of a popular singing duo. Are the musicians behind the crimes? Bob goes along on tour and investigates undercover. But where are Justus and Peter?

name: Digital Exorcist: CF1_Defrag
summary: After the mysterious death of a Superstar Idol, disgraced DATA Agent Sawyer must face his ultimate challenge yet, being an undercover high school teacher while also keeping the Mississipi Inaka safe from Daemonic influence.

name: Dirty Crown Scandal
summary:
Four men who demand a relationship under the pretext of survival.

“Have you never thought that if I can’t have it, I might as well ruin you?”

A chill ran down Matias’ spine at the sound of a voice that was kind and smooth, yet ominous.
The laughter had remained in the man’s face faded, replaced by a stark emotionless expression as he added dryly.

name: Dino Precision Platformer
summary: Dino Precision Platformer is an intuitive platformer game in which you play as a cute little dinosaur. The main feature of the game is that the platforms on which the dinosaur must jump appear and disappear at certain points in time.

name: DinD
summary: Will the Earth be better off when it loses humans？ 'DinD' is a 3rd person action-adventure,Walking in a world where mankind has disappeared, but not in peace。 Explore worlds that are no longer familiar, slay all sorts of monstrous creatures, and find out the answers to the world。

name: Dirty Love
summary: Dirty Love - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Digital Meow
summary: Digital Meow is a vaporwave platformer where a little cat journeys through a digital world to find a new home. Overcome lasers, spikes, and cannons in this nostalgic and challenging adventure!

name: Dig
summary: Dig through the earth in a remote controlled drill. Collect enough money to earn your freedom.

name: Diabotical Rogue
summary: Diabotical Rogue is an online, PvP, first-person shooter with roguelike systems. Made for FPS enthusiasts, players can experience fast-paced gameplay in buttery smooth movement, combined with the power of roguelike upgrade choices.

name: Dimension Pirates
summary: Here is the ultimate, third-person bullet hell game. Help save the universe and humanity by blasting away a wide array of villains that are trying to take over multiple dimensions.

name: Dishop
summary:
In the year 2063, human civilization teeters on the brink of collapse as the world descends into a devastating chaos, wrought by resource scarcity, relentless warfare, and rampant pollution. However, tragedy reaches new dimensions when an unexpected event ravages the Earth.

An outlaw, sentenced to the death penalty for a series of heinous acts, emerges as his dark past intertwines with the struggle for the survival of all humanity. At the heart of the chaos, the fate of the human race is at stake in a colossal confrontation, where the indomitable will of an anti-hero challenges the relentless force of an unparalleled event.

name: Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred - Expansion Bundle
summary: Prepare to unleash the next chapter of Diablo IV with Vessel of Hatred and uncover what evil lies ahead in the continuation of the critically acclaimed action-RPG.

name: Dimensional Phobos Threat
summary: Dimensional Phobos Threat You are trapped in a cursed place in this horror investigation game for 1 to 4 players that you can play with your friends. The only way to lift the curse is to search the place and find and destroy the cursed items according to the clues

name: Died
summary: Survive amidst colleagues turned into monsters due to a virus leak in this horror game. Explore the 10-floor underground lab to uncover the secrets.

name: Dice Player One: Trailer
summary: "Dice Player One" is a roguelike strategy game where dice reign supreme! Roll your dice, seize pivotal moments, and transform limited chances into boundless opportunities. Conquer challenges, unearth hidden secrets, and master the art of dice manipulation!

name: Disney Illusion Island: Mystery in Monoth
summary: Curious clues are popping up across Monoth, and Dash Dolphin needs your help to find them. Locate clues, close cases, and solve this brand-new detective mystery.

name: Distraught
summary: Find your way through an abandoned village in DISTRAUGHT. A first person Atmospheric thriller with unique pixelized graphics. You find yourself on a highway looking for a way to fix your car. When you come across a nearby gas station, it seems to be abandoned. Or is it?

name: Direction! Level Up!
summary: Upgrade your skills by accurately pressing the arrow keys! Monsters are approaching your crystal, and it's up to your speed and reaction time to defend it. Of course, if you have a good sense of rhythm, you'll become even more powerful!

name: Divinastros
summary: An astronomical gambling game. Fight the Olimpians while each Zodiac sign affects your cards differently in a deeply satisfying deckbuilder game. Fight Greek beasts, discover Tarot Cards and climb the Olimpus searching for revenge.

name: Die-abolical
summary: Move the dice to destroy all other dice in every level if your value is higher.

name: Die Feen
summary:
This appears to be an island or a peninsula.
This is because the Nider and Loub tribes do not have the ability to draw maps, the Erlmutel tribe does not have the personality to travel far to draw maps, and the Ferns are not even interested in topography, so there is only one person who knows it well. There was no one there either.

name: Disorder: Save Your Family
summary:
Ensnared in a sinister game of life and death, a young gamer must solve a series of chilling word puzzles to rescue his family from the clutches of The Ghoul—a malevolent and infamous dark web content creator.

With each puzzle solved, the grip of terror tightens; each failure broadcasts the family's plight to an audience of miscreants on the dark web, escalating the stakes in a relentless battle against time and terror.

As players progress, they navigate a twisted narrative where their choices shape the fate of an innocent family, adding layers of suspense and moral dilemma to their harrowing journey.

name: Diamond Detective
summary: Stop thief! Calling all detectives! The city of Gemopolis has fallen victim to a clever jewel thief. Private eyes have work to do in Diamond Detective.

name: Digital Dreams
summary: Digital Dreams is a acid fueled trip into the digital realm, an assault on your senses, and a dive into an alternate reality. A set of 8 maps, mostly around the micro-slaugter/lock in fight framework, but not shy of Tyson designs or platforming only maps.

name: Dinomod Enhanced
summary:
An update to the original Dinomod, Dinomod Enhanced is a continuation of the project, with new enhancements after added after the original project stopped being updated.

Dinomod Enhanced is the most up-to-date enhancement mod for Dinosaur Planet, and it is distributed standalone or via DinoLauncher.

name: Dishonored 2: Steelbook Edition
summary: Dishonored 2 is a first-person action video game and the sequel to Dishonored. It borrows many of the gameplay elements from the first opus: players define their own play style by blending action, assassination, stealth, mobility and combat. Combining tools at their disposal, players are allowed options to eliminate enemies, whether they choose to pursue them unseen or ruthlessly attack head on. Dishonored 2 features the same campaign style as its predecessor in which the protagonist must advance through a series of missions.

name: Diamond Painting ASMR
summary: Let your imagination shine as you create stunning art with diamonds!

name: Direct Line
summary: You bought an old-fashioned phone from a yard sale, thinking it would look cool in your room...until it rings in the middle of the night. You answer, only to hear a mysterious voice that claims you called them. Wait... then why did the phone ring?

name: Di Feng Long Huang
summary: Currently is a mining minigame, and cultivation minigame, There are four routes for the protagonist to choose from, and the gameplay is to earn money by mining, Then click the button on the right to randomly form NPCS and form families.

name: Diverse Defenders
summary: Diverse Defenders is a strategy game that combines Roguelike and Go elements. Here, you will be able to recruit characters with unique skills and form a powerful hero army. Go deep into various levels and defeat powerful bosses to achieve ultimate victory!

name: Divine Dynamo Flamefrit
summary: "Divine Dynamo Flamefrit" is bringing back classic 2D action! Play as the hero Yuto in top-down slashing adventure stages, and pilot the magical robot Flamefrit for first-person boss battles! Master both styles of gameplay to restore peace to the parallel world of Hologard!

name: Dicey Demons
summary: Do battle against your foes in our newest adventure, Dicey Demons! Choose from an array of enchanted dice to summon adorable (yet killer) demon monsters to do slay your enemies. Make your way through trials and tribulations to earn your freedom through strategic survival and careful planning!

name: Dino Tribe: New Era
summary: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Dice Dice Dice
summary: This is a casual deck-building game based on dice rolling. Players will rely on their choices and some luck to achieve victory.

name: Dice
summary:
Dice is a game where you click on a die to make a number increase.

Leave the game idle to collect adorable dice in your Steam inventory!

name: Distance: Console Edition
summary: Melding the intensity of arcade racing with the agility of parkour, Distance catapults you into a neon-soaked world shrouded in mystery. Adapt quickly using your car’s abilities to jump, flip, and fly to overcome deadly hazards and survive.

name: Director Simulator
summary: You, who lack talent, always have strange dreams. Until one day, all kinds of beautiful women from dreams entered your life one by one. You will experience an unprecedented legendary journey from a first person perspective.

name: Disorder
summary: Escape the department store and uncover the hidden truth in this full 3D roguelike dungeon crawler

name: Distant Garden
summary: An exploration and building game inspired by Minecraft and LSD Dream Simulator.

name: DinoTribe
summary: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Dice with the Devil 2
summary: Out-luck your opponents in Dice with the Devil 2, a horror themed deckbuilder where you unlock and collect special dice, customise them, and strategize your best hand of 3 to win your opponents' souls.

name: Dig a Road
summary: This is a puzzle, pixel style game about how to dig a road.

name: Disney Speedstorm: Season 8 - Journey of Emotions
summary: The “Journey of Emotions” season, inspired by Disney and Pixar’s Inside Out, brings a memorable adventure and content to the game, including the brand-new Riley's Mind racing environment! Racers Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness are revving up their engines to take you on an emotion-filled racing challenge.

name: Dino Jump
summary: Dino Jump is an endless runner, where you control a dinosaur with a pistol, and a lot of skins to be more stylish!

name: Dik Journey
summary: An NSFW match-3 game for fabulous gay or bisexual gaymers, offering light-hearted entertainment and relaxation. Players progress through match-3 rounds, developing their power and skills to conquer handsome and hot guys within the game, engaging in NSFW interactions with them.

name: Dino Shift
summary: In this game you help the dino collect the blocks. You can get them only if you have the same colour as they. You just have to change your colour and they are yours. But it will not always be very easy, find out for yourself.

name: Dinos
summary: Hatch eggs, collect dinosaurs, and trade them with friends! Get free eggs every few hours or trade your extra dinosaurs for more eggs!

name: Digs01
summary: Oldschool episode with nine small to medium-sized levels including a start map and a secret level. The maps are around id quality in terms of construction, style and gameplay. It also features a new rocket enforcer enemy type.

name: Distant
summary: A mysterious object brings a former detective to a distant place in the middle of nowhere, where the worst nightmares clash with reality. Are you prepared to face your fears in what might be your last investigation?

name: Dictionary Blaster
summary: Learn English words without the pain through a selection of arcade style action games. Over 1000 verbs and nouns are featured in multiple categories with corresponding pictures and audio.

name: Divine Trials
summary: Will you choose your angel... or your devil?

name: Dirty League
summary: Assemble a team of 5 daring girls and compete against other heroes in captivating match-3 team battles. Discover the best combination among hundreds of abilities and effects that will help you rise to the top of the Pleasure Tower and claim the throne of the universe’s greatest champion!

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Infernal Hordes
summary: The most ferocious demonic forces have erupted into Sanctuary. Combat demonic hordes in the new Infernal Hordes feature in both Seasonal and Eternal Realms. Pursue new hellish powers with over 50 new Uniques and Legendaries. Cross paths with Lilith’s followers who warn of Sanctuary’s imminent demise at Mephisto’s hand. Pursue new rewards through the Battle Pass, Season Journey, and a new Seasonal Progression.

name: DingDongVG's Summer Resort
summary: Ding Dong has just received an exclusive invitation to a luxurious 5-star gaming resort, with the highlight of his stay being the world premiere screening of the DINGDONGVG GAMING AWARDS! In the absence of the Electronic Entertainment Expo, this resort has become the hotspot for a wide assortment of gaming personalities, video game mascots, and beloved sponsored products! Arriving at the resort - it seems that not everything is going according to plan... can you prepare everything in time for the big premiere?

name: Discrete Orange
summary:
Discrete Orange is a puzzle-platformer featuring a one-of-a-kind gameplay mechanic.

The action unfolds in a discrete, turn-based world, where all movement is non-continuous. Answering the call for adventure and their love of sweets, a cute little Orange embarks on a mission to refill its chocolate stash, scattered across 20 puzzle-filled levels. In this world, enemies and platforms only move when the Orange moves, turning each step into a strategic and fun challenge.

name: DiggerSim: Excavator Simulator
summary:
In this non-VR port, DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully manoeuvre your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll have challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

name: Dino Market
summary: Animal friends to keep you company while you work on other tasks. Run a cozy market, play with your chat during streams or use productivity tools to help you focus. All from your desktop!

name: Disney Pixel RPG
summary: Crossover Disney mobile RPG, with simple controls and a pixel/retro art style.

name: Digimon Card Game Tutorial App
summary:
A tutorial app that lets you experience the trading card game "Digimon Card Game" to be released in 2020! Enjoy Digimon Card Game on your smartphone or tablet! Learn how to play Digimon Card Game! Equipped with "Tutorial Mode" to understand the basic rules and "Free Battle Mode" to actually play! Play with 3 different start decks!
You can enjoy a free battle using the half deck of the 3 start deck! Experience the fun of Digimon Card Game with Digimon Teaching App!

name: Dinosaur Running
summary: Dinosaur Run "is a casual parkour type single player game, where players control dinosaurs to escape modern civilization and the chasing tyrannosaurus rex, constantly running, crossing every obstacle and danger, and finally escaping danger. Let's start together with more friends.

name: Divine Light
summary: This game is a shooter where players pilot a high-tech spacecraft through vast skies.

name: Difference
summary: An officer who decided to take the subway home was trapped. Each time he returned to the same station, which is endlessly repeated, but something different from the original. You will need to detect and mark all the anomalies to get out.

name: Disjunction
summary: A small mapset containing 11 thematically and visually diverse maps. Most of them quite long and difficult.

name: Distant Shores
summary: Distant Shores is the first and only book of the Distant Shores series.

name: Dirty Little Secrets
summary: Dirty Little Secrets is the first and only book of the Dirty Little Secrets series.

name: Diamond
summary: Diamond is the NEW interactive clicker game in town! Simply click the diamond and every 15 minutes you will get a diamond with the chance of receiving one of the ultra rare coveted diamonds!

name: Disciples II Mobile
summary:
One of the greatest turn-based strategy goes mobile, keeping athmosphere of original PC game, with all key features like authentical battle mode, storyline etc!
The game takes place in a fictional world Nevendaar. At the beginning of the game the player chooses a class of a ruler: Alderman, Warlord or Archmage. Each ruler has his bonuses, defining the style of the game. “Disciples” game process includes two components: a capital improvement that gives access to new troops and abilities, as well as the study of magic spells, used on the strategic map; and use the heroes in the lead of small detachments to conduct reconnaissance, making attacks and seizure of lands and resources.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Hatred Rising
summary:
Mephisto’s hatred has spread far and wide, creating nightmarish monstrosities to roam the land and reinstilling a sense of dread in the hearts of Sanctuary’s denizens. No one and nowhere is safe from the Lord of Hatred’s maddening influence, not even you.

Stand against encroaching hatred with fearsome new power in Diablo’s latest major update. Experience updated progression systems, more levels, gain all-new skills, discover new items, grow your glyphs to a new legendary level, and test your mettle in new difficulty levels that reward the most daring. Seek out and take down the Realmwalkers and explore the Seething Realms. Unite with allies via Party Finder and save Sanctuary from the relentless tide of Mephisto’s corruption.

name: DigDigDrill
summary: DigDigDrill is an underground mining and resource collecting game. Dig freely for minerals and treasures. Use the items you collect to forge your original drills in a hack-and-slash style equipment system.

name: Diner Out
summary: Merge matching kitchen ingredients to cook delicious dishes and keep hungry customers happy in this cozy game. Turn your café into the talk of the town!

name: Disconnect
summary: Late-night call with your friend keeps on DISCONNECTING. What'd you do if your friend wasn't who you thought they were?

name: Dice Make 10!
summary:
New type puzzle uses dice and make 10.
Two modes of puzzles, “Inserting Puzzle” and “Falling Block Puzzle”, are available

name: Disney's The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea
summary: Disney's The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea is a PC CD-Rom game based on the movie of the same name. The game has the player follow Ariel as she introduces us to her daughter, Melody, as they both go on magical adventures throughout the underwater world of Atlantica.

name: Dig Dug Island: Minami no Jima no Pukapukapon
summary: A short-lived MMO based on Dig Dug II, developed by VerX.

name: Digital Tamers 2
summary:
Tamers from all around the world, it's time to digitize once again!!
The long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed casual fighting fan game "Digital Tamers: ReBorn" is finally here!

Raise, battle, and evolve!
Embark on the Digital World and find new friends, adventures, and surprises! With more than 100 challenges, 50 unique quests, and more than 380 different Digimon to collect, the Digital World is yours to explore as you wish!

name: Digable Planet
summary:
You're the only one that can save Mankind's fate. Find the artefact buried deep beneath the surface of the planet and be a true hero!

The Galactic Governor has spoken: you're Mankind's only hope! Find the artefact buried deep beneath the surface of this unstable planet to give Mankind a chance for a brighter future!

Hint: There are several artefacts buried on the planet but only one will save Mankind's future!

name: Distancy
summary: Distancy is a tightly made with passion, tough as nails, Game Boy Color-inspired 2D platformer with various other inspirations! Originally, the game started out small but blossomed into a full team for its creation. Feel the world come to life before your very eyes!

name: Dice, Destiny and Death
summary: Fairy tales were truth, Koschei has awakened, and along with him, all the unclean creatures. Hut on chicken legs, nymphs, water spirits, and other beings may seem cute, but only until they have fed on your flesh. We don’t need a hero, we need someone who will survive!

name: Din's Champion
summary: Mine and gather resources, craft useful items, and explore a dynamic, evolving world all while fighting off the evil gods' minions and machinations in this side scrolling, action RPG. Become a Din's Champion and stop Valta's new scheme to destroy the world. Oh, and beware of exploding barrels...

name: Disney Speedstorm: PlayStation Plus Exclusive Pack
summary:
This pack includes:
- Baloo Wildboost Logo Avatar
- Baloo Sterling Legacy Suit
- Baloo Wildboost Sterling Edition Livery

name: Digdig
summary: A casual game where you turn a crank and dig the ground more and more!

name: Diffusion
summary: Diffusion is a total-conversion mod in its own universe, based on Half-Life SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine.

name: Dick Tracy
summary: The Mega Drive/Genesis port of Dick Tracy features upgraded visuals to go with the hardware compared to its Master System version.

name: Dick Tracy
summary:
Dick Tracy is a tie in to the 1990 movie adaptation of the classic comic strip. It is a side scrolling action game, where you control Dick Tracy as he moves through five stages, shooting gangsters with an assortment of weapons.

The MS-DOS and Atari ST versions looks and plays the same, the main difference in those versions is their distinct music due to hardware and the complete lack of sound effect during gameplay.

name: Dick Tracy
summary: The Commodore 64 port was released 'as is', and a lot of features from the original version was either not working as intended or completely removed.

name: Dick Tracy
summary: The ZX Spectrum port was coded from programmed from scratch and retains the same design but the graphics was re-done for the hardware. Another notable difference is that there is no sound.

name: Dick Tracy
summary: The Amstrad CPC port was programmed from scratch and features re-done graphics and has sound during gameplay.

name: Diluvian Ultra: Awakening
summary:
Diluvian Ultra: Awakening shows a never-before seen part of Diluvian Ultra's story, preceding the events of the main game. As a young Diluvian Knight, stage a heroic defense against insurmountable odds, in this single-player FPS with a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat.

Witness the events preceding the story of Diluvian Ultra in this free, stand-alone FPS. Embody a young Diluvian Knight, Qasar, and face the brutal Myrmidon invasion of your tomb-ship. Find and protect the sarcophagus of Attila, your Lord, and ensure he survives to set in motion the events of Diluvian Ultra.

Featuring a brand-new level, new characters, story and dialogues, Diluvian Ultra: Awakening is an excellent introduction for new explorers of the game’s universe, as well as an interesting new addition to veterans who have already completed the first chapter of Diluvian Ultra.

name: Digging for Worms
summary: Dig up worms while looking for money. Find five coin caches to win.

name: Dinosaur RPG: Dino Survival Simulator Survivor
summary: Survive the Past! Unleash prehistoric power evolve, explore, conquer!

name: Dino Crisis
summary: A port of Dino Crisis, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Dimensional Double Shift
summary:
From the creators of Job Simulator comes an all new omniversal hand tracked cooperative multiplayer game: Dimensional Double Shift!

Assemble a team of up to 4 friends to run the Gas N’ Grill, an omnidimensional diner and garage. Work your hardest to please your “helpful” AI manager ALICE, or ignore her — she’s only a hologram. Fix, refuel, shred, smash, and torch as you help the citizens of the omniverse. The balance of floating roadside convenience rests in you and your friends’ hands!

name: Disposition
summary: Disposition is an escape-room-inspired game about strategic memory placement. You go through a sequence of engaging tasks where you must detect anomalies and observe details, all while being timed. These challenges change every floor you ascend.

name: Diner City
summary: Choose your restaurant type and upgrade it with the new appliances to reach the money goal faster than your competitor.

name: Dinosaur Zookeeper
summary:
Dinosaur Zookeeper is a casual management game about a zoo filled with dinosaurs. The game screen is divided in small tiles and the player gets to pick and place dinosaurs, and put a fence around them. Every day a certain number of visitors arrives and the player needs to make sure they do not get hurt when the dinosaurs break out of their fenced enclosure. For each day that the zoo survives without being run down by trampling dinos, the player receives income and gets access to new types of dinosaurs. After the first week new goals are offered when you do not put up new fences, make sure that less visitors die than the day before, or survive a PETA inspection. While placing the dinosaurs and putting down fences, the game is paused. When done, everything comes to life for about ten seconds and then a tally is made. Generally the player cannot interfere during those seconds, except with some emergency measures.

Each dino has specific characteristics. Some can sit together, while others need to stay away from each other. Certain dinosaurs need lots of space and others get angry when too many fences surround them. Once they get angry, they knock down fences, attack other dinosaurs and eat visitors. When this happens too often, the game is over. Money can be spent on upgrades:* One-Shot gun: emergency tool to stop rampant dinosaurs

name: Digbeat: Godot Deeper
summary: A rhythm digging arcade game. Move to the beat and try to reach new depths!

name: Divers
summary:
Control Dylan, Orlok and Thyme as they explore the watery depths.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: DistortedCode: Seija no Nokoriga
summary:
DistortedCode is a Japanese horror otome game in development for the Nintendo Switch.

"I am––
about to be killed soon."

It's the end of June, and summer vacation is just around the corner.
The students are in high spirits as the longest break of the year approaches. In stark contrast to them is a girl with a cold, resigned look in her eyes.

That girl has a secret.

name: Diction
summary:
Diction is a word based puzzle game, where you have to make as many unique words as possible.
You're given a starting word, and your goal is to turn it into a different word by adding, changing or removing only a single letter at a time. Then keep it up by changing your new word into a different one.

name: Disorderly
summary:
Disorderly is a daily trivia game where you try to put a group of items in the correct order, based on some criteria, in as few guesses as possible. In addition to the daily games, there are occasionally extra games that are either too difficult or niche to use as the daily game.

New games go live at (or sometimes shortly after) 12:00 AM Eastern Time.

name: Dinocop
summary: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side by side, you're the one and only Dinocop. And you got a meaty case to crack. In this mystery game set in a day cycle, uncover secrets scattered through time.
