name: Dicealot
summary: A roguelike dice roller with deckbuilding elements

name: Dice Strategy
summary: Simulation game using a dice. Game for those who love prisoner's base.

name: Dice of Arcana
summary: Dice of Arcana is a wicked roguelite dice game. Survive a blood-drenched trip on a caravan led by a malevolent puppet. Bet your fingers, break the rules with special dice, face major arcana and prevail: losing means death.

name: Dicey Chess
summary: A chess game in which the throw of the dice decides how far you can move.

name: Disaster Blaster
summary: Disaster Blaster is a roguelite bullet heaven card game where you play a questionably sane scientist building the most over-the-top weapon in the universe. Evolve your blaster’s card sequence and let it rip against hordes of alien enemies across a galaxy of unfortunate planets.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Lucky Dragon
summary: The 11th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings the Mulan Realm to the game (inspired by 1998's Mulan), the new characters Mulan and Mushu, the Majesty and Magnolias Star Path, a new event called Memory Mania and a new feature of cooking delivery daily quests by Remy.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Dapper Delights
summary: The 12th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings Tiana (from Disney's Princess and the Frog) to the Valley, a new restaurant building, a new Stall for buying prepared meals, the Dapper Delights Star Path and general quality of life improvements.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Jungle Getaway
summary: The 13th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings a new day-night cycle to The Lion King Realm, the new characters The Night Show Star Path and the return of the Halloween seasonal event Trick or Treat.

name: Disciple
summary: As a fledgling ascetic, you need to explore this vast world and collect rare and precious herbs to refine various elixirs.Players need to use their wisdom and skills, and accurately control the movement of the pills during refining according to the location of the pills on the distribution map.

name: Distressed
summary: 5 Player Co-Op horror investigation game. Instead of sanity, ghost draw energy from equipment to hunt. Ghost also gets helpers along the way. New take on ghost hunting.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale
summary:
Be whisked away to the Vale and embark on an enchanting adventure with a cast of new characters including the Lorekeeper – a magical book holding this fantastical land together. However, a happily ever after is a ways off as you discover that discordance between two iconic Disney Villains - Maleficent from Disney’s Sleeping Beauty and Hades from Disney’s Hercules, has torn this land apart.

Causing mysterious phenomenon across The Vale’s three biomes – the Bind, Everafter, and Mythopia – their conflict has yielded Ink seeping out of the very ground and sent the pages of the Lorekeeper near and far as enchanted page pieces called Snippets.

name: Ding Dong Die
summary: Even a broken clock is right twice a day

name: Diamond Sword, Wooden Sword
summary: The game is set in the fantasy universe of Nick Perumov's literary saga of the same name. Humans, after defeating the dwarves, elves and orcs, founded the Empire, which is ruled by seven Magical Orders. However, the future of the state is in jeopardy. Deep in the Drung Forest, the sacred wooden sword Immelstorn has awakened, and in the caves of the Foothill Tribe, the diamond Dragnir - artifacts with destructive power. At the center of the battle for the iconic blades is the protagonist Fess, a mercenary of the Grey League. He will have to demonstrate his strength, agility, and magical abilities to find the swords and save the world, thus disproving the ancient prophecy about the end of time.

name: Digimon World 2 Alternative
summary:
Digimon World 2 Alternative aims to be a new Digimon World 2 experience for both seasoned veterans of the game, as well as newer players!

Features:

Story and dialogue edited to reinterpret events
New Digimon to recruit and Digivolve into (Including DNA-Digivolution!)
Brand new domains to explore with new layouts
Digimon Skill AP, MP cost, and effects are refactored
Menu and Battle UI redone to support complete Digimon Skill information
Digimon Re-name Attendant in Coliseum allows renaming of Digimon
…and more!

name: Digital Soul Data
summary: Digital Soul Data is a top-down bullet hell shooter. Play as a hacker, Mia, who uses avatar NB4 to blast her way through cyberspace and retrieve her sister's Digital Soul from eternal virtual slavery.

name: Dixit World
summary:
Dixit World is the adaptation of the famous board game Dixit.

While keeping in mind the originality of the game, the game on mobile application is a unique experience by taking advantage of the support of the video game.
Enjoy the classic gameplay of Dixit or create and share your Worlds with your friends.

name: Dizzy Hero
summary: Transform into a hero with your wobbly moves in this unique action game!

name: Dino-Ducks Dash
summary:
Dino-Ducks Dash is a 2D Hi-Score Multiplayer Runner with PvP and Co-Op or you can even play it as a single player to beat the leaderboard.

It has a couch co-op mode and an online co-op mode, but you can also beat the stuffing out of the other cute Dino Ducks with a machete!

name: Dirty Cop
summary:
A new drug hits the city, you partner is murdered and now you are the prime suspect, will you keep yourself clean, or will you go dirty like everyone else? You choose.

A mix between Hotline Miami and a cop thriller. You are a police officer that through his investigation will have moral choices to make, you can either arrest the suspects, or get high* on their supply while you execute them point blank, the choices you make will change the ending and how you play.

name: Dimension Shift
summary:
Dimension Shift is a puzzle, action, and adventure game in which you are a stick figure drawn from Pictochat. You can use the mouse as a stylus to draw platforms, walls, shields, portals, stairs, and more!
The game is a parody of classic Nintendo games, with thirteen familiar worlds from your favorite series.

name: Dirty Swamp
summary: Dirty Swamp is a total conversion mod for Gothic II Gold Edition set in its own world and story with a revamped magic and combat system, new soundtrack and tons of new content ready to explore.

name: Dissolving Disarray
summary: Dissolving Disarray is an RPG Maker adventure horror game. Awaken as a girl lost in a vine-clad room with no recollection of her past. Imprisoned within an otherworldly tower, she must piece together the fragments of her forgotten life and escape before succumbing to the tower's maddening absurdity.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Sew Delightful
summary: The 14th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings 'Sally from Disney Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas as a new character, new Floating Islands to decorate and the Frost & Fairies Star Path.

name: Disney Game Shots: Sparamu
summary: Disney Game Shots: Sparamu is part of the Disney Game Shots series developed by Disney Interactive. This specific game draws its theme from the animated movie Mulan and features arcade-style shooting gallery mechanics where players engage in challenges inspired by the film's setting.

name: Dimensional Illusion
summary: Dimensional illusion is a real-time strategy game that combines role-playing with friendly placement. Each map scene is a new experience, and by combining friendly formations and skill combinations, lead your character to defeat powerful bosses.

name: Dirtbag Mahjong
summary:
Lie, cheat, and steal your way to victory in Dirtbag Mahjong!

Choose your character and join five other dirtbags for a night of riichi mahjong - with a twist. Nobody here plays fair, and they've all got some dirty tricks up their sleeves.

Dirtbag Mahjong is a complete and beginner-friendly mahjong experience that also offers some party game surprises to keep experienced players guessing.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Return of the Shakturi
summary: An ancient evil is returning to the vast universe of Distant Worlds 2. The Return of the Shakturi is the third expansion and first feature expansion for the acclaimed 4X space strategy game, Distant Worlds 2. It adds a full endgame crisis and story, along with numerous new gameplay features and improvements that elevate the experience to new heights.

name: Die for the Economy!
summary: Blast evil robots in a retro psychedelic maze of an office, as you bring down the security servers and make your way home. Die for the Economy! is a retro arcade survival game featuring beautiful, chunky pixel art graphics with a psychedelic slant harking back to the old 8-bit game systems.

name: Digseum
summary: Digseum is a short, unique incremental journey about digging up ancient relics and building the greatest museum ever! Excavate for ancient relics across the world, manage your resources and upgrade your abilities, and build the biggest and greatest museum the world has ever seen!

name: Diamond Word
summary: Diamond Word is a word action game where you need to make quick decisions, making the needed words from the letters flying up. Direct the letter to the place where you plan to make a word. Erase unnecessary words, making room on the field for the necessary (Diamond) word.

name: Dispatch
summary: Dispatch is a superhero workplace comedy where choices matter. Manage a dysfunctional team of misfit heroes and strategize who to send to emergencies around the city, all while balancing office politics, personal relationships, and your own quest to become a hero.

name: Die in the Dungeon: Classic
summary: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.

name: Dicey Tales
summary: Roll the dice in your hand! Dicey Tales, a TRPG-inspired game, combines deckbuilding with strategy in a unique SRPG experience. Assemble the ultimate expedition team with a variety of heroes. Defeat powerful bosses through strategic decisions and a bit of luck!

name: DigiGods: Build and Battle
summary: Create, play, & share in a physics-based sandbox environment where you can shoot, parkour, or simulate any type of gameplay you desire, taking the best of VR goofiness.

name: Dino Dash
summary: We get caught collecting a dinosaur's eggs and it's trying not to get caught.

name: Dig Night
summary: Dark comical RPG set in a city at night and a spiritual world.

name: Dino Gaïa
summary:
Dino Gaïa was a free online text-based dinosaur breeding simulation game. Players could choose, raise, and train their dinosaur, ensuring its daily needs such as food, water, and hunting were met.

While it featured some illustrations to enhance immersion, the core gameplay relied on written descriptions and interactive choices within quests.

The game also offered community features, allowing players to interact and participate in various quests and competitions.

name: Diner Simulator: Horror Story
summary: Take on the role of a night shift worker at a small fast food kiosk, where mystery awaits. Your predecessor has vanished under eerie circumstances, and it's now your job to uncover the truth. As you juggle late-night orders, unsettling occurrences start to unravel.

name: Digimon Fusion Fighters
summary: The game's main mechanic is Tapper circles that appear on the screen to damage the enemy Digimon on the screen. Up to 10 types of circles can appear each with its respective effect. In each level you can equip 3 main Digimon, they can DigiXros if they have or Perform their special movements. You can equip from 1 to 8 support Digimon as you level up which you can DigiXros with and increase your Life, Attack, and Defense. By tapping the circles or making a special move or DigiXrosing you can damage the enemy on the screen, every 10 seconds the enemy will attack and you must defeat a series of enemies before your life reaches zero.

name: Dipets
summary: Dipets is a casual RPG where you have to explore and help rebuild the city of a weird world while taking care of a virtual pet.

name: Diddy
summary: Destroy a dark party in Diddy's mansion. Gather your comrades Eminam and 51 Cent and save Justin B from Diddy! You can destroy the party with your friends by experiencing co-op

name: Digital Football League
summary: A Blaseball inspired American Football sim

name: Disney Tanoshii o-Benkyou Series: Mic de Kantan ABC
Disney Tanoshii Oekaki: o-Mise-ya-san o Tsukucchaou!
Dino Running from a Furry: Gamesforfarm
summary: Run, Dino, run! You can't fall into the clutches of Mr. Furry

name: Difficult times
summary: Monsters are attacking!

name: Discopup
summary: In DISCOPUP, you're a seal eager to party, making your way to the most famous nightclub in the city: DiscoPup. However, tonight, the bouncer is only letting dogs in. How will you make it past him?

name: Die by Anything
summary: Welcome to Die by Anything! Make the right choices to survive a “normal day” in the ordinary life of a student or die trying in ways you would never imagine. Trust nothing, no one and try to survive as you figure out what's going on.

name: DienWorlds
summary:
ĐiệnWorlds is a freeware management/sim/strategy game in which you place wires and other components to power houses and businesses, to (in turn) make money from them and (hopefully) make a profit. At its core, ĐiệnWorlds follows the rules of the cellular automaton Wireworld (created by Brian Silverman in 1987). For flavor and for gameplay purposes, other rules and overarching mechanics have been added.

The game has a general "goal" of making money and avoiding high debt, but other than this, it invites the player to discover strategies, arrangements, and setups that work best in their situation. As the developer, I don't even know what kinds of strategies (if any) are "optimal" - but I think that an important element of what makes these types of games fun is this kind of exploration. The underlying Wireworld-like simulation is fun to interact with as well - I'd like to think the game has a certain mathematical "depth" to it. In general, testers have found both the game's micro- and macro- mechanics to be addicting and engaging.

name: Disney The Little Mermaid: Undersea Treasures!
summary: Discover lost items from the mysterious human world above the waves and reveal unique hidden treasures. From the site of an old shipwreck to Ariel's secret grotto, King Triton's throne room to the incredible coral canyons. Find items quickly in each scene to earn bonus points and claim your place on the leaderboard.

name: Divorce Chatroom
summary: A chatsim where you divorce a beautiful man!

name: Dice With Death
summary: Dice With Death is a Dicebuilding Roguelike – Unfortunately you have already died. Fortunately, Death is up for some friendly competition. Collect new dice and their paired relics, create damage stacking combos, and even cheat Death himself to emerge victorious.

name: Dino Ramen Express
summary: From RAMEN to RIFLES! This is an immersive first-person simulation game where players can run their own restaurant empire. The game allows players to devise their own business strategies, from hands-on "guns & blazing" food delivery in the open world to staff management at stores.

name: Distillery & Tavern Duo: Moonshine Inc. + Crossroads Inn: A Fantasy Tavern Sim
summary: Run the inn, brew the moonshine – business awaits!

name: District: Evolution
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Enjoy immersive battles with HD graphics! Stunning effects, weapon sounds, and team play create an immersive FPS experience!

name: Dinosaurs in Place
summary: In this exciting two-dimensional puzzle game, you need to place your prehistoric friends on the grid so that they fit perfectly. Dinosaurs in Place offers 100 unique levels and 40 diverse dinosaurs that will not leave you indifferent.

name: DisplaceMen
summary: Survive as a broke painter in a magic-realist coastal town. To redeem the vanished “mermaid” within a 7-day mystery story with multiple endings, you will gradually reveal the truth of people by making paintings…with weird-ass found objects.

name: Dictionary Glory!
summary:
Try to enter in as many words that fit the prompt as you can correctly!

Choose between Time Trials mode, Lives Mode and the new Zen Mode!

With a simple premise, addicting gameplay loop and over 30 prompts to tackle, Dictionary Glory will keep you coming back for more!

Made with Processing and Java, originally for a class project, it has been expanded on since.

Do you have what it takes to achieve true Dictionary Glory?

name: Dimensions of Mind
summary: Enter to the characters mind and make decisions. The game is played like interactive movie/adventure game with morality choices which influence the outcome which can be: a manipulative, balanced or violent. The game is based on psychology/philosophy and teaches about thoughts and their consequences.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Witchcraft
summary:
The Witches Need Your Help

You’ve been called upon, Wanderer. Harness wondrous and uncanny Witchcraft Powers as you unravel the mystery of who stole the Heads from the Tree of Whispers, earning Favor with the Witches of Hawezar to learn the secrets of their power. Hunt the Tree’s rogue Heads before they further spread madness to the creatures of Sanctuary resulting in new grotesque abominations - the Headrotten. Make use of the new Armory feature to quickly save and swap your builds. Earn Dorian, the new Raven Pet, by completing the Season Journey, discover new Uniques and Legendary Aspects, equip new Runes in Vessel of Hatred, and more.

name: Distant
summary: Imagine yourself diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. How would you see the world? What emotions would you experience? What would your symptoms look like? Answer these questions yourself by playing in the shoes of someone with the disease, first-person.

name: Dice Eater
summary: Dice Eater is a mystery card game based around supernatural powers where players must use their power to uncover the other player's tricks. Use your opponent's tricks against them to turn the tables and win.

name: Dim
summary: Dim, a wandering soul whose light is constantly fading, must use the various abilities it possesses to traverse the dark and dangerous world surrounding it. Jumping through platforms and other dangers, the player must guide this lost soul through the darkness before its light runs out.

name: Dino Crisis
summary: Dino Crisis remastered to be fully playable on modern PCs by Capcom and GOG.

name: Dino Crisis 2
summary: The legendary Dino Crisis 2 is back, fully playable on modern PCs.

name: Dino Crisis Bundle
summary:
Includes:
• Dino Crisis
• Dino Crisis 2

name: Directorate Novitiate
summary: Become Mercury, a ruthless enforcer with deadly arcane power in this thrilling third-person action RPG. By night, hunt killers and battle supernatural Syndicates in the underworld of early 2000s Los Angeles. By day, keep your real life from falling apart.

name: Dimension Escape
summary: Dimension Escape is a tactical card game. Choose your heroes wisely—will you pick a ninja pirate or a robo dinosaur? Equip them with powerful ability cards and defeat all who stand in your way.

name: Dinoblade
summary: Dinoblade is an action RPG game that takes place right after a major event that changed what we know about Dinosaurs. You shall set out on a journey as a young Spinosaurus that can use a Great Sword fighting against other Dinosaurs that uses weapons as well to stop an extinction.

name: Dimensional Dilemma
summary: A first-person physics-based puzzle game reminiscent of Portal. Manipulate the sizes of different objects to forge a path back to your ship.

name: Dinkum Together
summary: 'Dinkum Together' is a pioneer life simulation game currently being developed by 5minlab, a Krafton studio, and is inspired by 'Dinkum', the beloved survival life sim created by Australian developer James Bendon.

name: Disaster Arms: Impact Project B.A.H.N.
summary: Disaster Arms is a 2D run-and-gun boss rush game. Shoot and punch your way through a ceaseless gauntlet of giant alien and robotic lifeforms.

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger
summary: The latest in the Digimon Story series is finally here! In this RPG, unravel a mystery that spans across the human world and the Digital World, collecting and raising a wide variety of Digimon to save the world.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale Bundle
summary: Explore a magical world in Disney Dreamlight Valley alongside Disney and Pixar friends, and travel to the Storybook Vale, a land made up of fairy tales and myths!

name: Dinobreak: Crisis Collection
summary: Dinosaurs have returned in this '90s horror nightmare collection!

name: Dinobreak: Chronicles of Horror Collection
summary: Dinosaurs, zombies, and more await!

name: Dice Trek
summary: Roam the galaxy, destroy enemy ships, and encounter special events as you explore! Make smart decisions with your dice rolls in order to survive. Buy upgrades at Galactic Bazaars, unlock new ships, and manage your fate in the cold expanse of space.

name: Digging a Hole Simulator
summary: Ready to dig into an exciting adventure? Digging a Hole Simulator lets you unearth the mysteries beneath your garden! Grab your shovel and start digging to uncover hidden treasures, ancient relics, and secrets that have been buried for centuries! What lies beneath? Only you can find out!

name: Diesel Knights
summary: Diesel Knights is a 6-v-6, Mech/Movement Shooter set in a pulp-inspired, dieselpunk world.

name: Dice People
summary: Dice People is an incremental game about rolling dice, creating a mass of units, smashing enemies, and gathering resources to get upgrades in a big skilltree.

name: Distant Woods
summary: Start your journey!

name: Dinofurie
summary: Dinofurie is a thrilling multiplayer battle royale where dinosaurs clash in intense survival battles. Choose from a diverse roster of prehistoric creatures, each with unique abilities and playstyles, and fight for dominance in a vast, dynamic world.

name: Discolored Bundle
summary: All the colors have gone missing and it's up to you to bring them back.

name: Diana FreeCell
summary: Diana FreeCell was an online FreeCell game hosted on Princess-Diana.co.uk which was made in memory of Princess Diana.

name: Diana Photo Quiz
summary: Diana Photo Quiz was an online game hosted on Princess-Diana.co.uk in which the player had to identify images of Princess Diana as they are slowly being uncovered.

name: Diana Memory Game No1
summary: Diana Memory Game No1 is one of 2 memory card games on Princess-Diana.co.uk which feature images of Princess Diana.

name: Diana Memory Game No2
summary: Diana Memory Game No2 is the second of 2 memory card games on Princess-Diana.co.uk which feature images of Princess Diana.

name: Disaster Party!
summary: Disaster Party is the perfect game to bring friends together for a good time. The combination of hilarious characters, wild mini-games, and unpredictable movements makes each match a unique experience. Whether you’re playing competitively or just enjoying the absurdity of it all,

name: Disguised Blessing
summary: Disguised Blessing is a dynamic first-person hack-and-slash game focused on fluid movement and ability-centered combat. Use power-ups and special abilities as you slice through enemies, unlock weapon skins, and progress through countless combinations of attributes.

name: Dice with the Devil: Rerolled
summary: Out-luck your opponents in Dice with the Devil, a horror themed autobattler where you unlock and collect special dice, customise them, and strategise to make the best hand of 3 to win your opponents' souls.

name: Divine Orders
summary: Bullet-hell shooter with RPG-like elements such as exploration, growth and reinforcement. In each area, the situation changes, and you have to earn experience scores, acquire materials, level up and strengthen your weapons, and challenge the bosses

name: Digimon Jintrix
summary: Digimon Jintrix was an online card based game.

name: Dig A Hole
summary: Dig, discover, and compete in this multiplayer digging adventure! Unearth rare treasures, sell your findings, upgrade your gear, and uncover hidden secrets beneath the surface. Who will dig the deepest?

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Tales of Agrabah
summary: The 15th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings the new Aladdin Realm, the new characters Aladdin and Jasmine, four new Floating Islands, improvements for cooking and UI, custom size rooms and the Oasis Retreat Star Path.

name: Digital Revolution
summary: This is a casual game that combines math and basic elimination gameplay. If you're confident in your math skills, give it a try! In the game, you'll decide the direction of all the "blocks" and gradually strengthen the "Blue Legion" to defeat the evil "Red Legion."

name: Dice Legends
summary: Dice Legends is a roguelike deckbuilder with dice-driven combat. Roll, flip, and split dice to manipulate your deck, stack powerful effects, and unleash devastating card combos. Make your own luck!

name: Divine Wish
summary: Divine Wish is a fast-paced roguelike shooter with various classes and special abilities. Find your play style, survive waves of enemies, and use artifacts to change the tides of the battle. Die, learn, adapt!

name: Dinotica
summary: Embark on an adventure across a perilous ancient land, exploring diverse regions to discover and hatch loyal dinosaur companions. Together, you'll fight, build, farm, and more, as you work toward creating a unique home that is truly your own.

name: Dioramos
summary: Dioramos is a swift, battle-type board game that tells winners from losers in no delay. In this exhilarating game, the playing order changes unlimitedly with the individualistic characters, while different character and weapon combinations unleash boundless and unique battle tactics including deadly combos, counters, dodges, magic, special attacks and plunder, all guaranteeing heated battles on the board.

name: Disappearance of the Literature Club
summary: Disappearance of the Literature Club is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that takes the story of the original game in an intriguing new direction. The mod explores an alternative scenario in which the protagonist returns to the literature club only to discover that something is very wrong - or perhaps someone is missing.

name: Divide By Sheep 2
summary: In this colorful cartoon world, you will never think that math can be boring! Solve ever-changing puzzles with our fluffy sheep, divide like never before and get the most of an adventure full of riddles! Can you conquer the evil grim reaper from flooding the sheep and become the ultimate math hero?

name: Diver Down
summary: Aim for the deep sea while replenishing your air

name: Dinobreak: Gaiden Collection
summary: Dinosaurs return to retro survival horror…

name: Dimension Warrior
summary: Dimension Warrior is an intense soulslike action adventure game in which you traverse various dimensions, facing powerful enemies in your quest to complete your dangerous mission and return to your own world. The core of the gameplay revolves around defeating powerful bosses.

name: Disney Princess Palace Pets
summary: Welcome to the magical world of Disney Princess Palace Pets! Every princess deserves a loyal companion, and this collection of adorable animals cannot wait to be bathed, styled, and cared for by Belle, Cinderella, Mulan, and more.

name: DigSite
summary: DigSite is archeology sandbox game located in Egypt where you dig, clean and document artifacts you find. Donate rare artifacts to a museum and build your legacy as a legendary archaeologist.

name: Die Harder
summary: A game about clever deaths.

name: Diapers, Please!
summary: An alternative 1920s world where a totalitarian state and impeccable bureaucracy conceal deep secrets. You are the Custodian of Bloodlines at a maternity ward where a fire has destroyed all records, and now your task is to manually match newborns with their parents.

name: Distant Lands: Earendel
summary: Distant Lands: Earendel is a clicker about reality, memory and knowledge

name: Disco Elysium
summary:
Play a detective as you track down a killer and find out what drove them to murder. Discover clues, interview suspects, and piece together the evidence to figure out who’s behind this grisly crime.

Use a range of detective tools from guns to a flashlight as you explore dangerous places that play host to the darker side of humanity. Ask probing questions, make insightful observations, or express your wildest desires as you play cop or something closer to a disaster.

name: Digimon World
summary: A port of digimon world for pc exclusive to Korea

name: Dicey Bugs
summary: A roguelike, turn-based deckbuilder, where you control both sides of the battle using strategy to shape the outcome of each turn. Catch cute bugs, customize your dice, and unlock abilities to build powerful synergies to roll your way to victory!

name: Dice A Million
summary: Have you ever tried rolling 1,000,000 points on some dice? No? Well, now at least you can try.

name: Dino Gun
summary: Inspired by the game cops and robbers, players can either be the gunner or the runners. The gunner has to shoot all the runners before a set amount of seconds while the runners can earn points for every second they are alive. The runners can also pick up items mid game which can help the runners survive longer. Each player does become the gunner at least once. Once all the rounds are finished, the player with the highest number of points wins.

name: Digimon Color Monster Hunter 20th Edition
summary:
A special virtual pet released as a collaboration between Monster Hunter and Digimon.
The base model for it its the 20th Anniversary Color Digimon.

name: Digging a Hole 2025
summary: The earth holds secrets—will you find them?

name: Digimon Alysion
summary: A new Digimon TCG game being developed for mobile.

name: Dino Genesis
summary: Dino Genesis is an action FPS that navigates you through the forgotten island, ISLA GENESIS. You will have to defend yourself from genetically created Dinosaurs, Arachnids and Insects while discovering the dark secrets of the island.

name: Disc Station 98 #2
summary: This edition also includes Toushin Toshi (+18) and a demo for Gokichi-kun Series: Igo Nyuumon Doujou.

name: Digi-Dodgy
summary: 3D collectathon platformer videogame featuring 200 addictive levels. A digital virus has corrupted the DigiWorld. The Bots that reside within are now under the control of the evil MegaBot. The world’s fate lies on the small shoulders of a bot untouched by the virus named Digi.

name: Dinobreak: Couch Co-Op Collection
summary: Is a bundle of survival horror games from developer Dead Drop Studios.

name: Disney Villains Cursed Café
summary: Stir up a fresh take on iconic Disney Villains in this rich visual novel.

name: Disney's House of Mouse: Pack the House
summary:
Customize Mickey's famous club in the Pack the House, a game based on "House Of Mouse" television series.

Level 1: Club Dress-Up game! Have fun and redesign the House of Mouse by using new colors and items!

Level 2: Interior Dress-Up game! Place your items, use your favorite colors, and watch the room change!

Level 3: Help Max to park the House of Mouse guest's cars! Serve the clients in time to get to the next level!

Level 4: Serve delicious food to the Disney characters. Make sure everyone is happy and try not to miss any orders!

Level 5: Run a restaurant in Mikey's Crazy Lounge game. Keep all the customers satisfied by welcoming them, serving them, and entertaining them!

name: Distant Realm
summary: Distant Realm is originally an adventure game from 2006, combined with role-playing elements. Now the experience is masterfully redefined.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Atuuk and Wekkarus
summary: The Galaxy Expands. The fourth Distant Worlds 2 expansion brings two new playable factions – the naive and energetic Atuuk and the mysterious Wekkarus.

name: Die ultimative Brettspiele-Sammlung: Die beliebtesten Brettspiele für die ganze Familie
summary: The collection contains 20 classic board games with entertainment for the whole family: Chess, Connect 4, Checkers, Brain Teaser, Backgammon, Reversi, Ladders and Snakes, Battleship, Pachisi, Dice, Dominoes, Go, Halma, Word Dice, Mahjong, Anagrams, Memory, 3D Tic Tac Toe, Mancala, and Puzzles. Whether for fun against the computer or with the family in the evening, the Ultimate Board Games Collection offers fun for all ages! Many games feature unique video sequences that add atmospheric accompaniment to the gameplay.

name: Digital Legacy of Zero
summary: Battle with creatures you collect to defeat the evil Ruler of the Digital World. Hack and slash through enemy basements, upgrade your own to achieve ultimate evolutions, and summon legendary beasts using your team. Unlock powerful upgrades with devastating combos to conquer the Digital World.

name: Disc Golf Masters
summary: Step onto the course in Disc Golf Masters, the most realistic disc golf game ever. Featuring the world’s top athletes, throw real-world discs on authentic courses. Start your pro career, refine your skills, and push the limits of the sport in the world's first true disc golf game!

name: Dinosaur Cousin Squad
summary: A cozy lil' prehistoric platformer where you help five dinosaurs escape an apocalyptic disaster through five biomes.

name: Die Fast
summary: A cooperative rebellion in a dystopian cyberpunk slaughterhouse - a furry beat 'em up roguelike fighting against the tyranny of the Hog Regime

name: Dinus Escape
summary: Dinus Escape is an 2D precision platformer where you control Dinus, a charming dinosaur who must collect all 3 pieces of meat scattered throughout the level, while the world is about to end! A meteor is on its way, and you have only 10 seconds to help Dinus survive and escape the impending disaster!

name: Dion
summary: Dive into Dion, a multiplayer survival game that transports you to the heart of a brutal world inspired by the great West African empires. Here, only your ingenuity and strength will determine your fate.

name: Disney's Kim Possible: Shopping Avenger
summary: Shopping Avenger is a game from the Disney.com webring. Players control Kim as she prepares for her next mission by grabbing needed items at Club Banana.

name: Digimon: Quest to Save the Net
summary: Quest to Save the Net was a Digimon Flash game created to promote Digimon: The Movie on the now defunct Fox Kids official website. At one point, the site allowed the player to upload their high scores. The game was also included in a CD-ROM extra disk which came packaged with VHS and DVDs of Digimon: The Movie.

name: Discussion Over Dinner
summary: You receive a dinner invite from an awkward new neighbor and things go great.

name: Disclosures
summary: luke harper, a 25 - year old social media influencer, making vlogs about diffrent places..once he found about old hospital building and he decied to make vlog about that..but after reaching that area he found out something horrible at that night..

name: Dimwood
summary: A roguelike deck builder where you venture into the Dimwood, armed with unique modal cards. Rendered in dense 1-Bit pixel art, carefully build your deck and modify your cards to balance offense and utility. Battle your way past increasingly fearsome enemies and defeat the Beast at its heart.

name: Digdigdig
summary: Made for Ludum Dare 57. Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to use your head-drill.

name: Divination
summary: Divination is a desktop-based divination tool that uses the sixty-four hexagrams from the I Ching to interpret the good or bad fortune of future events.

name: Dice Making Ending
summary: Does rolling the dice determine a person's ending?At every crossroad, we've all wondered about this at least once.Enjoy a casual game where you roll the dice and watch endings unfold.You can play various endings in just a short amount of time.

name: Dichotomy
summary: Im Jahr 2234 kämpfen die 13-jährige Victorique und ihre beste Freundin Zoé im überwachten Frankreich gegen die Human Rescue Organisation. Trotz ihrer durch Schizophrenie verzerrten Wahrnehmung verfolgen die beiden Hackerinnen entschlossen ihren Plan, die Menschheit zu befreien.

name: Dicks and Dragons
summary: You will have to solve several puzzles for various erotic and hot themes

name: Digital Influence
summary: You're hired in 2010 to create and manage a groundbreaking social media platform. Your decisions will shape its growth, user trust, and societal impact.

name: Dine 'n Bash
summary: In a world of daunting beasts, brave heroes, and dangerous bandits, someone has to serve up the grub! Become the new owner of The Belligerent Dweller, the most popular tavern in the town of Thurgon. Dash around delivering orders, stacking items, and dodging projectiles that fly your way!

name: Dino Clicker
summary: Tap repeatedly to crack open an ancient egg and collect 9 different dinosaurs, from common to rare and elusive creatures. Try out this addictive clicker game that challenges you to unlock them all through luck and perseverance!

name: Dinos TD
summary: Prepare for prehistoric pandemonium as you command a dinosaur herd against an insect invasion! Control the battlefield by drawing paths, setting traps, and charting biomes. Discover a diverse cast of dinosaurs with a range of unique abilities. Get ready for a primordial tower-defense adventure!

name: Dirty Halloween
summary: Dirty Halloween is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Discover Old D'Hanis
summary: Step into the past and unravel the rich history of Old D'Hanis. Explore this 19th-century town, from Alsatian and German settlers of 1847 to Black and Mexican families post-Civil War. Unearth archival fragments, archaeological photos, and oral histories to piece together the town's alluring stories.

name: Disseminate
summary: This game immerses players in an anime-styled world where they take on the role of a male protagonist dressed in a suit uniform, exploring around residential areas.

name: Disney's Kim Possible
summary: Kim Possible (also known as Kim Possible: Tower Trouble in Europe) is a Kim Possible video game for the Java ME mobile devices, released in North America and Europe in 2007.

name: Dino & Chill
summary: Hatch and collect adorable dinosaurs that roam your screen while you work or play! Watch them gather gems, unlock perks, and customize your setup. Move and resize them freely, even across multiple monitors. But be careful—these dinos can get messy, so don't forget to clean up after them!

name: Dispatch
summary: You're called to a mysterious house for a late night medical emergency.

name: Dino Blitz
summary: Break the blocks in each level with your cannon. Edit your own levels and share them with your friends.

name: Dicewood
summary:
Dicewood is a fantasy horror turn-based roguelike deck-builder where adorable forest animals band together to escape the relentless hunter.

Fleeing into a dark, twisted forest filled with ancient horrors, creepy monsters, and cannibal tribes, player must strategically combine different animals, overcome nightmarish foes, and make their way to the river to start a new life.

name: Dive Into The Survival
summary: Dive Into The Survival is a cooperative zombie apocalypse survival game.

name: Dig! Dig! Dino!
summary: is a game about digging... for dinosaurs bones and other treasure!

name: Dino SpeedBoat
summary: Crazy arcade game, with loveable hero - Dino the dinosaur. Try yourself in a wild race against time and ride to the victory.

name: Dig!
summary: Dig is a thrilling arcade game developed by Crescent Moon Games LLC for the iPhone. In this game, you play as Douglas Chase, a not-so-great archaeologist working for a failing museum. Your mission is to dig up objects to save your job and the museum.

name: Displacement
summary: Displacement is a gripping action-horror with elements of immersive storytelling. You play as a psychologist who finds themselves at a polar station where the staff have fallen victim to a mysterious madness. Keep your sanity — or lose your mind. The choice is yours.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Wonderland Whimsy
summary: The 16th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings the new Alice in Wonderland Realm, the new characters Alice and Cheshire Cat, a "uncrafting" system, Star Wars premium items, improvements in Photo Mode and the Garden of Whimsy Star Path.

name: Diceball
summary: Roll the dice and dominate in Diceball, a turn-based sports strategy game where luck meets skill. Guide your team through 10 consecutive wins to claim the championship. Unlock 8 unique teams, collect powerful upgrades at the Concession Stand, and build your team on your way to victory.

name: Diplomacy Is Not an Option: Shareware
summary: Diplomacy is Not an Option: Shareware is a free prequel to the original game. In a medieval fantasy world, you are to build settlements, raise huge armies, and defend against massive hordes of enemies. Learn how Ironbrow clan shaped the world's map the first time - if you survive, that is.

name: Digging Hours
summary: A short, atmospheric horror experience where you and a friend are tasked with digging up two bodies, but something isn't right.

name: DIY Horse Race Thing
summary: A small little toy that lets you make small maps with obstacles and walls, and then let little horses run around, until one bumps into the carrot and wins. The idea is to play with friends and bet who will end up winning!

name: Die Trying
summary: Plunge into a world ravaged by the dead in this hilarious co-op shooter. Blending silly antics with the extraction shooter genre. Escape with a plethora of loot, or Die Trying!

name: Dino Attack
summary: Top-down vehicle shooter to tie in with the LEGO theme of the same name.

name: DineInn
summary:
You suddenly get a call that your father has gone missing and this Inn is all that he left behind for you. You must now work at DineInn and handle all operations from Cooking to maintaining the building. Restore the DineInn and uncover its secrets!

You arrive at an abandoned motel and you are now the manager, the Chef and the owner. Start cooking!

name: Disposable Corps
summary: Disposable Corps is a 5v5 multiplayer tactical shooter set in a stylized, alternate-history version of World War I. Players engage in team-based combat featuring trench-building, destructible environments, and objective-driven gameplay. The game emphasizes coordination and battlefield control, with a focus on close-quarters encounters and shifting frontlines. Its art direction blends historical inspiration with exaggerated, low-poly visuals and a darkly satirical tone.

name: Dino Rush
summary:
An egg has just hatched in prehistoric time and a small dinosaur has emerged… and he's hungry!
Help Dundy the dinosaur make his way through tropical wildneress!
Tap to get Dundy to jump over obstacles, predators, melting lava or even quicksand. Score by eating loads of fruit to help Dundy survive and reach for power-ups to give him special abilities.
You can make Dundy fly, run, or even smash up adversaries… but whatever you do, remember to keep feeding him fruit along the way or he'll loose strenght and starve!!
Both skill and determination will be needed to survive this fruitfull adventure.
Boasting superb graphics, fantastic gameplay and great replay value, Dino Rush is an addictive and deliciously fun adventure for the whole family.
So flex those fingers and get ready to save a dinosaur!

name: Divine Legacy: Neo Amburia
summary: Divine Legacy: Neo Amburia is a medieval-fantasy RPG where a young woman must save her childhood friend, who's been pulled toward a dark fate. With little more than determination, she'll battle powerful foes, form unexpected alliances, and uncover secrets that could reshape the world.

name: Diamond Crush 2
summary: We love Pirates and we love Diamonds! Take a shot at crushing as many colorful gems as you can in this fast paced puzzle game. Beat your friends' high scores in the Weekly Tournament to earn even more coins.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel - Tech Knight
summary: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Tech knight within the game.

name: Digital Desktop Cats
summary: A cute virtual cat (or two... or three) that lives on your desktop. Feed them, play with them, and enjoy their company while you use your computer.

name: Dichotomy
summary: Team online game for 4-10 players, about the fight against traitors among the crew.

name: Dictocracy
summary: Take charge as the President of a newly independent country, Adelphia. Build infrastructure, approve policies, juggle between conflicting priorities of the public, your ministers and other countries' leaders - All with only one action per turn and a different political landscape in each playthrough

name: Director Manager Total
summary: Director Manager Total is a football management sim: wheel and deal in the transfer market, craft daring tactics, and drag a ramshackle club to league glory.

name: Digitalink
summary: Uncover the mind of a terrifying creature—one decision at a time. Digitalink blends psychological horror with logic-based gameplay in a uniquely unsettling experience filled with suspense, surprises, and scares.

name: Diner Simulator
summary: Run your own cozy diner solo or with friends! Cook, serve, clean, and manage the chaos in this fast-paced restaurant sim. Expand your café, customize your menu, and turn kitchen mayhem into delicious fun — or total disaster!

name: Dino Space Station
summary: Dino Space Station is a 2D pixel art platformer. Restore power. Evade dinosaurs. Escape the wreckage. A meteor shower has wrecked a station full of resurrected dinosaurs. Navigate dark, perilous corridors, dodge raptors, and survive. Warning: Gameplay maybe anxiety-inducing.

name: Diablo IV: Belial's Return
summary: With Mephisto’s attention turned towards grander goals, Belial seizes the opportunity to make Sanctuary his thrall

name: Digger Simulator: Gold Rush
summary: Every man makes his fortune his own way

name: Dirt Stooge
summary: A dull platform shooting game, inspired by the out of bounds background landscapes in other games. I wanted the game to be generally basic and empty, but also tried to make it feel substantial with the audio and visual style.

name: Digi-Doll
summary: A relaxing dollhouse decorating simulator featuring text-based discovery. Use the retro DIGI-DOLL console to explore the attic, where choice matters! Unlock various dollhouses, befriend characters, and uncover stunning furnishings as you design and decorate with flair!

name: Digging a Hole: Gold Fever
summary: Gold, secrets, and a lot of dirt.

name: Dicey Heroes
summary: Dicey Heroes is a Monopoly-based roguelike deck-building casual game. Actions such as attack, reinforcement, and defense are determined according to the squares stopped by rolling dice. Units have only one parameter, a number. The objective of the game is to strengthen this number. Simple, isn't it?

name: Die Die Die
summary: The puzzle game for people who like dice... and want to stop. Roll your way around a sprawling, non-linear map solving ever-more perplexing puzzles! Discover dozens of unique puzzle mechanics! Collect dice! Just... maybe don't play it on a laptop near a window if you own either of them...

name: Dino 'Splode
summary: Dino 'Splode is an exciting action platformer where the player controls a nearly nuclear dinosaur named Sandwich. The player travels through various unique locations, solves puzzles, survives harsh environments, and makes their way through the bloodthirsty and constantly feuding Caveman nations.

name: Dice to Pay
summary: Roll the dice, play your cards, and hunt monsters to pay off your crushing mortgage. This is a quirky turn-based strategy game where survival means managing your luck—and your loans. Glory can wait. The bank won't.

name: Die Fighter
summary: A sci-fi dice-driven roguelike where your dice fuel both your abilities and your enemies’. You'll need strategy and luck to outwit dynamic foes, harness synergistic upgrades, and escape creeping galactic doom before Fate catches up.

name: Digger: Galactic Treasures
summary: Digger: Galactic Treasures is a space adventure where you drill into asteroids to uncover rare resources and hidden treasures. Explore the galaxy, upgrade your gear, and discover the secrets of the universe!

name: Distant Flux: System Initializing
summary: A magitech, post-apocalyptic, turn-based RPG. Assist your faction with exploration, resource gathering, construction, research, item fabrication, and monster extermination, while absorbing ambient mana and leveling up your System drone.

name: Dillo's Dilemma
summary: Play as Dillo, a clever armadillo with pinball contraptions, in this thrilling 3D physics collectathon! Roll through vivid, expansive worlds, conquer dynamic puzzles, and smash the Rat King’s mighty forts. Rally your brave firefly friends to overcome challenges and save the day!

name: Diner Bros 2
summary: The Diner Bros are back! With the same hectic cooking and serving, and now customization of your bustling restaurant! Serve quirky customers, earn cash to buy equipment, and discover new recipes in Diner Bros 2. Team up for 4 player local co-operative fun. No friends? Hire servers!

name: Dino Girls
summary: Discover and collect cute Dino Girls, organize their activities, and expand your resort while going about your daily stuff.

name: Dig & Deal
summary: Dig & Deal is a game where you dig underground to find valuable items and bargain with customers to sell what you find. Upgrade your tools, grow your shop, and make the best deals to build your fortune.

name: Dishventory
summary:
You will take a job as a Dishwasher manager, figuring out the most effective way to wash dishes. Are you up for the challenge?

Wash dirty dishes that keep on piling on the board. Put dirty dishes on the Dishwasher board in the most efficient order and earn Golden Bubbles. The Store that appears every couple of rounds will allow you to purchase some awesome upgrades!

Survive 5 days and get a dishwasher with a new card to play with in your next run.

name: Dirt Trackin' 3
summary: The legendary dirt racing sim is back and bigger than ever. If you're looking for old school dirt racing fun mixed in with cutting edge tech, then this is the game for you!

name: Dicey Words
summary: The wordy roguelike. Dicey Words is a clever dice-based word builder where you roll letters, reroll like Yahtzee, and craft five-letter words for big points. Earn powerful badges that twist the rules, boost your score, and transform each run into a strategic puzzle.

name: Distractor
summary: Distractor is a roguelike bullet hell where you choose your own destruction. Fight an arms race against a strange entity, where every ability offered, both yours and the entity's, is influenced by your actions. Choose your favourite way to lose!

name: Dino Quake
summary: Join Mina and Kiwi to stop an alien invasion from outer space! Dino Quake is a platformer arcade game where you hit the ground to create quakes, stun enemies, then kick them to trigger epic avalanches. Play solo or team up with a friend in local co-op!

name: Disappeared
summary: Disappeared is a horror game, whose central aspect is exploration and stealth progression. You are Axel, camping with your wife, Deb, in a forest. She suddenly disappears. You need to make sense of what happened and find a way to save her, while being attacked and chased by powerful beings.

name: Dichotomy Illusion: The Coser Disassembly Incident
summary: "Dichotomy Illusion" is a Shin Honkaku mystery visual novel that combines real-world entertainment elements with physical locations, utilizing ACGN (Anime, Comics, Games, Novels) subculture knowledge to solve criminal cases and uncover the truth.

name: Diving Focus
summary: “Diving Focus” is a scuba diving simulator in which you have to explore the underwater world by diving into the water and looking for objects that will help you in the further progression of the game!

name: Digital Market Simulator
summary: Run a marketplace where you can sell games and everything related, take care of customers and shape it however you want.

name: Dice Battle: 3d Board Game
summary: Dice Battle brings the thrill of friendly competition as you roll the dice, strategize your moves, and enjoy moments of triumph and tension. It's a fun, lighthearted experience that keeps you engaged and eager for the next turn.

name: Diamonds
summary: Diamonds is a clone of Boulder Dash. You have to find all diamonds before the time runs out, but be careful not getting crushed by a boulder.

name: Discreet Mission
summary: Game of infiltration and action. You have to complete the assigned mission.

name: Dimensional Deconstruction
summary: Dimensional deconstruction is a cozy sandbox game where you transform fractured dimensions into a personalized sanctuary. Recycle, rebuild, and create the home of your dreams!

name: Divine Academy
summary:
Become a Greek god!
Cast miracles! Make people worship you! All these things are now possible with the release of a brand new sim game Divine Academy.

Become a student of the university for young gods. Study from the likes of Hercules, Zeus and Athena. Learn to cast fun and impressive miracles that will make you feel really powerful.

Build your prosperous metropolis
Build a safe and prosperous metropolis to get your friends to envy your success. Give your worshipers gifts of knowledge and technology. Oversee their happiness and gain their love and adoration in return.

All this fun will take place on a painstakingly beautiful southern island – your own sandbox where everything goes according to your plan. In Divine Academy you rule, you awe and inspire!

name: Diatribes
summary: "Diatribes" is a poetic VR interactive experience that explores the internal conflicts that arise when we’re confronted with the reality of climate change.

name: Dimension Ranger
summary: This is a single-player roguelike card game. You play as Sun Wukong, a legendary figure from Chinese mythology, traveling through multiple parallel universes to save your master. Defeat enemies from parallel universes and gain card powers from these worlds.

name: Diacritic
summary: Decode a layered narrative as you complete the work assignment of a Diacritic: to fit shapes into orthogonally projected outlines and provide answers to inscrutable questions.

name: Dino Strike
summary: ZX Spectrum styled demake of the classic PS1 game 'Dino Crisis'. Navigate each area, eliminating rogue dinos and staying alive. Find door cards to access new areas, deactivate force-fields and find useful pick-ups.

name: Dicey Hacker 1999
summary: 《Dice Hacker 1999》 blends idle gameplay with dice strategy in a cyberpunk roguelite. As a hacker in a post-1999 parallel world, gather resources, hack programs, manipulate probabilities via bizarre devices. Each dice rewrites reality's code, every roll destabilizes the digital abyss.

name: Dig Dug New Frontier
summary: Dig Dug New Frontier is a mobile game that will be playable on June 17 to June 30th. It is a video game/cartoon hybrid.

name: Discard All Hope
summary: Investigate an eldritch mystery in a town under siege, collect and upgrade powerful spells, fight grotesque cultists, twisted creatures, and bio-mechanical invaders in this twin-stick-shooter / Action RPG hybrid.

name: Die to Play
summary: Die to Play — a deckbuilder with dice, set on a cozy retro computer inside a medieval English mansion filled with horrors and mysteries.

name: Disc Golf City
summary: Sling discs through stylized cityscapes in this casual, physics-based disc golf game. Aim for the basket or rack up trick shots by bouncing discs off rooftops, signs, and benches in colorful urban environments.

name: Dino Sort
summary:
"In Dino Sort, there are, uh, dinosaurs, and, well, you have to, you know, sort them out."

A puzzle game about arranging dinosaurs around a grid. Each dinosaur has a specific ruleset that must be followed.

name: Digging A Hole: Journey to the Core
Disney Coloring World
summary: Over 2,000 coloring pages with your favorite Disney characters.

name: Die Deep
summary: Die Deep delivers a pure and focused combat experience - it’s all about reading your foes and mastering your timing to strike back. Nothing stands in your way but combat! Dive into a constantly changing abyss, take down every enemy in your way, and enjoy the ultimate head-to-head battle experience.

name: Diablo IV: Sins of the Horadrim
summary: New bonds are forged as old enemies arise, reborn and hellbent on untold destruction. On July 1, Season 9: Sins of the Horadrim lets you wield powerful Horadric Spellcraft and unearth the secrets of the past in a new Seasonal Questline. Unearth and cleanse Blood Relics infused with Astaroth’s corruption to staunch his malevolent return to Sanctuary. This update also brings permanent updates to Nightmare Dungeons for both Seasonal and Eternal Realms, including new Horadric Strongroom micro-dungeons, endgame Escalating Nightmares, and new Nightmare Dungeon affixes.

name: Dice Tower
summary: 2D strategy platformer with elements of controlled risk and time management

name: Dilemma: The Game
summary: In this 2D, Point and Click, choose-your-own-adventure experience. You will pick a way to respond to dilemmas .Answer non-sensical thought questions and unearth what happens from your choices.

name: Dirt Racing Bundle Off Road & Wildtrax
summary: This pack includes the games: Rock ´N Racing Off Road and WildTrax Racing.

name: Dinosaurs and Animal Friends to the Rescue
summary: A magical adventure where a curious turtle, a clumsy dinosaur, and an inventive hummingbird travel through enchanted lands to restore harmony to their home.

name: Disbelief
summary:
DISBELIEF is a total conversion puzzle-horror mod where you step into the shoes of Nate, a Watcher who manages to survive a devastating Combine attack.

Trapped amid the chaos of the Black Mesa Residential Complex, Nate’s mission is to find his girlfriend Sarah and escape before it’s too late.

name: Die For The Lich
summary: Roll dice and magical trinkets and pair them with weapons to battle legendary monsters. Master the art of chance in a journey where every roll counts. Unlock new gear by completing grueling challenges and prepare for the final battle against the King of undead, the Lich!

name: Dice City Roller HD
summary: Join 19 other players in Dice City Roller HD, a fast-paced online multiplayer casino-themed game that challenges you to create winning hands and outbid your rivals and friends at auction.

name: Dimension
summary: Make full use of dimensions to clear the area.

name: Diecast
summary: Diecast is a score-chasing roguelike deckbuilder about rolling dice to make scoring hands. Buy new dice, items, or scoring hands to increase your score, and chance of going further.

name: Dimension Ascent
summary: A puzzle action platformer where shifting your perspective lets you cross dimensions! Use the “Eyes that See the World” to uncover hidden truths.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Mysteries of Skull Rock
summary: The 17th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley solves the mystery of Skull Rock, adds Peter Pan as a character, brings Friendship mechanics to The Forgotten and animal companions and starts The Adventures in Neverland Star Path.

name: Diner Dash Adventures
summary: Diner DASH Adventures, originally known as Diner DASH Town, is a freemium time management and town design game developed and published by Glu Mobile.

name: Disorderly
summary: In this flash game, the goal of the player is to do their job as an orderly in an old folk home by eliminating expensive elderly residents.

name: Diorama Builder: The Museum
summary: Build an epic Museum of Natural History, Science, and Technology! Assemble a giant T-Rex skeleton, the Apollo 11 capsule, a panoramic elevator, and more in this highly detailed diorama.

name: Diorama Builder: Secret Bunker
summary: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the "SECRET BUNKER" diorama, allowing you to build an underground super bunker.

name: Diorama Builder: Mars Colony
summary: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the "MARS COLONY" diorama, which will allow you to build a real exploration colony on Mars. In it, you can build, for example, a workshop for vehicles, a greenhouse for growing plants, a rocket with its launch tower, and much more!

name: Dice of Kalma
summary: A deckbuilding roguelike where you play dice against Kalma, the grim guardian of the Underworld. Build a deck of powerful skulls, find synergies, and turn the dice to your favor to escape back to the world of the living.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Arcade Edition
summary: Experience this life-sim and adventure game rich with quests, exploration, and engaging activities featuring Disney and Pixar friends. This apple arcade edition requires a subscription to play. It includes The Storybook Vale and A Rift in Time Expansion Passes.

name: Dicey Decisions
summary: Dicey Decisions is a multiplayer, strategy based board game where you compete against another person through cards, dice, and collecting runes and points. The game ends at round 6, and the person who gets the most wins! But watch out for your exhaustion levels!

name: Dinoslap
summary: Slap your way to victory over your friends in this multiplayer brawler. Use items strategically to edge out the competition. Customize your dinosaur and accessorize your victory in style.

name: Digging Dogs
summary: This is the sacred ground where players scream about drop rates, flex their Ultra Rare Lizard Bone, and submit bone ideas cursed enough to make it into the game. Want your radioactive corn dog bone added? Pitch it. Found a bug where your dog ascends to bone heaven? Show us.

name: Dino Run Puzzle
summary: Exciting Puzzle: Face creative and diverse puzzle challenges along the way. Use your wits to overcome dangerous traps and obstacles.

name: DinoGore
summary: Grand-Theft-DINO! Experience a caveman sim that takes place in a brutal PREHISTORIC OPEN WORLD, where DEATH and DINOSAURS roam! Ride around on DINOSAURS in search of WOMEN and MEAT! Become what the mighty TREX fears and rise to the challenge!

name: Dig Deeper
summary: Mine, upgrade, and Dig Deeper. A first-person idle-like progression game where you carve through rock, collect ore, and become an unstoppable dwarven force.

name: Die Robot
summary: Build traps. Fight bots. Survive the wave. Die Robot is a stylized third-person tower defense game where you defend a mysterious core from waves of rogue robots, the Carbonites. Mix real-time base building with fast-paced combat in a strategic fight for survival.

name: Diagnosis: No Answer
summary: A psychological puzzle where reality breaks down and madness is the only compass. In this dark world, you are chained to your bed, but the only way out is to go deep into your own mind. There are no answers. There is only you.

name: Dino Chess
summary: A pixel-art puzzle game that combines pseudo-coding with turn-based mechanics. Reconstruct logic and break the rules in simple, intuitive ways—create bizarre phenomena to solve puzzles and progress through each level, all while uncovering the mysteries hidden behind this enigmatic game.

name: Diner in the Storm
summary: You enter a road-side diner to take shelter from a sudden storm. You are safe for now, but it doesn't take long to realize that there's something more than just rain outside the thin diner walls.

name: Disciples: Domination
summary:
Rule through the chaos! Fifteen years after Avyanna freed Nevendaar from the tyrannical grip of the gods, Disciples: Domination returns you to a realm hanging in the balance. In this dark fantasy strategy RPG with turn-based combat, take your place on Queen Avyanna’s throne – and attempt to hold together a crumbling kingdom.

The fire of doubt burns scorching within her, sparked by the crushing weight of the throne in Yllian and stoked by twisted dreams of becoming one of the very monsters she once defied – and destroyed. Paralyzed by fear and haunted by her own power, Avyanna’s rule begins to crack. Allies disappear and abandon her. An unknown force spreads strife and madness through her realm.

The choice is yours – shape the future, for salvation or ruin. As you chase the truths behind the ceaseless conflicts, dark magic and lurking conspiracies infecting your rotting empire, you’ll face betrayal, strife, and shadowy schemes. Uncover the long-lost Mountain Clans, witness the rise of an ancient cult and confront a corrupted seer whose visions have awoken bitter grudges, while old enemies are on the rise.

It will take all your courage to save Nevendaar. Are you brave enough to face – and embrace – its darkest truths?

name: Diceville
summary: Build your city, roll the dice, and outplay your rivals in Diceville — a card-based strategy game inspired by tabletop classics. Trigger building effects, upgrade your HQ, and race to victory in a game of luck, planning, and clever combos.

name: Dizzy: Prince of the Yolkfolk
summary: HD remake of the 1991 classic. Features updated visuals, touch controls, autosave, and a hint system. Players guide Dizzy through a fantasy world to solve puzzles and rescue Daisy. Faithful to the original with modernized gameplay elements. Delisted from mobile stores in 2019.

name: Dimensional Fold
summary: Solve puzzles in a way you've never seen before. This game challenges you to rotate 4D objects, known as hypercubes, to perfectly match a target image.

name: Difficult Times 2
summary: Monsters have returned to our lands!

name: Dirtzone
summary: Experience the ultimate off-road adventure! Drive powerful 4x4 trucks across rugged terrain, deep mud, and harsh weather. Upgrade your vehicles, master challenging trails, and explore untamed lands.

name: Diamond Cash Slots
summary:
Let the show begin! Enjoy the ultimate Las Vegas style casino experience in this online casino with big jackpots, premium 888 slots and endless fun! Top-notch graphics and excellent sound effects take you straight to the sparkling casino metropolis of Las Vegas!

Free games and classic casino slots have never been so exciting - whether it's Sizzling Hot deluxe or All Aboard Dynamite Dash. Claim your Welcome Bonus and play our premium casino slots!

Feeling lucky? It’s time to spin the reels with the best slots from Novoline, AGS, Everi and Konami - anywhere, anytime.

name: Dimenshot
summary: An intense, fast-paced FPS that seamlessly blends parkour and shooting. Master fluid movement, engage in dynamic close combat, and unleash devastating firepower across diverse worlds and unique themes, each filled with dangerous enemies and epic battles.

name: Die drei ???: Das Gold der Inkas
summary: In this Point & Click Adventure the three ??? research the story of an Inca treasure that has disappeared in Rocky Beach and accompany the salvage operation of a sunken ship in Panama. In the process, they fall into the clutches of a shady police commissioner...

name: Disney XD Grand Prix
summary: Fans Can Burn Rubber as Animated Characters from Popular Disney XD Shows “Phineas and Ferb,” “Gravity Falls,” “Mighty Med,” “Kickin’ It,” “Lab Rats,” “Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja” and “Wander Over Yonder”. Disney XD has announced the launch of the “Disney XD Grand Prix” racing-game app for smartphones and tablets, which will have Disney XD fans revving up for victory with their favorite characters in a variety of high-octane game modes.

name: Dinotica
summary: Dinotica is a sandbox roguelike set in a mysterious prehistoric world. Tame and collect dinosaur companions, build your own refuge, and combine farming, crafting, exploration, and combat. Play solo or team up in co-op to face challenges together. With roguelike progression and high replayability, every run feels unique.

name: Dialoop
summary: This is a roguelike puzzle game where quick thinking determines your survival. Every run offers a fresh experience based on your choices—deck-building, puzzle-solving, and exploration all shape your journey. Master the mysterious stone tablets and uncover the secrets hidden within ancient ruins!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Emotional Rescue
summary: The 18th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley adds the Inside Out Realm, adds Joy and Sadness as villagers, new Photo Mode features and starts the Retro Roadtrip Star Path, with the new Routine Duties.

name: Digital Eclipse: Cyberpunk Survivor
summary: A rogue-lite co-op bullet hell looter shooter set in a cyberpunk apocalypse. Fight through dozens of missions with dynamic layouts, optional challenges, and persistent upgrades. Unlock weapons, skill trees, and stop the rogue AI Synthex Prime from consuming reality.

name: Dive and Dine Simulator
summary: Dive and Dine Simulator is launching soon in Early Access! Dive for fish, cook delicious seafood dishes, and run your seaside restaurant with friends. Upgrade gear, explore the ocean, and build your culinary empire. Wishlist now and get ready to make a splash!

name: Dino Explore
summary: Dino Explore is a fun way to learn more about dinosaurs! Do you want to dig up bones? Or maybe you want to find dinosaurs in a 2d world? Are you interested in a dinosaur quiz, challenging your knowledge about dinosaurs or .... maybe you just want to compare sizes. All of this is in the game!

name: Digging Town
summary:
Brace yourself, it is finally Digging Day! Every year, Digging Town organizes a big celebration named "Digging Day"!

On this day, all the people are asked to find a given number of objects by digging in the ground of the city.

Ready to take part of it?

name: Dirt Fox
summary: Dirt Fox is a racing arcade video game by Namco. Up to four linked cabinets let players race simultaneously across six timed track sections, alongside CPU-controlled rivals. Falling behind the time limit eliminates a player, while others continue until the finish. It was released only in Japan.

name: Dinopirates from Inner Space: Brocolation
summary: Crank your way out of the WaterQueen SS mark 1, while understand what happened to your crew

name: Distant Colony
summary: Explore alien planets in sci-fi survival adventure, gather resources to craft tools, overcome environmental hazards, uncover hidden secrets, and build thriving, self-sustaining colonies with advanced technology. Prepare humanity for a new future among the stars.

name: Dig Dig Spud Spud Harvest
summary: “Dig-Dig, Spud-Spud!” Dig up the ground and harvest the potato without damaging it! Sounds simple, but it's surprisingly tricky.

name: Dine-In Dungeon
summary: Things end up in an unexpected turn for Matcha the halfling as her search for a small part time job ends up with her taking up the role of not only the cook of a diner in the dungeon. But also it's hunter and waitress! Will she be able to push through?

name: Dice Saga
summary: Dice Saga is a RPG/multiplayer party game where four players compete against each other. Build up your character and tear other players down in this colorful and chaotic digital board game!

name: Dirty Piggy
summary: A cozy idle game about cute pigs, care and little discoveries. Feed, wash, decorate, collect coins and strange finds. They say grandpa hid something... Are you and the pigs really going to solve a family secret?

name: Dimmed Light
summary: You are an experienced urbex, who has set sights on another abandoned factory. But, having prepared for the hunt for adventures, you could not even think that they would be hunting you! What happened here?! The mystery will only be revealed by the light of the flashlight...

name: Dig & Decode
summary: Dig for relics of the past and solve puzzles as you explore an Earth abandoned millennia ago. Discover funny phrases referencing our time and turn these items into fuel to refuel your ship and escape this forgotten planet.

name: Disc
summary:
3D Air Hockey – Made for VR!
Welcome to DISC – a new sport created by ASICS.
Step into the arena with a fast-paced VR sport that tests your reflexes and rewards creativity.

name: Digging the Forgotten Cave
summary: Dig deep, unearth treasures. Upgrade your tools to uncover the secrets of the mystical caves. This is also an inner journey of relaxation, where your intuition can guide you closer to the mysteries.

name: Diamond Painting
summary: A relaxing art game where you place colorful dots to complete diamond paintings—just like the real craft.

name: Dimensional Rift
summary: Four adventurers explore four dimensions that have merged into one, decaying, and featuring unique art. Venture into a platformer packed with story and challenging mechanics.

name: Dino Citadel
summary: Command a castle-on-a-dino through a corrupted world. Rescue fallen allies, lead them in battle, and build your deck. Manage your economy to draw cards and confront the Voidrift in this tactical roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Digitum
summary: A bored old wizard pokes his finger into a tiny portal — and you fall out! In this fast-paced arcade adventure, race through twisted levels, master the physics, and perfect your runs to beat the clock… and your friends on the leaderboard.

name: Disco Duck
summary: A sci fi cat and mouse runner.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Wishblossom Ranch
summary: Nestled amongst the Wishblossom Mountains is a special place powered by the heart’s deepest wishes, where horses once roamed free and stables were full of life. That was until the Ranch fell into the hands of someone who neglected it, causing a mysterious phenomenon—the Decay. Saddle up for an adventure with your magical new Disney friends to find the missing horses, reverse the effects of the Decay, and restore the Ranch back to its former glory!

name: Dice Dice Baby
summary:
Dice Dice Baby is a casino dice-building roguelike about cheating, changing the rules and rolling the craziest combos to beat the House.
Build your own team of cheated dice with special abilities and create synergies between them to trigger game-breaking combos and sneaky strategies.

name: Disney Speedstorm: Welcome Pack
summary:
The Welcome Pack contains:

3,550 Tokens
1 Golden Pass Credit
Lilo (Shards to unlock)
Mike Wazowski (Shards to unlock)
1 Racing Suit for Lilo
1 Racing Suit for Mike Wazowski
1 Kart Livery for Lilo
1 Kart Livery for Mike Wazowski

name: Disney Speedstorm: The Genie Pack
summary:
Customize your racing experience with the Genie Pack!

This pack includes:

10 Shards to unlock the Genie

1 "FRIEND LIKE ME" Racing Suit for the Genie

1 "3 W1SHS" License Plate for the Genie

1 "AMETHYST RIKENMAN" set of wheels for the Genie

1 "DP1 MOTORSPORT 504M" kart wing for the Genie

name: Disney Speedstorm: Sulley Pack
summary:
This pack includes:

10 Shards to unlock Sulley

1 "BOO!" Racing Suit for Sulley

1 "KITTY" License Plate for Sulley

1 "AMETHYST NEURAND" set of wheels for Sulley

1 "DP1 MOTORSPORT 577M" kart wing for Sulley

name: Disney Speedstorm: Aladdin Pack
summary:
Customize your racing experience with the Aladdin Pack!

This pack includes:

1,150 Tokens*

10 Shards to unlock Aladdin

1 "A FABULOUS PRINCE" Racing Suit for Aladdin

name: Disney Speedstorm: Baloo Pack
summary:
Customize your racing experience with the Baloo Pack!

This pack includes:

10 Shards to unlock Baloo

1 "BANANA CAMOUFLAGE" Racing Suit for Baloo

1 "PAW PAW" License Plate for Baloo

1 "AMETHYST BRUMMAN" set of wheels for Baloo

1 "DP1 MOTORSPORT 378M" kart wing for Baloo

If one or more cosmetic items are already in your inventory, they will be converted into Season Coins for the current season.

name: Disney Speedstorm: Buzz Lightyear Pack
summary:
Customize your racing experience with the Buzz Lightyear Pack!

This pack includes:

10 Shards to unlock Buzz Lightyear

1 "PIZZA PLANET" Racing Suit for Buzz Lightyear

1 "2 NFNTY" License Plate for Buzz Lightyear

1 "CLOUD MECHANICAL MODEL YO" kart livery for Buzz Lightyear

name: Die, Zombie Sausage, Die!
summary: Arcade for the little ones professional. Hold on to the table against the zombie sausages as long as possible. Make your way to the top of the leaderboard.

name: Diva Lovers
summary:
A romance adventure game for women set in a medieval fantasy world.
The characters move using Live2D.

name: Dice Card Heroes
summary: In this roguelike deckbuilder, every card features its own dice. Battle against many fantastic creatures across 3 chapters. Upgrade your cards, build countless synergies and find mighty weapons to shape your playstyle. There is only one goal: Be the hero, slay the dragon.

name: Dickland: Quest
summary: Dickland: Quest is an exciting and hilarious 2D and 3D visual hybrid quest. The game has many different puzzles, mini games and puzzles that you will have to solve. The main feature is the environment, namely an amazing penisworld with its corresponding inhabitants.

name: Dickland: Mini Games
summary: Dickland: Mini Games is an exciting and funny collection of mini games in 2D. Among the collection there are such games as: "Puzzles", "Snake", "Find a couple" and others. The main feature is the visual, namely the amazing penis world.

name: Dirty Teachers
summary: DIRTY TEACHERS - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Dino Party Island
summary: A young dinosaur named Roar, who can't roar, lives crazy adventures at the Dino Party. Can he become the Rhythm King of the Valley?

name: Die. Respawn. Repeat.
summary: A fast-paced, minimalist bullet hell where dying makes you stronger. Originally made for a game jam, now polished and released as a free standalone.

name: Dig Down
summary: A digging, treasure-hunting, roguelike adventure game. How deep can you dig?

name: Die drei ???: Geheimnis der Schattenhelden
summary: Rocky Beach is the scene of a top-secret Hollywood action movie series plotted around a league of super heroes. But suddenly, the main actor has disappeared without a trace, along with his secret super hero suit. Help Jupiter, Peter, and Bob to find the actor and save the series!

name: Diànwán Bǔyú
summary: Experience the ultimate underwater adventure with Diàn Wán Bǔ Yú! Immerse yourself in a vibrant ocean filled with exotic fish and exciting challenges. This captivating fishing game combines classic arcade elements with innovative gameplay for an unforgettable experience.

name: Die or Die
summary: Roll the dice and choose how you will die. Die or Die is a top-down shooter roguelite where you run, shoot and dodge enemies to get dice with which to disable threats or unlock abilities. Roll. Die. Repeat.

name: Dickland: Tower Defense
summary: Dickland: Tower Defense is Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. The main feature of the game is black humor and a visual environment, namely the world of penises. Here you have to build the economy and various defensive towers to resist hordes of enemies.

name: Dirt Bike Mini Racer
summary: It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes offroad dirt bike racing capabilities

name: Dice Merge
summary:
