Exercise your brain and become a merge master with Dice Merge, the brand new match and merge puzzle game from Mobilityware!

Drag and drop customizable dice blocks onto the puzzle board and try to make your match! The value of the die is associated with its color. Create and collect ruby gems by matching 3 of the same color dice in order to merge into higher values. Keep merging until you form a ruby.

Collect rubies to increase your high score!

name: Dirt Racing Bundle Rally & Truck
summary:
This pack includes the games: Speed Truck and Rally Rock ´N Racing.

Speed Truck Racing

In Speed Truck Racing, you will enjoy the fastest, most spectacular races at over 200 Km/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 20 rivals.
There are several modes available, including Championship, Arcade and 4-player multiplayer.

There is also an online leader board where you can compare your best times with those of your friends and players from around the world.

Rally Rock ´N Racing

In Rally Rock 'N Racing, you’ll enjoy a wide variety of natural environments, such as deserts, snow-covered mountains, forests... where you can show your skill at the wheel, competing against everyone to become the fastest. The game has several modes, such as Championship, Time Trial, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer.

Online leader board where you can compare your best times with those of your friends and players from around the world.

name: Dizzys
summary: A boss rush bullet hell schmup about keeping yourself from spinning.

name: Dial 666
summary: Dial 666: The Paranormal Crisis Hotline is an interactive visual novel where you take on the role of a hotline phone operator for situations dealing with monsters and supernatural beings known as aberrants. Guide your callers through tricky and often dangerous scenarios using only the information you have on hand! Chat with your coworkers, answer those phone calls, and keep people alive throughout your shift. Don't forget, not everything is as it seems!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Return to Beast's Castle
summary: The 19th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings new content for The Beauty and the Beast Realm, adds Lumiere and Cogsworth as villagers, new Halloween-themed events and starts the Witchful Thinking Star Path.

name: Diamond Thief
summary: Diamond Thief is an arcade 2d platform game. This game is a kind of Manic miner released in the 80s on ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC.

name: Dino Bros
summary: Dino Bros is a platform game where you need to navigate two dinosaur brothers through collecting all the coins and finding the exit! These inseparable siblings always move in sync with each other. Use different buildings and platforms to adjust the distance and positions between them, move them together carefully, and leave no one behind! Can you skillfully guide these adorable dino bros to success?

name: Dirty Piano Lessons
summary: Two lusty women get together for some fun. For Harmony, it’s going to be a night of firsts! She’s about to learn that women, too, can ejaculate, and just as much as men! Bethanne knows the secret to making a woman cum, and Harmony is her target tonight.

name: Die Drei ???: Ruf Der Trolle
summary: Trolls in Rocky Beach? A teenager has disappeared and his sister suspects a kidnapping by a real troll. Who is the strange-looking man that not only little Elenya has seen? Investigate with Justus, Peter and Bob in a "trollish" case!

name: Divine's Howl
summary: In Divine's Howl, you will embody a divine avatar, leading your followers to expand your power across a shattered world.

name: Dino Quake
summary: Hit the ground to generate quakes to knock out enemies. Dino Quake is an old school multiplayer arcade game which takes place in the dinosaurs age.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Infernal Chaos
summary: Shift the veil between Sanctuary and Hell in the all-new, chaos-fueled Infernal Hordes and their relentless Chaos Waves. Unleash deadly Chaos Perks and hunt down game-changing Chaos Armor to forge devastating, meta-defying builds.

name: D.I.M.
summary: Made in collaboration between game developer Conner Rush, 3D artist Cody Reader, and 2D Artist Denice Stout, D.I.M. is a short first-person narrative experience about life, death, and artificial intelligence.

name: Digaway
summary: Fast digging game. Explore vast worlds, mine gems, find loot and secrets. Expand your camp. Upgrade yourself, fight monsters, survive.

name: Divine Intervention: Quran Miracles
summary: Divine Intervention is a beautifully immersive simulation. Embark on a journey from the nebular space to the deserts of Earth 1400 years ago. Uncover the holy Quran’s most compelling scientific and historical miracles. Explore, sand-surf, and verify ancient revelations in a way never seen before.

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Costume Pack
summary:
A Costume Pack that includes multiple costumes and unlocks side missions related to each costume.

Costume Pack includes:
• Costume Swimwear Set
- Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Swimwear
- Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Swimwear

- Side Mission: Proper Beach Attire

• Costume Chosen Children Set
- Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Chosen Children Outfit
- Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Chosen Children Outfit
- Inori Misono Costume Chosen Children Outfit
- Aegiomon Costume Chosen Children Outfit
- Side Mission: The Targeted Cosplayer

• Costume Digimon Costume Set
- Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Digimon Costume
- Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Digimon Costume
- Inori Misono Costume Digimon Costume
- Aegiomon Costume Digimon Costume
- Side Mission: Knowledge Is the Death of Fear

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Costume Digimon Costume Set
summary:
Grants Costume Digimon Costume Set usable in Digimon Story Time Stranger. Additionally, a side mission related to the costumes will be unlocked.

Costume Digimon Costume Set includes:
• Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Digimon Costume
• Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Digimon Costume
• Inori Misono Costume Digimon Costume
• Aegiomon Costume Digimon Costume
• Side Mission: Knowledge Is the Death of Fear

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Costume Swimwear Set
summary:
Grants Costume Swimwear Set usable in Digimon Story Time Stranger. Additionally, a side mission related to the costumes will be unlocked.

Costume Swimwear Set includes:
• Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Swimwear
• Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Swimwear
• Inori Misono Costume Swimwear
• Aegiomon Costume Swimwear
• Side Mission: Proper Beach Attire

name: Dice with the Devil
summary: Dice with the Devil is a party-based, dice-chucking, deck-building roguelike. Assemble your crew of adventurers, Defeat the DEVIL!

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Costume Chosen Children Set
summary:
Grants Costume Chosen Children Set usable in Digimon Story Time Stranger. Additionally, a side mission related to the costumes will be unlocked.

Costume Chosen Children Set includes:
• Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Chosen Children Outfit
• Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Chosen Children Outfit
• Inori Misono Costume Chosen Children Outfit
• Aegiomon Costume Chosen Children Outfit

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Costume Public Safety Suit & Special Supplies Set
summary:
Receive Costume Public Safety Suit (Protagonist) and unlocks a side mission which rewards Special Supplies Set.

Costume Public Safety Suit & Special Supplies Set includes:
• Costume Public Safety Suit
- Protagonist (Dan Yuki) Costume Public Safety Suit
- Protagonist (Kanan Yuki) Costume Public Safety Suit
• Special Supply Set
- Accessory: Strategist's USB
- Accessory: Millionaire's USB
- Accessory: Collector's USB
- Farm Item: Chic Toilet
• Side Mission: To Do the Job, You Need to Dress the Part

name: Divine Tactics
summary: Lead your team of divine allies to victory in this roguelike autobattler. Position your units, unleash their unique powers, and outsmart rivals in this asynchronous multiplayer competition.

name: Digging Together
summary: Start digging with your grandpa’s map! In this stylized co-op digging game (up to 4 players), dig, upgrade, and reach the treasure together. Work as a team or compete! Fun, chaos, and rivalry await deep underground.

name: Dinus Cross World
summary: Experience the journey through beautiful pixel-art graphics, a hauntingly quiet atmosphere, and environments inspired by real Indonesian architecture. Discover Kedirya City as a reimagined reflection of a real-world town, and encounter spirits inspired by Indonesian folklore.

name: Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue
Die By Die
summary: Die By Die is a rogue-lite text adventure game with lite rpg elements where every run is a new story. The dice of fate decide the setting and plot points for each run, but your actions and your dice rolls will tell the story.

name: Dictation
summary: Dictation is a word-building based roguelike, with plenty of perks to experiment with and create combos to reach the top of the scoreboard.

name: Dig Island
summary: Dig Island is a 4-player co-op digging game. As you dig deeper, discover new resources, upgrade your equipment, and work with your friends to repair the plane and escape the island.

name: Diver's
summary: Diver's is a simulation game somewhat similar to Princess Maker with cut-scenes (mostly of erotic nature) breaking the daily training routine. Taking the role of a manager named Shirou, the player can choose to train one of the four available female fighters. The goal is to raise the girl's battle parameters by filling our her schedule with daily assignments. These include various kinds of physical training (attack, defense, etc.), mental exercises, sparring with a partner, etc. In order to keep the girl relaxed, it is necessary to rest from time to time, as well as perform some leisurely activities, such as shopping, gambling, or relaxing in a spa.

name: Divine Sin
summary: A deck-building roguelike with innovative card mechanics, blending strategy with unpredictability. In a decaying dark fantasy world, you are a resurrected Apostle—sworn to hunt the gods.

name: Dissidia Duellum Final Fantasy
summary:
A new Dissidia story unfolds in modern Tokyo, where legendary Final Fantasy warriors assemble to save the world from destruction.
Defeat the boss faster than the enemy team in exhilarating, action-packed battles in this 3v3 Team Boss Battle Arena.

name: Dimensional Gates
summary: Truly ambitious Indie RPG with innovative modern concepts and original storylines. Normal mode has random encounters and boss fights. Story mode has no random encounters and boss fights play themself out. Can you stop the Shetman from destroying the strings and the very fabric of our Universe?

name: Dicey Bizniz
summary: A strategic dice roguelike where you build powerful combinations by locking and rerolling dice to beat escalating score targets. Collect game-changing relics, cast tactical spells, and master probability through 11 challenging antes.

name: Dice Team
summary: This is a turn-based strategy adventure game. You need to form a crack 5-hero squad, collect mysterious props, build powerful hero abilities, defeat powerful monsters, and uncover the secrets of this world.

name: Diceeee
summary: A Yacht-roguelike fusion!Roll waves of dice to form classic Yacht hands and unleash explosive synergies that skyrocket your score.Spend coins each stage to upgrade your deck, chase the top spot, and feel the thrill of soaring numbers—play now!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Stylish Beauty Edition
Discoverx
summary: Enter a pharmaceutical laboratory and have fun while helping a team of scientists in 7 original mini-games that teach you about the manufacturing process of new medicines in this educational game!

name: Dice x Deck
summary: Based on backgammon, players gain buffs that amplify the effects of the squares. Deck-building roguelike-like play experience.

name: Diapause
summary: DIAPAUSE is a haunting sit-and-survive style indie horror game. Stuck within a cabin with only your wits and a spotty flashlight, defend your life against vicious monsters during the night, and solve mysterious puzzles while wandering the halls of your deteriorating mind during the day.

name: Disney Speedstorm: Special Pack
summary:
Start your engines and hit the track with the Special Pack! Disney Speedstorm is the ultimate hero-based combat racing game, set on high-speed circuits inspired by Disney and Pixar worlds.

The Special Pack contains:
6,400 Tokens
2 Golden Pass Credits
Mowgli (Shards to unlock)
Randall (Shards to unlock)
Elizabeth Swann (Shards to unlock)
1 Racing Suit for Mowgli
1 Racing Suit for Randall
1 Racing Suit for Elizabeth Swann
1 Kart Livery for Mowgli
1 Kart Livery for Randall
1 Kart Livery for Elizabeth Swann

name: Dictator Simulator: Gradnar
summary: Become the Dictator of Gradnar! Rule the nation, choose between democracy and tyranny, wage wars with a unique card-based mechanic, and expand your empire. A political dystopia packed with satire and humor!

name: Dig Out
summary: With a dark and minimalist aesthetic, the title blends action and elements of "puzzle combat," pitting the protagonist, an abstract representation of human emotion, against enemies that personify their own inner "demons."

name: Dingir OS
summary: Congratulations, you've found Dingir OS — an operating system that lets you glimpse into the darkest corners of the internet. Browse forbidden websites, investigate lethal files, and immerse yourself in the world of digital legends. (We are not responsible for anything that may happen to you.)

name: Disguiser
summary: This is a game about disguise. Players are split into two teams—Red and Blue—and must blend into groups of NPCs. To stay hidden, everyone has to act like the NPCs while trying to figure out who the enemy players are and take them out.

name: Divine Gambit
summary: Defy the Gods and protect your Village in a 3rd person action and tower defense hybrid. Use the days to build your defenses and the nights to repel the Executors trying to lay waste to your Home. Endure the wrath of Gods solo or with friends in a unique mix of strategic planning and frantic action.

name: Discover The World
summary: Sylvie enters yet another world in this turn-based RPG platformer. Collect items, fight battles, and destroy the tyrant.

name: Diemi
summary: Diemi is an adventure RPG made by Segawa. It has turn based battles, multiple endings and a good quantity of optional content.

name: Dispersio 3
summary: Dispersio 3 is a retro-styled action platformer. As you progress through the game, you will face different obstacles, such as wind, water or antigravity. There's even a hard mode for hardcore players.

name: DianQi
summary: The protagonist played by the player was suddenly shouted by the name of recognizing his ancestors, and suddenly found that everything seemed to be as simple as imagined ...

name: Dig Baby Dig Company
summary: An online co-op horror game with 1-4 players. Explore and dig through strange alien fields, face hostile creatures, and harvest cute little beings... all to satisfy the cruel demands of your master.

name: Dino Cap
summary: Dinosaurs have taken over the city with just you and a gun dealer alive. It's your job to wipe them out in gory fashion.

name: Dire Echo
summary:
In the near future, humanity is steadily expanding into the depths of space. You are an astronaut on a routine but important mission: follow a designated route to a remote station and deliver technical data.

Along the way, command contacts you with an additional request — retrieve documents from the research vessel "Echo-7", which recently went silent. The silence is attributed to a recent geomagnetic storm disrupting communications.

As you approach Echo-7, you attempt to contact the crew — but there’s no response. The ship appears functional from the outside. Inside — nothing.

No welcoming party, no signs of life. Just empty corridors, scattered personal belongings, and the unsettling feeling that you're not alone.

Key Features

Realistic graphics — visual fidelity enhances the feeling of unease

️ Haunting atmosphere — silence, isolation, and growing tension follow your every step

Immersive sound — rich audio design pulls you deep into the experience

name: Difficult Game About Letters
summary: Transform into letters to overcome platforming challenges and save your friend from evil King in this crayon-style adventure!

name: Diesuki Dungeon
summary: Diesuki Dungeon is a roguelike, turn-based strategy game. Recruit bizarre medieval characters, gather equipment to grow stronger, defeat monsters, and head toward the ancient city that holds the “treasure chest containing whatever you desire.”

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Episode Pack 1: Alternate Dimension
summary: In this Digimon Story Time Stranger DLC, five new digivolution paths for Mega Digimon are unlocked, granting players a special story woven from encounters that transcend time and space separately from the main storyline.

name: Disgrace: When Our Beautiful World Disappears
summary: A story-driven JRPG with tactical turn-based combat, dungeon exploration, and visual novel storytelling. Guide exiled noble Raphael Claurest through a tale of survival, redemption, and the mystery of the fabled Cave Echo.

name: Dispatch: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Dispatch is a superhero workplace comedy where choices matter. Manage a dysfunctional team of misfit heroes and strategize who to send to emergencies around the city, all while balancing office politics, personal relationships, and your own quest to become a hero.

Dispatch: Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Dispatch - Full Game
- Digital Art Book: The Art of Dispatch
- Digital Comic: Splash/The Last Bender
- Digital Comic: Pas De Deux/Shellshock
- Digital Comic: Get Up
- Digital Comic: The Death of Mecha Man

name: Dismayed
summary: Attempt to make sense of your twisted and macabre surroundings as the story unfolds. Will you figure out what's going on or will you succumb to the madness?

name: Dino Dawn Doom
summary: Explore the depths of an underground facility, facing deadly dinosaurs and uncovering an intriguing story. Find and utilise a variety of weapons along the way.

name: Dirt Racing Bundle WildTrax & Rally
summary: Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

name: Dive Expedition
summary:
Explore sunken ships, submarines, and mysterious underwater ruins filled with hidden treasures and fascinating artifacts.

Take your time as you navigate detailed environments, complete exploration objectives, and collect items scattered across the sea floor. Examine each discovery up close, uncovering the secrets of lost vessels and forgotten places.

name: Dice In You
summary: A roguelike deck builder with dice. Fuse dice to create your own powerful custom dice, and aim for even higher scores!

name: Dillingham
summary: Dillingham is a fast-paced fish-processing and logistics simulator where chaos meets precision. Run an Alaskan seafood plant, unload boats, sort and process fish, manage conveyor systems, operate forklifts, and keep every station flowing before the whole line backs up.

name: Diving Into Abyss
summary: You are a new recruit in a professional civilian diving rescue team. Your first mission is to rescue the missing cave diver.

name: Distant Shore: Bretagne
summary: Explore the ruins of a former research site, devastated by climate collapse. Wield magnetic gauntlets to move, bend, or break metal as you recover lost BIO2 data and uncover your brother’s trail — all while evading the Cloud, a sentient weather entity that watches your every move.

name: Diggin
summary: Drill into the depths of a meteor crater in this incremental adventure. Mine ores, unlock upgrades and find the cosmic treasure that lies below! Can you uncover what happened to the Moles that came before you?

name: Ding Dong Pitch
summary: Ding Dong Pitch is holiday horror at your doorstep. Sound is deadly, and perfect pitch is your only defense. Unsettling carolers sing while you must match their notes to keep them from breaking in.

name: Dirty Girls
summary: Relaxing puzzle game with dirty girls

name: Dirty Beastly Muscles
summary: Gay. Furry. Muscles. Adult. The game centers on RPG, character customizations, tactical combat, mini-games, puzzle solving, resource collection and management, and multiple endings. 16 different selectable characters, each with their own kinks, outfits, skills, and story lines.

name: Digital Creative Framework
summary:
Digital Creative Framework (DCF) is a multiplayer sandbox where players terraform voxel worlds, build structures, and share custom verses via Steam Workshop. Set in customizable garages and expansive landscapes, it blends vehicle physics, character switching, and drone flight for collaborative world-building. Core mechanics include VerseGate for real-time world control—weather, time, spawns—and runtime asset imports for models, textures, and sounds.
Special features include Unreal Engine 5.6.1 source with headless server support, Mutable MetaHumans for character customization, real-time speech recognition, and integrated tools like car customizers, jump pads, and foliage systems. Players host or join sessions to raise continents, experiment with biomes, and iterate on shared creations without restarts.

name: Diabolika
summary: You have woke up amongst the corpses in defiled church - whole land turned to ruin - you must escape. Choose one of the three classes, learn new abilities, find powerful items and fight through hordes of enemies. Find you way out traveling through convoluted world - or perish while trying to.

name: Dice or Die
summary: Take part in intense games of "poker dice," where you must bet your life in a game of Russian roulette. Your opponents will cheat. If you want to survive, you’ll have to cheat too. Good luck.

name: Diffusion
summary: Build defenses to protect your mining sites from the hostile native alien species. Explore the planet and discover the true reasons you've been sent here for. A true old school pixel-art experience.

name: Disconnect
summary: What happened to the protagonist !?!? You're a skull, connect the dots in the platforming levels to expand upon the story and solve the mystery. All set in a black and white art style, inspired by classic 80/90s Punk posters.

name: Disc Golf
summary: Disc Golf is a casual local multiplayer game for 1 to 4 players that brings the fun of the popular outdoor sport to your screen. Choose from a variety of characters and scenic courses and compete with friends for the lowest score!

name: Dinosaur
summary: Create your own island without limits. Populate your island with dinosaurs, choose from over 50 species. Ensure the mutual symbiosis and prosperity of all species on the island.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Divine Intervention
summary:
Azmodan arises from the burning Hells, and he’s not alone.

Sanctuary trembles as Azmodan and the Lesser Evils rise from the Burning Hells, spreading corruption through shadow and deceit. Hadriel, a vengeful angel, grants humanity Divine Gifts to aid their stand against the darkness. This season also brings sweeping updates to Monster Combat and Item Journeys, redefining every encounter and how heroes forge their power.

name: Digging & Farming & Parking: Simulator Bundle
summary: Three Skills. One Bundle. Endless Progress.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Winter Ball
summary: The 20th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings new content inspired by Disney's Cinderella - including the titular princess herself as a villager, new Winter and Christmas-themed events, the new community feature DreamTeams and starts the Winter Warmth Star Path.

name: Diablo IV: Lord of Hatred
summary: Sanctuary reaches its breaking point. In Diablo IV: Lord of Hatred, Mephisto’s dark crusade threatens the heart of Sanctuary. Rise as new heroes, uncover the fate of old allies, and forge your legend in the next chapter of the critically acclaimed action-RPG.

name: Dig to China Simulator
summary: Dig to China Simulator, is a game about digging a hole in your back yard, until you get to China. Find ores in the holes you dig, sell them, upgrade your equipment to dig faster.

name: Dirt Racing Bundle 4 in 1
summary: Enjoy 4 games in 1 with this irresistible games pack!

name: Divine Dice
summary: In "Divine Dice" you play as a god reclaiming his realm and fighting monsters, higher beings and gods in games of luck!

name: Dino Party
summary: a chaotic multiplayer brawler packed with silly physics, unpredictable minigames, and over-the-top dino action.

name: Diluted
summary: Diluted is a 3/4ths puzzle adventure-action game where nightmares seep into reality. Play as Archie, an orphan bound to a living nightmare, and uncover the truth behind his matron's orphanage as you explore twisted forests and corrupted memories.

name: Digging a Hole... with a Spoon... Escape from Alcatraz
summary: A darkly comedic escape game where you dig your way out of a decaying Alcatraz-style prison using nothing but a plastic spoon. Scavenge junk, barter with your toilet-dwelling cellmate, and bolt bizarre upgrades onto your spoon.

name: Differences Online
summary: Differences Online - a game of attention and speed! Find the differences between two pictures faster than your opponent in exciting duels. Unlock new levels and locations, improve your attention, and compete for the top spot in the rankings. Play stress-free and enhance your skills.

name: Disturbulence
summary: Aboard Skyway Airlines above the Bermuda Triangle, the cabin is caught in an endless loop. Each time you walk the aisle, reality changes—small details twisting into something deeply wrong. Spot the difference just got more....DISTURBING!

name: Dig, Dig, Die
summary: Online co-op horror for 1–6 players. Board a cursed flying ship, raid haunted graveyards for loot, and survive monsters that hear every sound. Beware of UFO abductions, grab boosters from vending machines, gamble in the onboard casino, and embrace pure chaos with friends in voice chat.

name: Direstead Settlers
summary: Build your town, feed and arm your settlers and watch out for the undead coming at night! Survive as much as you can.

name: Direction Quad
summary:
Direction Quad is a 2D action-adventure presented in top-down pixel art style. Take the role of young Quad as he hops through the swamp in any diagonal direction, collecting coins and bugs along the way. The objective is to get Quad from his starting lily pad to the finish line of each stage without colliding with the terrain or any treacherous traps.

As you advance, the mazelike levels get more complex! Use bumpers to ricochet along the best lines, hit switches to open new paths and keep Quad from kicking the bucket! Replay stages as many times as it takes, but beware, there is greater danger lurking in the swamp than even the Wize Toad may realize!

name: Digging And Selling: Simulator 2025
summary: Your Journey Begins Beneath the Earth

name: Distance
summary: Distance is a minimalist idle game where your keystrokes drive a lone starship forward through an endless stretch of space.

name: DistanceGuessr
summary:
DistanceGuessr is a modern geography guessing game that challenges players to estimate distances and elevation differences between locations around the world. From short hops to long-haul journeys, every guess puts your global intuition to the test.

The game features multiple game modes, including distance guessing and elevation difference, along with a wide variety of themes such as short or long distances, capitals, airports, mountains, and major cities. Whether you’re a casual explorer or a geography expert, there’s always a new challenge waiting.

Play solo or with friends, compete in duels, climb the global leaderboards, and return daily for fresh daily guesses. Perfect for streaming and community play, DistanceGuessr turns geography knowledge into fast, competitive fun.

name: Diver, Catch & Cook Simulator
summary: Balance survival, exploration, and culinary mastery in every dive.

name: Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Special Steelbook Edition
summary:
In partnership with Team Ninja from KOEI TECMO GAMES, Square Enix presents DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT as a new and refreshing experience – a team-based brawler.

Combining seamless gameplay, FINAL FANTASY characters and breathtaking worlds from the past 30 years of the franchise, DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT welcomes all gamers to the online battle arena with its renowned bravery combat system.

DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT allows you to choose from over 20 legendary FINAL FANTASY characters and battle in a 3-versus-3 arena. Each match will allow the player to call forth familiar summons like Ifrit, Shiva and Odin to dominate the opposing side or to turn the tide of the battle. This is not your average fighter – this is your fantasy, your fight.

name: Dinosaur Bones Digging Simulator 2026
summary: Your Journey Begins Beneath the Sands of Time

name: DiceVaders
summary: Build an army of alien invaders to invade the Earth in DiceVaders, the roguelike dice game set in the same universe as StarVaders!

name: Dissonant
summary: A game about failing repeatedly and going back anyway because you have a skill issue. No builds No stats No safety net A rage bait game inspired by Getting Over It and the Souls like genre.

name: Diablo IV: Age of Hatred Collection
summary:
The Diablo IV: Age of Hatred Collection includes:

- Diablo IV Base Game
- Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred
- Diablo IV: Lord of Hatred Standard Edition

The Age of Hatred Collection is the best way to begin your journey in Diablo IV. This bundle instantly unlocks the Diablo IV base game and Vessel of Hatred expansion, and includes the Lord of Hatred expansion.

name: Dicegeon Whispers
summary: A tactical roguelike with cards and dice, inspired by tabletop RPGs. Use cards to influence the roll, throw the dice, and create powerful abilities. Choose between three classes and delve into a dungeon where something ancient begins to awaken.

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 2: Gaku-Ran
summary: In this Digimon Story Time Stranger DLC, five new digivolution paths for Mega Digimon are unlocked, granting players a special story woven from encounters that transcend time and space separately from the main storyline.

name: Discontrolled
summary: A time-travelling puzzle-platformer where moving isn't so straightforward.

name: Dino Land
summary:
Everyone’s favorite dinosaur with a gentle heart in the Jurassic Era, “Dino.”

One day, indiscriminate slaughter by brutal dinosaurs has begun in a peaceful forest.

“Dino” sees his lovely girlfriend, “Meeshell” and his friends trying to escape, and decides to fight for them.
Curls up himself, transforms into a ball with hyper strong power, and attack the enemy dinosaurs!
“Dino” is taking a step into his epic adventure to bring peace back to the sky, sea and earth.

name: Dirge of the Scarlet Star
summary: A JRPG and Survival Horror,featuring turn based combat and 12 different playable characters.A day, morning ,afternoon,and evening under the Scarlet Star, to end the insanity,or join it.Dirge of the Scarlet Star is a descent into isolation,madness,and a slow death under the heat of the Scarlet Star.

name: Did You Visit CommutatorApply
summary: "Did you visit CommutatorApply?" — Ask the protocol question in a dying world. You are not a hero. Just a checkpoint officer. Nothing more. Stick to the duty. 30 minutes, 4 endings. You won't uncover the truth behind the "Act of Oblivion". Eyes can't hide the lies. God save us from the flies.

name: Directory Dungeon - File Explorer Dungeon Crawler
summary: A tiny dungeon crawler played right in the windows file explorer. Explore a monster and loot filled dungeon by dragging and dropping your player folder into new rooms, equip powerful files, defeat terrible monsters, and banish evil once and for all.

name: Dinosaur Survival Simulator: Prehistoric RPG
summary:
Step into a world ruled by teeth, claws, and raw survival. Start as a small, fragile dinosaur and fight your way through life—hunting, hiding, and adapting in a prehistoric wilderness where danger lurks behind every rock and in every shadow. Grow stronger, dominate territories, and unlock more powerful dinosaurs as you rise through life stages, shaping your destiny in a world where only the clever and ruthless survive.
Hunger, thirst, and scarce resources make every decision critical. Some biomes are rich with prey, others nearly lifeless, forcing you to plan your moves carefully. Challenge hostile clans, battle the legendary T-Rex, and unlock free-roam mode to explore all dinosaurs, biomes, and gameplay systems at your leisure.

name: Dicement
summary: Dicement is a minimalistic logic puzzle game where your move, modify and manipulate dices to fit them in corresponding slots with different conditions.
